Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this charming hotel on the main street in Laguna Beach, with only like a 4 min walk to the beach. The rooms were clean and the staff was super friendly. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay at this charming quaint inn was wonderful! They have exceptional staff! Rooms were nice and clean! The bathroom offering a wonderful jacuzzi! The rooms circle a courtyard with beautiful flowers and palm trees offering minimal shadeüòâ the water was warm and wonderful!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall the experience could not be better. I have stayed in a number of places in Laguna and the Holiday Inn has been an excellent stay for the last 6days thru New Years. The location is perfect, right across from the beach and shops all over. The front desk staff is super helpful and efficient. Extending my stay during this busy time was no issue. Rooms are good and the bedding and towels all feel like they are new. I have already booked another week mid January and glad to make this my go to hotel while in Laguna. Again thanks for the great work from the front staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a perfect place for families or if you want to be near everything in Laguna Beach. The front staff are super friendly and helpful. We loved our stay here. The rooms were plenty big for the three of us.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Beautiful Garden Inside of the Hotel
Summary: This Holiday Inn might be the smallest one with 55 guest rooms, and its exterial appearance is not attractive, but has good decorated holiday lightings with nice tropical plants surrounding to the non-heated swimming pool. Unfortunately, it does not have a SPA.  The beds are comfortable, but the bathroom is so so. As a matter of fact, the bed comfort is better than the one at the brand new Courtyard by Marriott Monteray Park, CA.
Manager Response: Hi jeremyl181,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for posting a candid review. I was very concerned to read your comments regarding the bathroom comfort. I understand your dismay and I am sorry. This is not the joy of travel for all experience that we wanted for all our guests. I will make sure to share your comments with our team for the necessary improvements needed on our end.   I appreciate you as our guest and I still hope you would give us another chance in the future.   Orlando A. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: A beautiful courtyard and pool, with sufficiently spacious rooms, located a mere 40 steps from an outlook over the ocean.  Spacious granite walled showers,  although somewhat less than plush owels and tiny, low toilets.  $200 for a double.  A longer walk to the main beach.  Hotel is located next to Rph's market.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Walking distance to just about everything
Summary: We arrived at the Holiday Inn at about 3 pm and parked in the Ralph's lot across the street while I checked in. Only after checking in did I realize there's a large dedicated parking lot behind the hotel.  Our room was no. 66, on the second (and top) level above the swimming pool. In the evening a couple of men got together for a chat by the pool, and we could hear them talking in our room even though our doors and windows were closed.   Holiday Inn occupies a premier location near the beach and across from Ralph's, and it's easy to get a quick take-out breakfast at Orange Inn's window on the other side of the Pacific Coast Highway.  They offer free coffee in the lobby.  We were allowed to check out a half an hour late. We felt that Holiday Inn Laguna Beach is a very good value
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We appreciate your review and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Great location and very friendly customer service. Staff was very helpful upon check in.  Hotel is a bit dated yet clean & comfy.  Such a charming setting with the rooms surrounding the pool & courtyard. We didn‚Äôt hear street noise. Walking distance to many restaurants or take the trolley! Good winter rates.
Room tip: Parking in back - was $17 per night.  Usual in Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: The guest services person, Omid, working the evening we checked in was incredibly helpful, kind, and accommodating.  I have looked for a place to leave positive feedback with IGH, but I cannot find a place to do so, thus the feedback here!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: Nasrin is the reason I will be coming back to this property! She is so attentive, kind, and went above and beyond to ensure we were comfortable and happy.  They are very lucky to have her, her customer service is a 10 out of 10! Thank you Nasrin, I will be seeing you again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: My husband and I booked a one night local get-a-way that we earned from the IHG Rewards Program. The hotel is in a great location on PCH, walking distance to most of the shops and restaurants. Nasrin pleasantly greeted us upon check-in and was so friendly and hospitable as she explained the amenities there at the hotel. The best gift was that she upgraded our room to suite. Wow, what a lovely surprise! The room was spacious, very clean and had a nice view including a slice of the ocean. We will definitely be staying there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach and we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: Great location, comfortable rooms, friendly (Nasrin) staff. Property well laid out, but, could use a little touch up. I realize getting help currently can be a problem, and not sure if that relates here, but, a freshening up here and there, would in my mind make this review score a ‚Äú5‚Äù.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay during your recent visit to Laguna Beach. We are still fully sanitizing rooms prior to a guest arrival but are happy to schedule housekeeping during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Great little hidden gem right in the midst of all the action without the big price tag. Walking distance from all the shops and dining on main street. Very quiet and right on PCH. No beach view but as soon as you walk out the hotel you cross the street and are at the beach. Also if you forget anything Ralph's is right across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We appreciate having you as our guest during your recent trip to Laguna Beach. We are centrally located near all main attractions and across the street from the beach and Ralphs for snacks. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Great things happen in Laguna beach. Unsatisfied by the hotel booked down the street, me and my amazing love decided to go for a walk and stumbled upon Holiday Inn and met the most amazing employee Mrs. Nasreen. We ended up canceling our stay at the horrible hotel and booked the rest of our visit with Nasreen .Thank you for everything Nasreen.
Manager Response: Thank you Steve for such an amazing review! Nasrin will be thrilled she made an impression on you. We're happy we were able to turn your trip to Laguna Beach around and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Room awful - front desk staff great.  This hotel is not worth a quarter of the nightly rate. Upon checking in our room we found that the bathroom mirror was dirty with toothpaste and spit splatter and there was a LOT of hair in the bed . We had to have the sheets changed rite away - it was disgusting .   When we got to our room the tv was on so we enquired If we were in the right room - we were told housekeeping watches tv while cleaning the rooms ‚Ä¶ perhaps more care should be taken in cleaning the rooms and less on watching the tv. The room has a damp feel and odd smell and the carpets were not very clean.   The only good things about this hotel were the front desk staff and the pool. Other that that - nothing . I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate having you as our guest. Our housekeeping staff leave the TV and lights on when we are sold out to welcome our guests. We're happy our staff was helpful during your stay and we hope to get an opportunity in earning a higher rating from you in the future!

Summary Heading: Great location. Better experience than I expected
Summary: I usually stay at a more expensive hotel up the street when visiting Laguna, which now has a 3-night minimum. This time we could only stay one night in town. Holiday Inn had availability. I was bracing for disappointment based on the reviews, but wow, it turned out just fine. Larger room than the more expensive hotel with everything I needed: clean bed, fridge, roomy parking lot ($17 day), TV, desk, bathroom amenities (blow dryer, shampoo, etc), Keurig coffee maker, iron and ironing board. No in-room safe; no microwave. Ground level king room; shower with a built-in seat, no tub.Security gates to property. Across the street is a Ralphs grocery store and the Orange Inn. Love the Orange Inn! Great breakfast take out place. Access to the Cleo St. beach is one block away across PCH.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We appreciate you giving us a chance while visiting this year. We look forward to having you as one of our many repeat guests in the future!

Summary: From the first interactions reserving a room with the manager Julio, to arrival and greeted with smiles in a beautiful location it was 5 star. Will stay there again ! Rooms & grounds were clean, comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel over Labor Day weekend for our annual return trip to the Pageant of the Masters. Julio was amazing at check in. We had two rooms with a need for a roll away bed which he made happen without a glitch. The railings and the pool in the middle of both buildings makes the hotel especially charming. I highly recommend this hotel. It's walking distance to all restaurants and beaches too!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during the Labor Day Weekend! Its a great time to visit Laguna Beach. We appreciate your amazing review and hope to welcome you back during next year's Pageant of the Masters!

Summary: This was my 3rd stay, and I will continue to go back :) We stayed over Labor Day weekend, got great recommendations from the friendly staff who went out of the way to accommodate us on a busy weekend. The location is great and walking distance to everything. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for always coming back to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach! We appreciate your 5 star rating and we look forward to welcoming you back on your 4th stay!

Summary Heading: Make sure the person who checks you in gives you back your i.d. and credit card.
Summary: I was not informed until the next day that the front desk had my credit card and driver's license. The man who told me it was there implied it was my fault that I left it. I asked for the name of the person who checked us in not once but twice before I was told it was "Mike"; however, due to the face mask, it could have been the same person. Poor customer service to not have notified me right away and then to not take responsibility.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. I'm sorry you did not enjoy your stay as much as we would have wanted you. We hope to have another opportunity in earning a higher rating from you in the future.

Summary: Where should I even start? This was our first time here and our stay was much better than we could‚Äôve imagined.  We got into town much earlier than expected and all of the staff were kind and accommodating to make us feel comfortable.  Julio at the front desk truly helped make our anniversary a special one. And can we talk about a PRIMO location..?! My goodness, the orange inn restaurant is literally a 30 second walk across the street and has some of the best breakfast, fresh juices, and sandwiches we‚Äôve had here in LB. We took our food to go and walked another 5 minutes down the street to a bench by the beach and enjoyed the scenery. Local shops, food, bars, and art galleries just steps away from this location as well. Rooms here were clean, quiet, and comfy. You step out of
Manager Response: Thank you Tyrone for staying with us during such a special day and giving us such an amazing review! We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach in the future!

Summary: We wanted a hotel within walking distance from the Pageant of the Masters and downtown.  This hotel was centrally located and was accessible to everything.  Parking was plentiful and easy to to access off Cleo Street.  We walked everywhere - in hindsight, we would have uber'd from SNA to the hotel because we didn't need a car for anything.  We forgot our swimming suits but wished we brought them because our room was near the swimming pool which was situation in a private courtyard - it was beautiful.  Room was comfortable for two adults.  Wifi was a bit sketchy, I experienced problems trying to checkout online.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach! We are centrally located to all nearby attractions including Pageant of the Masters. It was great having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn at Laguna Beach for my husband‚Äôs birthday.  The hotel staff upgraded us to a suite!! It was beautiful and such a great surprise!!  Really made my husband‚Äôs birthday extra special!! Thankyou Chris and Julio! Much appreciated!! Outside the doors of the suite is a walkway with comfy chairs that you can even see a bit of the ocean. The hotel itself is quaint, clean and the location can‚Äôt be beat!  It is steps away from a Ralph‚Äôs grocery store, shops, restaurants and the beach.  The hotel has a beautiful pool and is pet friendly.  We will not consider staying anywhere else in the future when visiting Laguna. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach and we are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. You compliments on our staff is also appreciated since they work really hard to wow our guests. Please come back and see us soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary Heading: Cute older hotel, great location! Polite, helpful staff.
Summary: We checked in quite late, but Nasvir at front desk was courteous and helpful. Right across the street from the beach and next to Ralf's market.  Cute older hotel,  quiet courtyard pool.  It has not been updated lately, but thats part of the charm. It has all the modern amenities, comfortable beds, coffee and mini fridge. It was a great place to stop on our trip up from San Diego.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Mrs Nassir at the front desk She is very kind and super helpful , great customer service . Will definitely be back.very organized and super helpful. We were able to not only enjoy our stay but meeting helpful staff makes a huge difference with overall experience
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! Nasrin will be thrilled to see she made a impact on your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: First stay at a Holiday Inn.  We deeply regret this decision.  We felt the condition and cleanliness of this room was unacceptable in every way imaginable.  This was near the final stay of a 2-week road trip and by far the worst hotel.  We typically stay in Courtyard Marriott, Hampton Inn and Best Western.  Each of these chains are far superior than the Holiday Inn  Laguna Beach and I do not believe they would allow any of their hotel rooms to reach this poor of condition.  We informed the hotel staff that we were not pleased with the room and they were nice enough to let us check out and offered us a a refund.  Unfortunately, we were staying for 3 nights and none of the neighboring hotels had rooms so we stayed the entire three nights.  We loved Laguna Beach and plan to return
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We're sorry to hear you did not enjoy your stay with us as much as most of our other guests. We hope to get an opportunity of having you as our guest in the future and earning a higher rating from you.

Summary: The place was already awesome, we stayed here last year and we got an upgrade to a small villa, this time we got an amazing deal thanks to the manager Julio, and we stayed in front of the beach great and amazing view had a amazing time with the family and enjoyed the view and the ocean üòÄ
Manager Response: Thank you Alejandro for staying with us during this Summer. We enjoyed having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Great  location, next to Ralph‚Äôs!! The staff at front desk was friendly and accommodating. The ocean is only a few steps away, at walking distance. The room was clean, nice and spacious. As soon as you step in the hotel you feel transformed to a different place. Great place to stay, will definitely return here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent trip to Laguna. We appreciate having you as our guest and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: The Holiday Inn in Laguna Beach is literally located across the street from the beach. Just cross the street, go down some steps, and it's right there. Amazing and convenient!  Check-in and out was easy and the staff was nice and very helpful.   They have enclosed parking just for hotel guests, so I felt my car was safe.   The pool is placed in the center of the hotel and it is 8ft! We loved that and the fact that it is a salt water pool. The lighting at night is quaint and inviting.   The beds were very comfortable and I loved that they have Bath and Body Workshop products (I LOVE coconut like verbena ;D)!  Ralph's grocery store, a Taco Bell, and more are across different sides of the street, so it is very convenient to get food and store items. We got in later than expected
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with s here at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach and for your generous review.we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: Salvador greeted me at the front desk for my three night reservation which I happen to arrive a couple of hours early. I wasn‚Äôt sure if it was ok to check in early so I asked him and he informed me that there would be a $25 dollar early check in fee. I told him I would wait till the 3pm check in time but he just said write a nice review for the hotel and he would let me check in early for free. I told him I‚Äôd include his name in the review for the nice gesture.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us .we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: This hotel is perfectly placed in Laguna Beach! Walking distance to everything you could want. Cute mom and pop shops, restaurants, coffee shops, easy beach access and outlooks. There‚Äôs also a Ralph‚Äôs across the street which is perfect if you need anything. Had a very romantic and lovely time with my boyfriend wandering the area. Beautiful rooms and a huge pool that‚Äôs very cutely decorated as well. There‚Äôs also a beautiful view of the sunset on the upper floors. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday inn Laguna Beach and  we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary Heading: Highly recommend! Will be coming back!
Summary: This hotel is amazing! Decently priced, calm, and walking distance from restaurants/beach, a Ralph‚Äôs less than 30 seconds away. Quality staff and very professional. This is our second time staying here! Amazing manager! Front desk staff, Emily, she‚Äôs very sweet and patient! My wife and I saw this horrible couple yelling at her and she remained very calm and professional. Some people should be ashamed of themselves! Acting like total babies! We bought her some food for her troubles and making our experience a pleasant stay. We are definitely coming back to this hotel every time my wife and I want to get away for a while. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Holiday inn Laguna Beach and  we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary Heading: How did this get any review above one star?
Summary: Although I researched reviews and  pics, my family and I were shocked by how repulsive this hotel was. We arrived in the evening and were given a room by the pool. It was located in a corner in a creepy hallway. You couldn‚Äôt open the door completely because it was so small and crowded. The carpet was stained and filthy, the wallpaper was peeling off and it smelled. We asked to be switched to another room. It was slightly better.  Slightly. Musty, dirty carpet, peeling wallpaper. Spiders too.  It gets better.  The phone didn‚Äôt work, the internet didn‚Äôt work and the tv didn‚Äôt work.  A young man from the office finally fixed the tv - only to find you couldn‚Äôt turn channels!  It was almost comical.  It‚Äôs basically an old motel that was enclosed into a courtyard‚Äùish‚Äù hotel.  It has
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you encountered problems during your stay but glad that staff was able to take care of them. Your feed back is much appreciated and this is how we better ourselves. Please come back and give us another chance if you come back to the area. Thank you.  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary Heading: Another Excellent Stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: This is our go to place in Laguna traveling from Las Vegas. We stay here several times a year. From Julio Marroquin who is Class Act with all requests to the Front Desk Agents who always greet you with a Smile and are helpful with all your needs. Even with COVID we enjoyed the Hotel which was impeccable, the Restaurants and Shops and our Walk on the Beach. Laguna is our Hidden Gem!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. Its always a pleasure having you stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: This is a great hotel it has a lovely saltwater pool and a beautiful courtyard. The rooms are spacious and the service is excellent. We loved it. We had a room on the 3rd floor with a View of the ocean. And it was conveniently located to all the restaurants and bars
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach. We are centrally located to many restaurants and shops and right across the street from the beach. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: very charming, fantastic garden, great employees, Nasrin made me feel at home!
Summary: Hotel is close to the old town center, the beach is across the street. The patio inside around the pool area is designed as a beautiful tropical garden,so lovely and charming! had a room upstairs on the galerie, sunny and quiet. Stevie
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! Nasrin will be thrilled to read your review. We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: Beautiful boutique style hotel one block from the ocean. Large suite with jacuzzi tub and ocean views, even a little patio to sit on and see the views! . Friendly staff. Just loved it! I will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach.

Summary Heading: Another great stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: Just finished another stay at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach.   This is our go-to place in Laguna - as we lived here for 7 years - since we like to return frequently.  Even with COVID, we were able to enjoy our favorite restaurants ( taken to-go, to the beach or to the hotel ) and sit by the warm, clean pool.  The H.I.  is priced right and the location is excellent - we are in walking distance of practically everything.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I visited Laguna Beach for a very first time and stayed at Holiday Inn! First of all location is amazing, the section right across the beach, mine street and Ralph‚Äôs. Lady Nesrin that was on the reception was so nice, welcoming and friendly! I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place if you are looking for a safe and clean place, WONDERFUL ROOM with a beautiful view and great location!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate you staying with us and are looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: Staying at Holiday inn was best part of my trip beautiful hotel clean ,quiet, good location ,close to beach ,galleries ,down town Resturans every thing was great staying I never forget the staff team Nasrin & Emily were super great in customer care great welcoming Thank you so much , you made my trip special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! Emily and Nasrin will be thrilled to read they made a memorable impression on your stay. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: One Day Stay at Holiday Inn Laguna Beach
Summary: My wife planned this vacation to celebrate her Birthday. The Ralphs supermarket is across the street and it's very convenient to buy groceries.  A few mins walk to the beach. Plenty of Parking available inside the hotel parking garage. The two beds were very comfortable.  Thanks to people like Julio Marroquin who took care of us during our stay.  I highly recommend this property!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach! It was great having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Amazingly wonderful resort on the Pacific Coast.
Summary: This idyllic resort enjoys an ideal location to access all that the Laguna area offers, a truly beautiful beach and great restaurants and shops.  The staff are truly warm and welcoming and will assist in anyway.  The accommodations are spacious, hygienically cared, well appointed. and comfortable.   The Laguna Holiday Inn is one of my favored resorts and the pricing is truly an affordable value for the five star quality of service and accomodation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! Our staff will be thrilled to read your review. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: We got a suite with my friends. It‚Äôs a perfect option for 3 people. The price was good, the suite was specious and felt like a loving, welcoming grandparents house. The best thing about it of course is its location ‚Äî it‚Äôs less than 5 mins of walk to the beach. There are lots of breakfast/brunch places nearby. The staff is extremely helpful no matter what you‚Äôd need. The only problem is WiFi that doesn‚Äôt really reach the bathroom. Overall, I spent a great weekend on this property. Definitely coming back to this hotel my next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us during your recent trip to Laguna Beach and we look forward to having you stay with us in the near future!

Summary: This property has aged with love, and still offers nice amenities and a perfect location for beach days and Laguna Beach Main Street nights. Walking around the downtown area was a highlight and the hosts at the front desk were quick with solid suggestions for dinner.   Our upgrade to the two room King suite was well worth it for 3 adults - I‚Äôd stay here again next time I was in the area and looking for an air conditioned beachside bungalow.  The pool was beautiful, the beds were clean and comfy. Who could ask for more?
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Room 19 at Holiday Inn Laguna Beach
Summary: We booked two nights at Holiday Inn Laguna beach via chase Ultimate Rewards portal. The first night was brutal. We were put in room 19 in a corner. The room itself smells moldy. Water damages were visible on walls and ceiling. At 8:30 in the morning, a constant, loud noise woke us up. We went open the window to see where the loud noise came from. There was zero sun light coming through the window because of the position of the room. No view is one thing, but no sunlight coming in is not livable. The loud noise was from a leaf blower that ran from 8:30is to 9. To top it off, water started pouring down from the roof. We thought it was raining for a minute, then realized that the hotel was just rinsing something from the floor above us. We got zero sleep the first night. It almost
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely take a look into your concerns. Our housekeeping team takes pride in the cleanliness of our property as you can see with all our other reviews. We want to ensure our guest have a great stay and there is someone available 24/7 if you need any assistance throughout your stay. We hope to get the opportunity in having you as our guest again in the near future so we can earn a higher review like most our other reviews.

Summary: Pros: close to the beach, restaurants, shopping. Has a pool. The room itself was comfy.  Cons: The room needed upgrades. Only one bar for WiFi connection, so had to leave the room to connect to the Internet. The parking lot is small and tight. None of the buttons worked on the phone. Waited a long time the first day to get extra coffee pods. Terrible water pressure in the shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We do have high speed wifi throughout our property, including access points in almost every other room. Parking is hard to come by in our city but we do offer a parking spot for all our guest. Our staff is also available 24/7 to help with any needs throughout your stay. We hope to have the opportunity to have you as our guest again in the near future so we can earn a 5 star review like most our other reviews.

Summary Heading: Get Omid to check you in for the best service!
Summary: We chose this spot for its fabulous location but where most fortunate to have Omid check us in and treat us like royalty! Our third floor suite had a spacious main room with a very comfy king bed and massive bath! I particular loved the chairs on our shared patio for a drink. Overall clean, affordable and the excellent location.
Manager Response: Thank you Helene for your wonderful review. We appreciate you staying with us while visiting Laguna Beach. Omid will be thrilled to read your review. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very cool hotel and a great location.
Summary: The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel is extremely clean. It is a short walk to nice restaurants and the beach. There is a grocery store next to the hotel, which is very convenient. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! Our housekeeping takes pride is keeping our property clean and will be thrilled to read your review. We are centrally located near all restaurants and shops in the area including the grocery store next to our property. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Every time we visit, we have an amazing experience here at holiday inn Laguna Beach. We love how we are treated and always get 5 star service. The front desk staff is welcoming and friendly and made our check in super quick and easy. The location is great, just a few minute walk to the beach and nearby restaurants. This hotel is dog friendly, and we will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. Our staff will be thrilled to read your review. We're centrally located to all attractions in Laguna Beach and right across from the Beach itself. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Fantastic location, friendly staff and awesome rooms! We come here at least twice a year and always make this hotel our place to stay. The price and location are unbeatable and the level of satisfactory service provided by the staff here is unmatched. Clean rooms and super cozy beds, spacious bathrooms and a large mini fridge, I love these rooms!
Manager Response: Thank you Yesenia for your wonderful review. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nasrim was really great at checkin and made me feel really welcome.  The service was 5 star and the lobby and rooms were very clean making it very comfortable giving the Covid environment.  This is a hidden gem to stay at in Laguna beach with the cleanliness, decor and location.
Manager Response: Thank you Brian for choosing to stay with us and your kind review. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Was a relaxing trip. The hotel was cozy and clean. The service was great, they friendly and accommodating. My friends and I had a wonderful time. Convenient grocery store across the street. DO NOT EAT AT THE BJs DOWN THE STREET!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We appreciate you staying with us during your recent trip to Laguna. We're conveniently located near all shops and restaurants and about a 8 minute walk from Downtown Laguna. We're looking forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Julio took great care of all of our accommodations. Wonderful location and easy beach access. Thank you to all the staff we had a great time  very relaxing  and beautiful views   If I could give more than 5 stars I would.
Manager Response: Dear Andrea,  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.Thank you for choosing to stay and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: 5 out of 5 stars. Amazing location, near everything you want to see. The room of course was very clean and neat. Garret ( sorry if I misspelled) checked us in, amazing customer service and very welcoming. Will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.Thank you for choosing to stay and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Just want to share you words properly was in absolute perfect location, supermarket bars restaurant, couldn‚Äôt ask for a better location. Julio found me the perfect room, I was a little bit early for check in ,He made some magic happen, Zeal to get in quickly into a room that was fantastic.The pool area  got plenty of sun and the pool was heated just the right temperature it wasn‚Äôt too hot wasn‚Äôt too cold there is some chairs and a gazebo to sit and enjoy an at home dinner that we purchased across the street at Ralph‚Äôs, quiet tropical setting, I will come back to this location again again when I come up to Laguna Beach,All the staff is super friendly and accommodating, with all the craziness  going on with this virus ,all the stuff we‚Äôre super accommodating  cheery and friendly,!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach! We're centrally located to many restaurants and shops including the supermarket across the street. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for one night in Laguna. The property was beautiful and the rooms were very nice and comfortable. The front desk was able to upgrade my room and the stay, as a whole, was very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: At the end of my trip to SO CAL, I stayed at this hotel for the weekend. Again, I was concerned about being safe and having fun.  I called the hotel and asked about their COVID mitigations and was assured all the standards were being met.  Upon checking in With the friendly staff, i did notice that all the precautions were being made and was at ease with safety and enjoyed my stay, great location, beach, restaurants, Sun and surf!
Manager Response: Thank you David for your wonderful review! We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Holiday Inn Laguna Beach I had a great time . Julio and Albert from the Front Desk were excellent and so professional. I ended up with a great room in front of the beautiful heated pool. The water seemed as if it was a salt water pool. And I loved that it has a deep end . The rooms were very clean and comfortable and plenty of room. I just wish I had been able to stay an couple more days. Just a walk across the street to be on the beach. For an overnight get away it was perfect. I plan to return again very soon, maybe this week. Great job to the whole Staff.  Keep up the good work. Sincerely David C
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach and we're looking forward to welcoming you back during your next visit!

Summary: I am very experienced in the travel and hospitality industry as I have owned my own travel company for the past seven years . I have sent many personal client‚Äôs / Friend‚Äôs to this hotel . I have to say the staff and the manager Julio are amazing !! Very accommodating, friendly and super professional!! The hotel is very clean and charming !  Not one complaint ! Great pool and convenient parking right behind the hotel . Two minute walk to across the street and you will be right at the beach !!!! Enjoy !
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice older hotel across the street from the beach. Hotel staff were very friendly and accommodating. Omid at the front desk was excellent with accommodating our requests. Very courteous and professional. Room was nice and comfortable. Hotel was quiet. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your beach getaway! We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Wow such amazing service here at holiday in, when my fianc√© and I got here we thought the room we had picked was going to be bigger and was going to be a ocean view I had never been to laguna before so I didn‚Äôt know what to expect. we talked to the manager who‚Äôs name was Nasrin  she apologized and told us she would find us something more suiting for us! All I have to say is wow she out did herself!! We now have such an amazing view but also have our own little get away which is just what we wanted! Thank you Nasrin your a life saver
Manager Response: Thank you Sierra for such a great review! We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit!

Summary: Manager and front desk staff not trust and rude. The moment I reached the Hotels front desk I should have known this was not good choice for me and my husband for our Anniversary and Fathers Day get away. We had to park around the corner to check in, and when asking the evening manager that check us in about handicap parking she replied Don‚Äôt be LAZY!! Wow.... Ok! Let that pass but spoke on it. She was on the phone most of time in the process and of our Checkin didn‚Äôt respond to questions. Fine, just wanted to get to our room at that point. The next day was not acceptable at all.we left for breakfast and spent most of our morning and afternoon away to come back to our room and find the door completely OPEN while our belongings We‚Äôre in there. I immediately called the front desk,
Manager Response: Hello shavyonne,  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that you did not fully enjoy your Anniversary celebration at the hotel due to the level of service you received. We take comments such as these seriously and would like to follow up with you. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain more information.     I look forward to hearing back from you very soon.    Best Regards,   John O  Case Manager  IHGService

Summary: Charming Spanish style hotel located across the street from the beach in the heart of Laguna Beach.  The location, charming feel, and great value make this an ideal hotel to stay at.  However, it is the staff that impressed us the most.  Both Julio and Nasrin at the front desk were nothing short of exceptional. They set the stage of what made our stay there a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We pride ourselves in delivering great customer service and we're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for my daughter's wedding and had a great time.  Manager Julio and his staff were very accommodating and provided great service.  This is a quaint property with a nice courtyard and pool and was a perfect place for all of our various family members to spend time together.  It's a block from the beach with easy beach access and a little off the beaten path.  The building is in need of some updating and painting but was clean and maintained well.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach. We appreciate your review and we look forward to having you as out guest again in the near future!

Summary: Love the cute Spanish style feel. DO not feel the need to spend more money to stay at the hotels across the street with private beach access, they are so dilapidated and expensive, and the "private beaches" are poorly run. Laguna Beach has some of the most beautiful public beaches I have ever seen, so stay here and walk 5 minutes down the road to the pubic beach, you won't regret it! The service here is amazing, and Nasrin was especially helpful to us when we were in a bind looking for a room for immediate occupancy after seeking refuge from another hotel across the street that gave us the wrong room and forced us to vacate to a smaller and dirty room. We left there and came here to Holiday Inn and Nasrin helped us find the right room for us and our two kids (she even showed us
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a great review! We look forward to having you as one of our repeat guest in the near future!

Summary: My family is 4 and I had a pleasant stay at this hotel. The property is in very good condition and maintained to the highest standard. Our stay was complimented by the courtesy of the management and staff. Special thanks to Nasrin and Shaun, who ensured our family felt comfortable and relaxed. This typo of hospitality is what makes family travel enjoyable. Thanks for you accommodation, and we will see you again.
Manager Response: Thank you Mohammed for your great review! Nasrin and Shaun will be trilled to see they made a positive impact on your stay while visiting Laguna Beach. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary Heading: A wonderful experience at the Holiday Inn Laguna
Summary: A wonderful experience at the Holiday Inn Laguna, When I arrived at 11:45 PM the hotel was already closed due to Covid and I did not have a room I was very upset and had to seek other accommodations, that was the bad news the good news was when I arrived the next morning to explain my situation to Julio Marroquin, he turned my whole trip around by giving me a free night stay in a wonderful suite along with a following day at the same rate as original I was very grateful and wanted to come back again and again Julio gave great customer service and he is an asset to the company along with the rest of the staff friendly and inviting I will come back here again and again....! Thanks  to people like Julia highly recommend beautiful location steps to the beach wonderful restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate you staying with us during your recent trip to Laguna Beach. We look forward to your next visit to Laguna.

Summary: It was a great experience all around and they had incredible people skills/ customer service. The rooms were very clean and well kept up with. Definitely coming back again soon and will bring family the next time around!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Poor customer service and no TV!
Summary: The first thing I look to when I check into a hotel is to turn on the TV and have some background noise.  The TV kept turning off after 20 minutes.  Not only that; it takes about 100 tries before the TV actually turns on. Housekeeping couldn't help; all the nice gentleman could say was that the TV was old and needs to be replaced but he couldn't do that until the morning.  Doesn't do us any good, as we are only here for the night.  To add to that, the front desk lady was VERY slow at check in, and hardly gave information about the hotel - where the best place to park was, whether there's a grab & go, anything.  She gave us nothing.    I tried calling the front desk to report about the TV and even that took me about 20 tries, for every time I called, I would get hung up on, and I
Manager Response: Hello firstreviewanditsbad,  Thanks for choosing Holiday Inn Laguna Beach and leaving your honest feedback.   We always aim for ease in comfort in every stay. It is concerning that we missed the mark this time. I am sorry to hear about the long check-in process and poor service received. Issues with the television also added to the negative experience. I am sorry for the letdown. I have looped our maintenance and front office team about the details of your stay. I am sure that the needed fix and further improvements in service will be carried out.  I know that this stay may not have been the best but I am hopeful for another opportunity to welcome you back for an improved experience.   Best,  Ronald R. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Amazing location across from the beach ! Beautiful courtyard and pool. Manager Julio is extremely nice and accommodating to any needs , making a stressful time as peaceful as possible. All staff wearing masks and well as following social distancing. Great overall experience!
Manager Response: Thank you Mike for your wonderful review. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: We took a bucket list trip down California coastal highway 1 and Laguna Beach was one of the stops we made. We stayed at 8 different hotels/inns in CA, 6 of them being within the IHG chain. And within the past 7 months (I am writing this in April 2020) I have stayed in approxiately 12 IHG locations, so I think I can say a bit about them overall. This location is just adorable and quaint in so many ways. Cutest Holiday Inn I've see. It is not new but it is definitely clean and adequate, big rooms. Does it have a restaurant? No. If that's important you'll have to stay somewhere else. There is a cute little cafe across the street that had good food, check it out, the Orange Inn. The layout is unusual and there are rooms you go down stairs to get to and rooms you go up stairs to get
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate you staying with us during your trip down the Highway 1! We hope to have you as out guest again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Clean Rooms, Supportive Staff and Good Location
Summary: Although other reviews find the hotel lacking, the four of us enjoyed our stay here at a reasonable price, not only close to the beach, but also close to city center (if you don't like to walk much, then a free trolley gives you access to restaurants and boutiques in two directions).  Our room was clean with large enough beds and working amenities. My only criticism is that the windows do not open to allow for fresh air to circulate.  Robert, the night manager, let us to first look at the room we booked to see if it was to our liking--a nice gesture, I thought.  With breakfast not being served, a Ralph's market across the street lets you get breakfast fruits and cereals, but I prefer the small and famous coffee shop across the street--The Orange Inn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: As many people know, I am quite particular about where I lay my head.  My husband is one that is not as discriminating as I am. He says" we are not living here, just spending the night."  I prefer accommodations that I would be like my home and could invite people to stay Normally Holiday Inns would not be my choice, but this place was quite quaint and pretty. The check-in staff was VERY patient with us when we checked in. The room was very comfortable and I  noticed the fixtures not only in the lobby but in the room itself. The bathroom fixtures were above the usual commercial items that you see in a hotel The courtyard was nicely furnished and looked inviting, but unfortunately, we did n not have time to utilize it. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Holiday Inn should NEVER have their name on this one!
Summary: Very inconvenient layout of the rooms.  The room was VERY expensive for what looked at felt like a motel 6.  There are window units, no hot tub, no breakfast, none of the amenities that you expect from a Holiday Inn. The rooms are definitely musty and the bathrooms look like they were "half assed" remodeled. Chipping caulk, dirty tiles. The staff has ZERO personality and not helpful AT ALL. The only good thing about this hotel is the convenience of walking.
Manager Response: Hi MrsGaPeach3,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us. I am sorry to learn the design and lay out of the room is not to your liking and the level of service you received fell below par. I would like to follow-up on your experience and have sent you a private message to obtain additional information about your stay.  Again, thanks for staying with us. I look forward to your response and being of further assistance.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGService

Summary Heading: Very outdated at a premium price - Not a vacation resort
Summary: My wife and I visited this motel recently and I was shocked they had the Holiday Inn approval. The rooms smelled musty and decor very outdated. Pool is small in the center court and can be loud.  The good news is that the hotel has posters in the lobby announcing a total ground up makeover sometime next year.  The location can't be beat and works fine for a night or two, but I would certainly not plan a long distant vacation.
Manager Response: Hello vpvalencia,  Thank you for your stay and for giving us feedback about Holiday Inn Laguna Beach. IHG wants our guests to feel at ease with us.    The experience you shared was not what we want for our valued guests like you. I am sorry that you found our pool small and with the unusual smell you are referring to. I am sharing your feedback with our hotel management as a reference for our renovations.  We hope to see you again once we get our new look.   Safe travels,  Deborah R. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Save some money and stay here.  We stayed in a king suite on the third floor.  Room was very old school and comfortable.  The only con was there is no elevator so it's stairs every time you go anywhere.  We survived, but if you have a handicap, it's best to stay on the second floor.  That floor is street level.  Staff at the front desk were great, too!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for 2 nights and it was one of the worst hotel rooms I've ever had.  It was a holiday weekend and I was visiting a friend in Laguna Beach up the street so I wanted to stay close by.  Being a holiday the room was $300+ per night which was ridiculous for the dumpy room that I had.  The room smelled musty and was damp.  The carpets felt damp and I had to wear sandals all the time since it was gross to walk barefooted.  The carpets were quite worn out as it was.  The wall paper was pealing and there were stains on the ceiling.  There was a window air conditioning unit that made so much noise it was like trying to sleep with a leaf blower going in the room.  There was no elevator and the room was on the lower floor so I had to thump thump my suitcase down the stairs.  If I
Manager Response: Hi LBtravel555,  Thank you for preferring to stay with us among your many lodging options, and we appreciate your willingness to share your feedback.   We aim to continue to provide our guests with a place to relax and experience joyful moments, and, it is with regret learning that you had an undesirable stay because of the poor overall condition and cleanliness of your room. I'm also sorry about the noisy air conditioning unit.  We try to provide our guests with excellent facilities and an unforgettable stay. We take your feedback seriously, and, I'll inform our hotel's upper management to make the necessary improvements so we can provide a better experience in the future.   I've also sent you a message in your mailbox discussing your stay further.  Best,  Kenneth F Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Spent 8 nights in the fab Holiday Inn opposite PCH Nothing was a problem and the rooms were very good quality, regardless what the moaners below suggest. Friendly staff and free coffee, tea, popcorn ice and coco cola throughout your stay. Tables around the pool to set up your own breakfast which we did by buying cereal form Ralphs and hot breakfast for the Orange Inn opposite (great little restaurant) Pool was warm and good sun beds. It was holiday season and was never crowded. Just a short stroll to the bars and food places on PCH Private parking although 5 bucks per day but it is still cheaper than parking in London all day!!!! We heard the hotel is being demolished and a new one being built, such a shame as the character does this place proud and it has that holiday feel
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It‚Äôs a Holiday Inn, not the Ritz for Pete‚Äôs sake
Summary: I took notice of the ‚Äúless kind‚Äù reviews and still reserved here. I thought, well at least some of the rooms are nice and I‚Äôve got a bit of member status. I asked for an upper floor room. Hahaha. We got what is probably one of the weaker rooms there (Room 18). Dark, below grade (street level), a mildewy smell, noisy AC, and older furnishings. But look, the woman who checked us in, Sam, was great‚Äîprofessional, competent, pleasant. Other staff members were friendly and clearly doing their jobs. The room and grounds were clean. There‚Äôs a functioning fridge/freezer, decent beds, and good coffee maker. Pool and patio looked good. Price is right for what is a very expensive area. It‚Äôs only a mile to the Pageant and art festival. Easy walk. I‚Äôm gonna choose to believe that the better
Manager Response: Hello comedor,  Thank you for choosing to stay at our Holiday Inn Laguna Beach.  I am glad that our cleanliness levels and hotel staff service were able to measure up to your standards. I will be sending your compliments to Sam, it would sure to make her happy. It's good to note that you found our room amenities handy.  It's good to note that you found our location convenient and you had your money's worth.  We wanted that your stay was a combined sense of comfort and delight and I am sorry that there were some setbacks on room allocation and comfort.  I am alerting our housekeeping team about the odd smell you were referring to. The maintenance team has also been alerted about the AC condition. Worry not because I have noted all of these and will be sharing your insights to our hotel management. I know they will look into these and strive to make things right.  We will be looking forward to your next visit.   See you soon!  Deborah R. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Great location, central walking distance, wonderfully friendly and welcoming staff. Hotel is a bit tight, rooms are on the smaller end, they were clean and comfortable. Could be updated a bit but staff were great.
Manager Response: Hi LIsab6466,  I appreciate you sharing your thoughts about your stay at our Holiday Inn Laguna beach.   We believe the joy of travel is for everyone. I am ecstatic to know that you find our location convenient and that our staff showed true hospitality when you visited. Despite this, I'm sorry you find our rooms a bit tight to your liking. Though the room cleanliness and comfort hit the mark. Don't worry, I immediately informed our management about your concern and be assured that we will do our best to see what can be done.   I hope this does not deter you from choosing us again.  Kind Regards,  Hazel A. Case Manager IHGService

Summary Heading: Didn‚Äôt sleep the room was  terrible!
Summary: Shame on you Holiday Inn for charging $285 per night for a tatty, noisy, dirty old stuffy room  which resembled nothing more than an 70‚Äôs motel!  The hotel may look quaint in photos , but it certainly isn‚Äô!   I should have taken note of previous negative reviews on here and booked somewhere else. I have stayed in other Holiday Inns and plenty of hotels and this by far has been my worst experience !   The room on entering smelt old  and stale and had no opening windows so completely stuffy ; the curtains ( 80‚Äôs ) were designed so they didn‚Äôt close  at all ( just for show )so anyone walking past on the outside landings ( and there were plenty of people ) could see straight into our room - NO privacy. The carpet was stained with marks and holes ; the wall paper was coming away ;
Manager Response: Hi jzeee,     I am sorry to learn about that you found our rooms dated and the trouble encountered with the unpleasant room smell.  This is not the first impression we would like to provide. I also read that your sleep was interrupted by the noise caused by the air conditioning unit. Trust that I have shared your comments with the team to better your next stay with us. Please note that I have sent you a private message to obtain more information.  We hope to turn things around and looking forward to hearing from you soon.  Warmly,   Kristine B.  IHG Service Case Manager

Summary: First, Laguna Beach is beautiful and awesome. I did not see many places around that I would not have enjoyed staying at. HI Laguna was great for our family. The hotel is older and takes you back a few years, but nicely decorated and nice. Just steps to the beaches and to many of the restaurants you want for sunset views.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: So many great reasons to stay here
Summary: We have been to Laguna Beach before but this time we were here for a wedding. There are so many reasons to want to stay here I thought I lay out a few for you. Frost off - extremely friendly staff , clean rooms, great pricing, and amazing location, easy walk to beach and tide pools. Directly across the street is a Ralph‚Äôs grocery store, caddy corner is the Orange Inn (one of the oldest coffee / sandwich shops in Laguna Beach. The Waylon gallery as well as several other galleries and studios, Amazing restaurants and the Brown Garden are all within a 2-3 minute walk. The beach park at the center of town is a 9 minute walk. We can‚Äôt say enough good things about our visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best Hotel For Convenience and Relaxation
Summary: This is our favorite place in Laguna.  It's close enough to downtown to walk and just far away to escape the crowds. There's also a pathway to the beach right across the street. They always have popcorn in the lobby and coffee and water available.  The middle pool area is one of the highlights. Its very well maintained and hardly ever crowded.  The staff is very friendly and always available to help out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Located just a few minutes south of Laguna Beach-central this blast from the past has it all 1. friendly competent staff    2. clean spacious rooms   3. peace and quiet  4. on site parking  5. reliable WI FI   6.reasonable rates, really.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Can not believe this hotel is part of the IHG group,looks lovely from the outside,staff were very nice,now the down side ,our room had wallpaper peeling from the walls and no safe,thankfully we were only here 1 night and the number of this room was 13. my bad luck
Manager Response: Hi Ron S,  Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to share your review. We strive to make each stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible, while I'm glad you found the service of our staff friendly, I'm sorry we missed the mark with the wallpaper condition in the room.This is not the typical IHG standard we are usually known for. I made our hotel management aware of the lapses you encountered to ensure we avoid this from happening again in the future.   I appreciate you bringing this to our attention and I hope to welcome you back to share with you an exemplary experience!  All my thanks,  Jonathan A Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Great location- across from grocery market and within walking distance to shops and restaurants. The view from the room was amazing. The staff was very courteous and helpful. The staff made are staying much better,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best Value in Laguna Beach CA
Summary: We enjoyed our stay and loved the property and location. Staff are very attentive and kind and helpful. It is an excellent value for the area. The property is an oasis in a busy area. The ocean is across the street. We will be back next year.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are incredibly grateful that you took the time to leave us your feedback. Our guest values our guest satisfaction and is a top priority and we are committed to our guest. Its guest like you that make our job wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.   We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Why overpay to stay next door? At leas thats how we see it, this hotel is perfectly located, the rooms are standard but very big, very clean, and very comfortable. Plus this does not look like a cookie cutter Holiday Inn, its got that Colonial Spanish style or French Country that is very pretty and common in the area.  Walking across the street you will find all the shops, coffee places, restaurants, live music, and more. We feel very pleased.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us your feedback. Our Holiday Inn , Laguna Beach values guest satisfaction is a priority and we are committed to our guest. Its guest like you that make our job wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.   Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Frequent traveler. Spend over 150 nights a year in hotels. When traveling, the IHG is my preferred brand to stay at. This is a much older hotel than expected. Rooms have been updated BUT the noise at the hotel is to the point of being unbearable. Have never stayed at a property with so much noise. Checked out two days early due to the constant closing (slamming actually) of the gate going to the parking lot which was 4-5 rooms away from our room. Actually rattles the room every time someone exits the gate. Great location. If you don't mind a lot of activity and the noise at the property, then this might work for you. Didn't for us. The Staff at the hotel was very nice. Great location. Wished it would have worked out for us.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us your feedback.We will take care of the issue mentioned , I am sorry to hear about your experience. We hope you can give us a chance to make it better.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary: This hotel is an old hotel but has been updated. At first glance, you may think it‚Äôs unacceptable or at least I did. The bathrooms have new stone and water pressure was decent. The beds and pillows were great as you would expect in a Holiday Inn. It has a nice pool area with garden space around it. Only thing is there isn‚Äôt an elevator. It‚Äôs a different kind of Holiday Inn than I‚Äôve stayed in but was pleased in the end.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us your feedback. Our Holiday Inn , Laguna Beach values guest satisfaction is a priority and we are committed to our guest. Its guest like you that make our job wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.   Kind Regards, Karen Palacios

Summary: Loved the atmosphere, and location to all the awesome restaurants nearby.  The staff was excellent, and the hotel itself although showing its age, was perfect. It felt like I was in my own little world when I was lounging by the pool.
Manager Response: Dear Kristina,  Thank you for providing us your feedback. We are delighted to hear you had a great time here in Laguna Beach. If you should be in the area please visit us again at our Holiday Inn property, we hope to see you back soon.  Kind Regards,  Karen

Summary: This is not the Ritz, but it gets 5 stars for clean, friendly, close to the center of town, and a beautiful beach across the street. Standard room with comfortable bed and pillows. Coffee pod maker in room, good tv. Nice local coffee shop across the street at the ‚ÄúOrange Inn‚Äù. Main Street Laguna is an 8 minute walk. Fabulous, gorgeous beach is a two minute walk. I didn‚Äôt care for the $15.00 parking fee, but other than that, the price was right.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate you for taking time to provide us with your feedback. I am delighted to know you enjoyed yourselves. We hope to see you back soon.  Kind Regards, Karen

Summary: I have to be honest - I can't remember the last time I stayed in a Holiday Inn and my expectations were low.  Wow!  Was I wrong!  The Holiday Inn in Laguna Beach is a wonderful place to stay and I would catagorize the hotel as having definite Boutique characterisitcs while it is also somewhat of a Hidden Gem! My husband has been visiting Laguna Beach since the late 60's and he admitted he never knew this hotel existed.  It is charming.  The staff are friendly, professional, and efficient.  The rooms, especially the doubles, may be a tad small but they are very clean with updated bathrooms, luxurious showers and great amenities. (I always like hotels that give the little packages of make up removal - classy!). Kudos for having great linens, a selection of pillows (soft/firm) and
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a beautiful review.  Most guest don't bother to leave reviews about positive experiences  and that's what makes you the star. It's only when we receive such positive feedback, do we rest knowing that we have done our jobs well. Thank you for giving us this proverbial pat on the back, you made our day! We will strive to deliver great experiences consistently, please do come again.   Kind Regards,  Karen

Summary Heading: Great Spot for Enjoying Laguna Beach
Summary: Work brought me to southern Orange County a lot over the past few years. I've settled into the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach as my home away from home. My thoughts, gathered over 100+ nights staying here: Positives: - Great location. Walk across the street for beach access. Dozens of great restaurants within 1/2 mile walk.  - Great people working at the hotel. I've gotten to know everyone there and they will bend over backwards for you. - Pool area is clean, and well-kept. Brand new lounge chairs. Great place to relax, if you're there for fun. - Good value. It's not 5-star luxury, but it's not $500 per night either.  Negatives: - Not a knock against the Holiday Inn, but summer is very expensive in Laguna Beach. I generally stay elsewhere in the busy summer months.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are delighted to know you have a great time while staying at our property. The rates during high season are in high demand. Please always keep us in mind we will take care of you.  We are looking forward seeing you back soon.  Kind Regards,  Karen

Summary: quaint little hotel, all rooms face inward, overlooking really nice pool area /atrium. Attached restaurant was under construction when I was there but should be re-open by now. Very reasonably priced for Laguna Beach, HIGHLY recommend
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us your feedback. I am glad you enjoyed your stay at our property. We are looking forward to your next stay!  Kind Regards,  Karen

Summary: The hotel was nice, but Robert made our experience the most pleasant. He was very kind and made us feel so welcome for my family and me. Thank you for a great stay, Robert!  He let my family and I all hang out in the lobby of the hotel and was always very smiley.  The hotel pool was really nice, too, and we hung out there all weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Carly,  Thank you for leaving such a nice review. We are glad that you and family loved our services, and our dedicated staff will be pleased to learn of your high praise. We hope to see you back soon.Thank you, once again, for your kind words.

Summary: Great location, within walking distance of great food, beverages  and the beach! Staff was very polite and beneficial. Samanta was especially accommodating, helping us extend our visit. The room was extremely tidy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were glad we were upgraded as our room had a great balcony where we sat out on a lot. Our room was large and probably double that of a standard room. It was clean but the decor is dark and old fashioned so makes the room dark. Large comfy bed and loads and loads of towels and toiletries. The pool and seating area is very lovely and mostly only a couple of guests using it. There are clearly some rooms that are not well located as they are dark and in the shady areas. I would be less generous with the rating if we'd been in one of these. The hotel is nice and close to town and there are lots of good local restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us with a great review. I am pleased to hear you had a wonderful time staying at our property. We are looking forward to your next stay. Have a wonderful day !

Summary: Hotel was very boutique in style.  I was originally thinking ok hotel within company policy and really wanted to stay at Laguna Beach.   Well what a surprise.... the hotel was awesome and surpassed my expectations.   The bed and pillows were great!  Room and bathroom updated and spacious.   Don‚Äôt let the hotel name fool you!   I will be coming back!!
Manager Response: Dear ChrisStephanie,  Thank you for your wonderful review, we are thrilled to hear you had a fantastic time while staying at our property. Summary: Location location location...yes it has that.  Great inexpensive opportunity to ‚Äúget away‚Äù to the ocean and enjoy the charm of Laguna‚Äôs village.  Is it the best place to stay ...uhm well you can say there is very little privacy as the rooms open onto the interior pool court yard..so no, no light in the rooms & no privacy... Would I stay here again?  Depends if I wanted a crash pad only and intended to go out all day at the beach/shopping and all night having fun at the restaurants which are in abundance. Yes I would.  If I wanted a romantic ‚Äúget away‚Äù week-end with someone....maybe not so much!  Bonus the staff is delightful & friendly!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are incredibly grateful that you took the time to leave us this review. Our property values our customer satisfaction and is a top priority and we are committed to our guest. Its guest like you that make our job wonderful. We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: I really loved this Holiday Inn. It was quaint and had a lovely charm about it. It is correct to say that it has the "motel" style with the layout from years gone by but they have made many updates and made the best of the interesting piece of land that the hotel occupies. It is built into a cliff.  The cleaning staff works very hard here. I wish I had taken a picture of how they have the top duvet cover hanging on a hanger in a fresh plastic bag ready for the next guest on their housekeeping cart. It is not like how you would go into some motels of our past and fling back the bedspread knowing that it was most likely not fresh. We all had great sleeps in the clean linens and comfy beds. Our air conditioner kept things lovely and cool as it was a hot week in Laguna. It wasn't an
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for leaving such a nice review. We are glad that you and family loved our property, our dedicated staff will be pleased to learn of your high praise. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: This place was more reminiscent of a motel than your typical Holiday Inn. We were in a room with two double beds despite only the two of us. Room was very small. Aircon was incredibly noisy. Sink and vanity are in the bedroom area. I agree with other reviews though, staff are lovely and the pool is ok, in the middle of the courtyard with the rooms facing it. Ralph‚Äôs across the road and a short walk to restaurants etc

Summary: The staff very nice but thats where it stops at this hotel. TV did not work but it was replaced eventually.. The key cards are horrible had to get new ones 4 different times. Being locked out while bringing stuff from the  car IS NOT FUN especially with kids and having to walk around property to get new ones was not fun. Being locked out of the room did not make this first stay here fun.

Summary Heading: To say this place is gross is an understatement
Summary: This hotel is located across the street from a cul de sac that takes you down steep stairs to get to the beach; not an easy access. The carpet was wet-not damp-wet!  The entire carpet was wet-we kept our shoes on the whole time. The toilet leaked. The placed smelled. The only redeeming quality was the nice staff.
Manager Response: Hi BratNorv,  Thank you for your stay and for taking the time to share your experience with us. It is good to know that you appreciate the service rendered by our stay.   I'm sorry to learn that our amenities and facilities didn't match your expectations on this occasion. Please allow me to follow up on your concerns and have the opportunity to regain your faith in us. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain additional information.   We value you as our guest and look forward to your response.   Regards,  Christian C. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: The pool is wonderful, lovely setting and grounds and our kids loved playing in it. The location is superb, 1 min to the beach and only a short walk into downtown (or you can even take the free Laguna Beach trolley). However the rooms are lacklustre to say the least. Initially we were given a dive of a room in the corner (dark, rattling air-con and peeling wallpaper) but demanded something else. So we were upgraded to a suite on the top deck which was much better but still has not been remodelled for sometime. It was clean enough but is not a ‚Äúnice‚Äù room to spend time in, decor is very tired. We were just grateful to not have 4 people in the corner.

Summary: This is my favorite hotel in Laguna Beach. Not only is the hotel beautifully decorated but it is surrounded by restaurants, shopping and the beach right across the street! Nothing can beat it! Also, the service is excellent and every staff member is friendly and makes you feel welcome. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit Laguna. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are glad that you and family loved our services, our dedicated staff will be pleased to learn of your high praise. Summary Heading: Not a bad place with a great location.
Summary: It is a bit different from a typical Holiday Inn, looks like a hotel that was not originally made as a holiday inn.  Room was a bit tight and had a musty smell but not horrible.  Has a decent pool area.  Quite pricy for what you get but it is Laguna Beach in July nothing is cheap.  Great location and easy to go places without driving much.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your prestige opinion of our property.We take pride in giving outstanding service every customers and we're overjoyed to receive your compliments and appreciation. We hope to see here again soon.  Kind Regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent service and quaint gardens by the pool
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach.  The gardens by the pool were beautiful and contributed to a relaxing and peaceful setting.  Bottles of water, Coke and Diet Coke were available in the lobby at all hours and coffee was available in the morning.  The staffwere friendly and the rooms were nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Escape the San Diego Triple Heat
Summary: Overall, what Holiday has going for them, is the proximity to the beach!! Cross the crosswalk and head West and you will hit some stairs to go down to the beach. The waves appeared to be more rough at this spot, but if you walked down North Bound, it seemed calmer there. Just absolutely beautiful beaches here to enjoy!! The property is on the older side as many of them are. I will say the air con is extremely LOUD! The flip side of this they could have none and that would have been miz! It was in the upper 90‚Äôs so really needed one, but made for some serious distributive sleeping. üò° room is adaquate, just the inflated rates are annoying playing on summer tourist. The hotel is not worth over $250 a night in my opinion. I have no ocean views. Will pay more next time and have that
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Charming hotel in the center of Laguna beach
Summary: I've stayed in Holiday Inns all over the world, but this was by far the most charming and unique one. It feels like an independently run place (which it surely once was), not a chain hotel. The rooms are located around the swimming pool, which is not huge but maintained well. Front desk staff was very friendly. Received an upgrade to a large corner suite as an IHG member. The hotel is located in the center of Laguna Beach; you can get everywhere by foot. The beach is 3 minutes away by foot. Parking space is large, directly by the hotel and costs extra. The hotel has no breakfast/bar/restaurants, but there's free coffee and soft drinks, and so many options directly by the doorstep. A large Ralph's supermarket is just across. At $150/night in upscale Laguna Beach, this is one the
