Summary: This hotel is a gem and a bargain for the area.  Very quiet and comfortable with a great location.  Amazing staff-Samantha went above and beyond to be helpful.  I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to coming back.

Summary: We stayed here for a night on a couples weekend. Easy parking behind the hotel. Such a pretty hotel, rooms are around a courtyard with a pool. The rooms were perfect, king size bed, comfy sheets and fluffy duvet. Coffee in room and best of all in reception, coffee, bottled waters, sodas, popcorn, juices - all complimentary ! You don‚Äôt find that very often anymore. Will definitely come back again, walking distance to beach and shops/restaurants, friendly staff.

Summary Heading: Location is worth the lack of luxury
Summary: This hotel is staffed by very friendly employees who really try to make sure you are having a great stay.  The property is old, but has had some renovations.  The king bed was very comfortable, but the room was so small that you couldn't open the cabinet fully because the bed blocked it.  The curtains also don't cover the entire window so you can see into every room. The air conditioner is super loud.  However, you are right across from a grocery store, and it is a short walk to Main beach and plenty of restaurants, galleries and shops.  We didn't come to stay in our room all day, so the problems were minor.  You might want to bring some shampoo, because the bottles are super small.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your opinion during your stay. with other.We take pride in giving outstanding service to every guest and we're overjoyed to receive your compliments.  Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: This hotel is a gem. Arrived 2 hours before checkin and was given free cocktail, access to pool & beach. Room was ready an hour before time and had the most gorgeous beach views from the balcony. Make sure to also visit the rooftop bar for some amazing views!

Summary: I had a huge mix up with my hotel arrangements and needed to book one late when I got here (I‚Äôve never been here before but came for work). I would definitely stay again when in Laguna!

Summary Heading: If allowed - 3.5 Stars for Location & Value
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 1 night, as we stayed at a nearby hotel for a work event the two previous nights, but wanted one night in Laguna. The location was fantastic, with it being located in the heart of the town and one block to the beach. It was super convenient to all the restaurants and stores, so you didn't need a car.  The hotel itself is more of a motel with ample parking. The staff were friendly and we were upgraded to a suite, which was very spacious with its separate living room. The room was comfortable, but was definitely dated and had an older motel feel.  For what we needed it for, it was definitely a good option (hence why I wished TA allowed 3.5 stars for a "good" rating). I would definitely recommend it for anyone staying one or two nights in the area,
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us this note. Our property values put guest satisfaction and is a top priority and we are committed to our guest. We look forward to serving you again.   Warm Regards, Management

Summary: Stayed one night and glad that‚Äôs all it was. Checkin only had 1 staff member working. The room was ordinary (and overpriced). One particularly annoying thing was every time I wanted to go to the parking lot (the fact they had 1 was a plus), you had to go up or down a flight of stairs and the secure doors were very picky as to whether the room key would work or not. Lastly, I had been recovering from surgery, has to beg for an extra 30 minutes to check out and they were knocking on the door 20 minutes later.  Not many hotels in the area, but I won‚Äôt be back if I can help it.

The carpets are filthy and stained, traffic is very loud and people outside your room talk and you can hear every word. My kids didn‚Äôt sleep from all the noise and people yelling outside the room. If you didn‚Äôt tuck the curtains people could see in your room. The light from the pool shines in through the windows all night. We had to tuck the curtains to block the light. The wallpaper is peeling off the walls and is staples in some spots and it smells like an old musty and moldy building. Can‚Äôt wait to leave. Felt like a bad old fashioned motel.

Summary Heading: Location and external visuals are good
Summary: We stopped here for one night and it was fine for the length of our stay.  Parking is right behind the motel and costs $15 per day.  Access to the hotel from the parking lot is easy.  Check in was painless and the staff were cordial.  The externals of this Holiday Inn, both for the inside courtyard and out on the street, are pleasing to the eye which sort of sets expectations about what the rooms must be like.  However, the room itself was disappointing and located in the lower level which has kind of a closed in, dark feeling.  It was chilly while we were there and window mounted room heater made a lot of noise.  Unfortunately not enough to cover up the noise of guests coming in late at night from their revels.  It did make me wonder what the noise levels would be like when it

Summary: We stayed here for a whole week and enjoyed it. Really comfortable beds and pillows, quiet room, very clean and the perfect location for us. Walking distance to all the shops, restaurants, galleries and 1 block off the beach. Only slight negative was there was no restaurant/bar in the hotel, but plenty of restaurants close by, plus there was a fridge in the room for us to keep drinks and fruit. Set up like a motel, with a courtyard in the center with the pool.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We greatly appreciate it.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary: We had a good stay here! It is right in the ‚Äúhub‚Äù of everything for Laguna Beach. Very convenient for Uber drivers. They had complimentary cans of Coke and Diet Coke in the lobby which was very appreciated. We were given plenty of clean towels whenever we asked for them (if we didn‚Äôt let the maid service clean our room). I was here for 7 days so I really got a feel of the hotel. Unfortunately, it is outdated and it was very damp and musty smelling in our room. I was able to get past that for the price and convenient location compared to other hotels in the area. This was the best price/quality combo in my opinion. Everything was very clean. I would stay here again. I would love to see it get an update!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for providing us your feedback. Your comments are much appreciated and your honesty. We will be reviewing your feedback to help us to determine what steps to take to make it right. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Perfect hotel in the center of Laguna Beach within walking distance to shops and restaurants. Friendly staff. We stayed for 1 night while passing through the city, so hardly spent any time in the room. However, the room was clean and spacious.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very pleased with the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach!
Summary: My 2 daughters and I stayed at this hotel Dec. 14-17, 2017.   We stayed in room 60.  The exterior of the hotel was surrounded by flowers and very pretty and well kept.  Our room contained 2 queen beds and was clean and quite roomy.  The beds were comfortable.   The water pressure in the shower was awesome as was the hot water!  The lighting in our room was excellent...and we really appreciated the great lighting and the extra mirror in the bathroom.  The hotel provides complimentary coffee, bottled water, and hot tea in the lobby all day long.  The location is perfect......directly across the street from the beach and walking distance to downtown Laguna.   We walked to the wedding venue at Heisler Park on the beach....which was only .7 miles and it took 15 minutes to walk.   We

Summary: This review is based on a 33 night road trip staying at 22 properties, so is relatively objective.  We stayed for 2 nights in October.  Easily found on the Pacific Highway and with the all important off street/private car parking facility - the downside being that this is chargeable.  This is a converted motel style property which has been transformed into a well presented real little gem with plenty of character.  Reception staff were friendly and efficient. The rate provided excellent value in such an expensive area, especially bearing in mind the beach access was literally a couple of minutes walk across the road.  Our ground floor/pool level room was on the small side, but as above, provided excellent value. Clean, comfortable & well equipped. Despite the proximity of the

Summary Heading: Well priced, decent accommodations in an expensive area
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights recently.  The first room we got was a little damp smelling, so we were promptly moved by a very helpful and friendly staff.  While it is an updated 1950s/60s motel type property, it has character and charm.  Bed and accommodations were not fancy but clean and comfortable.

Summary Heading: Great spot for me and my pup!
Summary: Great location and walk to the beach. Ralph‚Äôs was across the street. Plenty of spots to walk KoKo. Nice little breakfast spot across the street as well. And walking distance of shops and great restaurants.

Summary: Walk out the door of the Holiday Inn, Laguna Beach, and find yourself facing the ocean and in the middle of terrific shops, restaurants and galleries.  The location can't be beat.  Parking is affordable.  The rooms are clean.  The staff is friendly.  The value is good.  And did I mention location?

Summary Heading: Wish I could have stayed longer
Summary: I only spent one night in Laguna Beach; however, I would stay here again if returning.  While the parking fee and lack of breakfast was unfortunate, the friendly staff and plentiful snacks/beverages in the lobby made up for it.  I didn't get to enjoy the pool, but it looked inviting.  This hotel has a great location and is super cozy.  I grabbed a breakfast sandwich from across the street and enjoyed in on the beach (but watch out for the seagulls!!!).  It was an easy walk to the beach (across the street) and to lots of shopping.  The room wasn't quite as nice as I imagined it would be (the A/C never really did cool it down completely), but I slept well and enjoyed the offered amenities.

Summary Heading: Look twice ...not your typical holiday inn
Summary: Super friendly day staff...night security a little grumpy...beds comfy and clean...shower drains sluggish...room attendants delightful...pool area a joy...lobby small but well stocked with beverages...location was convenient to everything...overall nice place.

Summary: After staying in a 5 star hotel in Beijing this was a completely different experience but, in a nice way.  Yes, perhaps the corners of the wallpaper are loose and a bit of dust high up but this hotel is cosy.  It has a lovely, unique character that you can't find in those modern, high tech super clean ones.  I loved the way all the rooms over looked the pool area which was quite beautiful at night, all lit up.  A small oasis away from the busy bustling world outside.  The maid came in every day and remade our beds, and did all the usual things.  Wi fi not brilliant but passable, actually better than in China!  There is a nice little convenient store just across the road so you can buy those late night snacks etc.  And we usually ate our breakfast in the little place called The

Summary: This is a small boutique hotel managed by Holiday Inn.  It has a very cute and appealing lobby with a very friendly and helpful desk staff.  They are only a block from the free trolley stop and across the street from beach access.  The beach across the street is very narrow, but via trolley access there is a large public beach at the main intersection with Canyon Blvd downtown.  The rooms have a mini fridge and microwave; Ralph's grocery store is directly across the street which we used to make a beach picnic.  We were attending the Sawdust festival and Pageant of the Masters art show. It was probably about a two mile walk but we didn't mind taking our time to walk thru downtown.  You could take the trolley if you didn't want to walk.   The room's are clean and comfortable;

Summary: Checked in kinda later in the day so i has happy it was a fast check in process. The girl at the front desk was nice and let us know how to get to our room. The room was really clean and I felt 100% comfortable.

Summary Heading: Good location , but overpriced for this hotel

Our bed dipped so much in the middle it was very very uncomfortable.  The supermarket across street was handy.  Lights outside our room made it difficult  to sleep.  Pool was nice.

Summary: Karen is a wonderful employee!!!! Very helpful, knowledgeable and always smiling.rooms clean and close to all activities. Beach very close and good restaurants not far. I believe my group has stayed the last 6 years for the Pagnant of Masters.

Summary: Picked this hotel because it was a last minute trip and there wasn't much availability left. We based it on the picture and location. We checked in and the man behind the desk was not very friendly just matter of fact. Needless to stay we canceled the rest of our stay there and checked out the next day. The room smelled, was damp, uninviting and the A/C was so disgusting I never saw anything like it. Upon checking out the manager apologized and was very nice. She was well aware of the problems. She told us the hotel was bought out and  was going to have an overall to give them another chance next summer, but until then they weren't improving or fixing things. They did offer free coffee and when I went to enjoy a cup it was empty and no one bothered to check and refill it.

Summary Heading: couldn't ask for a better location, Staff, and ambiance
Summary: From the reservation to the departure, we had an excellent experience.  The room was very nice. Just like Laguna Beach itself, this is an amazing place to stay. The beach is a short walk across the street.  The nearby restaurants are amazing.  Shopping is so wonderful. A very romantic place to stay.

We hope to see here again and please bring all your friends and family. We will ensure they all enjoy the same quality of service as you have.   Kind Regards, Management

Summary: This hotel is 1 block from the beach, the staff is friendly and the rooms were clean.  For the price, this location is very nice.  Be aware there is a 15% city tax that is not disclosed until check out.  The only issues in this stay were the inconsistencies of the room keys working and the staffing shortage regarding hot coffee and creamer in the lobby.  This seems to be the responsibility of the front desk clerk until of course someone wants to check in or out or the phone rings.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Everyone is a chance to learn where we can work harder for our guests.   Having your keys not work is a huge headache. I understand for it has happened to me at hotels a time or two. Sometimes the keys are old and refuse to hold the program or, as in your case, our locks on the doors lose battery power. Our maintenance staff does regular checks on the floors to try and prevent these issues.  We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: This Holiday Inn is a great place to stay when visiting Laguna Beach and going to the three Art Festivals that are held in summer.  Shuttle bus stops less than a block away. Hotel is clean and decent. Has a pool. Also a good place for breakfast is right across the street. Check it out.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for providing us your feedback! We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, we always aim to meet every expectation. We hope to see you back very soon. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Stayed here for one night in August with my husband. Room was big and comfortable. Bed was comfy. Nice pool in the center of the rooms, but we didn't have time to use it. Good location for sights of Laguna beach. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I‚Äôm so pleased to hear you have enjoyed your stay. We work hard to make sure every guest receives our personal attention, quick responses and, of course, the best accommodations. We hope to see you very soon. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Positives:  1) The cost and location are good. 2) Nice 8' deep pool  Negatives:  1) The rooms are dingy.  The rooms were very damp and gave our cloths a weird smell.  Originally thought it was due to location by the ocean but the walls were very wet.  There were pipes outside the room that were leaking.  In the morning, thought it was raining when looking out the window, but it was leaking pipes.  The walls looked to have dark spots and thought it could be mold?   2) Wallpaper was peeling
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for leaving your feedback. I genuinely value the opportunity to hear where I can improve our service, and I‚Äôm sorry to hear it didn‚Äôt go as well as I wanted it to. We will be reviewing your comment mentioned. If you are returning back to Laguna Beach I would love the opportunity for a second chance. Again, Thank you for your feedback.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary Heading: Delightful stay at the Laguna Beach Holiday Inn
Summary: Just got back from a delightful 4-day visit to Laguna Beach to see the Festival of the Arts, the Sawdust Festival, and the Pageant of the Masters. We chose the Holiday Inn because it was a good compromise of location and price -- not the absolute CLOSEST hotel to the event venue, and also not the most expensive. For the price, this was an amazing find -- clean, convenient, super-helpful and friendly staff. And guess what, being super-close is not an issue at all. During the summer, they run a free shuttle/trolley up and down the main street, directly to the event venues. There's a shuttle stop right in front of the hotel. We walked it once (about a mile) and then took the shuttle back and forth the rest of the time -- very convenient!  Also convenient: Ralph's grocery across the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I‚Äôm so glad to hear you were happy with your stay. I appreciate your feedback during your recent stay with us; we always aim to meet every expectation. I‚Äôll share your feedback with our staff to ensure we remain a high energy, responsive and proactive team for every guest. I appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience and hope you visit us again.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary Heading: Nice hotel at a good price!
Summary: My Mom and I just stayed here for 3 nights and we were impressed! We were looking for a hotel with 2 queens and this was one of the few hotels that had two beds in a room. The grounds around the pool were very beautiful and the hotel was quiet. The staff was friendly and the location was so good because you can walk into town or catch a shuttle out front. Also, the Orange Inn across the street has the best breakfast ever! Our only complaint was the air conditioner for the room was kind of loud but we wore some earplugs and no problem. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know of your experience during your stay. Our goal is customer service and making sure all of guest are enjoining their stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. Until next time ! Thank you for your wonderful feedback.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary Heading: The Friendliest Hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: I don't write reviews often but feel the need to do so after staying at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach for the past several summers.  I attend the Pageant of the Masters every August with a group of friends, and have stayed at this hotel for the last 8 years.  I keep going back because Karen is so awesome in helping me arrange for our rooms when I book them months before arrival.  She is so friendly and professional, always making sure everything is perfect for us.  She greets us with a smile when we get there and the rest of the staff are wonderful as well.  I love the convenient location, the lovely tropical grounds, free water and sodas, fresh lemonade, coffee and tea in the lobby.  The rooms are simple but well appointed with a refrigerator and Keurig coffee maker.  It is also
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. We  appreciate you, upon whose satisfaction we have been allowed to grow and prosper in this highly competitive marketplace.  Again, thank you for your feedback we will see you very soon. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: The host was so kind and helpful.  The rooms are a little older but everything is clean and well maintained.  There is onsite laundry but it is hidden behind the little gym area.  More coins than I expected and no fabric softener to purchase.  Minor, minor thing. Free beverage station - water, tea, etc.  The water is HUGE -- we would have spent a ton on water walking around, so thank you!!  NB -- no elevator so if you have lots of heavy luggage ask for a room on the street level so it's easier to get your stuff in the room. Lovely pool.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. One again, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you in the future! Kind Regards,  Management

Summary Heading: Older Well Kept Property, Friendly Staff
Summary: Without knowing  what the economics or politics of building modern new hotels along the coast highway in Laguna Beach are I imagine that process would be very difficult, if not impossible. Thus, at least for now, you are not going to find a brand new Intercontinental or Hilton Hotel in this area. Having said that, the Holiday Inn there is clean, well run and in a very convenient location at a decent price for Laguna. Yes the rooms are small and the air conditioners somewhat loud but the room was cool and clean without excessive noise form other rooms or from the street. The staff was very friendly and helpful, especially Jeanette who was efficient and pleasant during check in and patiently  answered our numerous questions about transportation, dining, bars etc. We stayed
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your kind letter regarding your exceptional treatment by our employees. A copy of your letter has been forwarded to our management.  So seldom is it that a guest takes the time to write a letter of appreciation, that i feel moved and we appreciate you .  Again, on behalf of our entire organization, a heart-felt thank you.  Holiday Inn Staff

Summary: When traveling to Orange County I always stay here. Close walking distance to everything from grocery store to many restaurants and THE BEACH! Arash is a great host and ensures every stay is comfortable and pleasant! Be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. We work really hard and we are happy to see your review reflected as a good stay.We will see you very soon.  Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: I stayed with a group of friends who go back to this property every August. From check-in to check-out, I was amazed at how efficiently and well the hotel is run. The staff seemed proud of the hotel and operation, and indeed, my stay was very very nice. It had one of the BEST beds I've ever slept in at a hotel! Great job, everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for a great review! We really work hard to offer the best customer service their is. I am happy to see that it reflected on your recent stay at our property.We hope to see you very soon. Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: I¬¥ve visited this cozy hotel for almost 20 years now and keep coming back, every year ‚Äì in business as private. Wonderful and responsive staff and service every day and night, beautiful ‚ÄúCalifornication‚Äù style and surroundings, Ralphs a few steps away,  ‚Äúdowntown‚Äù some minutes to walk to, beach nearby and much more. I have probably tried every room and love the suites when possible, but the other rooms are good enough. In each direction, some 15 minutes to Dana Point, Irvine and Newport. It feels like everything is nearby. A really good feeling!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at out Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations and your continued support and ... It has been a pleasure to serve you as our valued customer, and we will continue to for many more years to come. Thanking for your continued patronage and assuring you of our best services ... Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: Good hotel.   Good location. GREAT people!  Staff was exceptional.  Do a lot of little things like always have coffee/water/diet coke available in lobby for free.  Couple bags of popcorn at checkout is a super nice touch! Highly recommend, and will visit again...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your continued support . It has been a pleasure to serve you as our valued customer, and we will continue for many years to come.  WE will see you very soon.  Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: Although this is not on par with the top properties in Laguna, the HI is not trying to be something it is not.  Customer service is very good and I'd like to give Sabiha extra recognition as she seems to go out of her way to do her very best to take care of all her guests.  The location is great and is within walking distance of all the Laguna attractions.  The Orange Inn across the street is fantastic for breakfast and Ralph's right next door is very convenient.  I highly recommend the property and applaud the customer service team.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind letter regarding your exceptional treatment by our employees.  We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. Our appreciation of our guest such as you, upon whose satisfaction we have been allowed to grow and prosper in this highly competitive marketplace. Again, on behalf of our entire organization, a heart-felt thank you.  Holiday Inn Staff

Summary: We go to Laguna Beach every year and this is where we always stay.  Amazing hotel and  wonderful staff.  Everything is perfect from the rooms to the showers to the lighting.  I am a very picky hotel person when traveling but this is one hotel I will always come back to and trust.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your continued support and choosing us for your stay. It has been a pleasure to serve you as our valued customer, and we will continue for many more years to come.  Thank you for your confidence that you have placed in us, while I would like to assure you that we do not take this confidence for granted ... Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Well designed and attractive hotel.  Friendly laid back staff.  Room was small and cramped.  Easy parking for $15 a day.  Central pool was smallish but adequate.  Great location near the beach and walking distance form all the bars and restaurants of Laguna Beach.  Quite expensive for a Holiday Inn and the dining area was closed for refurbishing so had to go nearby for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at out Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.

Summary Heading: TERRIBLE HOTEL DO NOT BOOK HERE
Summary: I had a terrible experience at this hotel. Upon arrival I told the "manager" it was a special occasion and I wanted a nice room, the lobby looks fine but passed the main door its is absolutely chaos IT IS A MOTEL looking hotel in laguna. They "Upgraded my room to a suit " Since it was my anniversary I didnt care paying more and I did not want to make it a big deal because I was trying to relax and have a good time. Our room smelled like dead rat, it was the most horrible smell , old carpet , old furniture, broken a/c  window a/c, the bed was great I loved it so I tried to let it go, the bathrooms were disgusting , The manager said this room has a jacuzzi , great , the jacuzzi was from 1980 and dirty, dust all over the wall ledges, and the kitchen counter furniture was so dirty
Manager Response: Hello Adrian A,  First of all, Happy Anniversary! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and writing us a reviewing our property. I am very sorry for the inconvenience you had with the smell, cleanliness and noise issues which affected your stay. I am also sorry for the level of service you received from our staff as well. Your feedback is very important to us as this continually helps us improve the facilities and guest services we offer to our guests. I have sent you a private message to obtain some additional details.   Thank you for staying and we look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Dianne L. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: After experiencing a beyond horrible,  momentary stay at the La Casa Del Camino and checking out rather late at night, we drove down the street and the Holiday Inn was the first hotel we came too. We stopped, they had a room and we checked in.  Good decision on our part.    The room was very clean and a step up from the basic, the furniture and carpeting was all in very nice condition and seemingly pretty new.  The courtyard was surprisingly nice and with a lot of foliage.   The staff was great and very friendly.  The hotel is conveniently located a short 5 minute walk to the beach.    You do have a parking fee of 15.00 a day, but the rooms are reasonable for Laguna (and almost half the price of the fly-by night hotel we had left).   BTW, a restaurant called "The Deck" is just a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had 2 nights on this wonderful hotel during a business trip. It was a great experience. I can really recommend the hotel. Staff is so nice. More than you would expect. They maintained their natural selfs and were just helpful and friendly. We guessed that they must really have a good working athomsphere. You cannot fake such a perfect friendliness for so long. The hotel is not super luxurious. Its basic and even does not have a breakfast restaurent. However, this did not matter. The feel of the rooms and the location of these overlooking the pool were perfect. It is also within 5 min walking of the best beach and many nice shops and eating places. As an add on, they had free water, coffee and soda in the reception. A small and very appreciated token. All in all, I can
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you so much for your review. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Management

Summary Heading: Hotel Perfect Location - But No Breakfast and Charge for Parking
Summary: The Hotel location was perfect for us to enjoy the beach, get free bus, walk to church, and close to wonderful restaurants.  The pool was excellent and we used it every day.  On the negative side, my group (11 in my group in 5 rooms) were very disappointed no breakfast came with our $300 per night rate. -and each car was charged $15  day for parking.  Given the high room rate we expected breakfast and parking to be included.   Rooms were neat and clean.  All staff we met were very accommodating and pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. The problem that you have mentioned have been brought to the attention to management to improve those areas mentioned.  I'm sorry for the inconvenience and the annoyance this has caused you and I hope you give us another chance to prove ourselves.   Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and I hope to see you back soon.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Perfect weekend getaway. Location is perfect. Just cross the street and you are at a beautiful beach, walk few blocks and you are at the main village, need anything - Ralph's grocery store is across the street. Hotel staff are very helpful and attentive. Hotel has a nice courtyard and a pool. There are light refreshments in the lobby. Its a perfect getaway place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just spent 6 days here and had a wonderful time. It's walking distance to some of So Cals best beaches, great restaurants, shops and art scene. I love being car-free! A free trolley runs in summer months which makes it easy to get to the art festivals in the Canyon.  The rooms are clean and comfy (large bathroom area) and the pool and patio is awesome - very tropical feeling. There's no restaurant, but lots of dining options nearby in addition to a market (get your wine and appetizer or picnic supplies). Karen, Janette,  Josh and all the staff are quite pleasant as is housekeeping staff. We highly recommend Holiday Inn Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Major Issues - Not a Typical Holiday Inn
Summary: IHG is my go-to company for all my business and leisure trips. You know that you'll get the same high level of quality at any of the IHG brands no matter where you stay  in the world. However, the Holiday Inn at Laguna Beach is an exception and represented one of the worst experiences I've had at any hotel.  I booked a room for 1-night with 2 beds and things start out great after I am confirmed for a suite upgrade because of my platinum status. I arrive on time with my family for the stay in Laguna Beach and discover that the hotel had given my room away and assigned me to one of the worst rooms in the complex, on a lower floor with a single bed. No explanation or apologies are given. I request for a room with 2-beds and the staff replies that it is a shame that the hotel is
Manager Response: Dear KowyokWW,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are happy to know that you always choose our hotels whenever you travel. However, we would like to apologize for the level of service you received from our staff during your visit and for not living up to your expectations regarding the condition of the room you were given. Reviews like yours are very valuable as they enable us to target areas we need to improve on. Rest assured your feedback will be forwarded to all concerned departments for evaluation. In addition, we have sent you a private message to obtain more information about your stay.  We value you as our guest and hope to accommodate you again for a chance to provide you with a much better experience.  Sincerely,  Joel A Case Manager IHGService

Summary: This is a lovely hotel. For us the location was right. The main main beach ( activity)is a 20 mintues walk away but the beach is only 5 mintues walk away. The staff are friendly and very helpful. The rooms were nice and clean. It has lovely pool and the ambience was nice. We took breakfast at a lovely restaurant across the road. Overall a very nice hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: We decided to stay in Laguna Beach as one of our many vacation stops.  We chose this hotel for our stay.  Very nice place, very comfortable beds and air conditioning that keeps you nice and cool.  The hotel is a short walk to the downtown area of Laguna Beach.  The restraint in the hotel was under renovation, so we took our meals in the various restraints in Laguna Beach.  They did have coffee available for the guests.  Nice pool as well.  It's a great place to stay and not as expensive as other hotels located in Laguna Beach.  Plenty of hot water as well.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations. We hope to see back very soon.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary Heading: Close to beach but small room
Summary: Room was acceptable and clean and reception staff friendly. but room is a bit cramped - reminds me of college dormitory room actually. (And not because its cheap.) No issues but just average.  Price is expensive maybe highest of the 6 or 7 hotels my family stayed in our two weeks in san francisco / napa /monterey / los angeles west hollywood / laguna beach /legoland / las vegas.   (+) just a few minutes walk to beach (-) room had 2 double beds but besides the beds and bathroom there was not much space.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Great location, lovely hotel. The pool is gorgeous, surrounded by planting and trees. The desk staff (Karen and Arash) were very friendly and super helpful. You are literally steps from the beach and a very short walk to downtown. Having a Ralphs opposite is very helpful too.  We loved our time in Laguna Beach and will definitely stay here again when we return
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is at a perfect location 2mins walk to the beach. Restaurants nearby. The staff are super good. Very helpful. The pool is very nice, tropical atmosphere. Teh water in the pool is heated. Very satisfied for our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.

Summary Heading: Best bang for the buck in Pricey Laguna
Summary: Most reliable hotel in Laguna, for an ok price (expensive compared to most other cities but it is relative in very expensive Laguna). For example- our room with a King was approximately $280/night (once factoring in taxes and nightly parking price of $15). For the price you get a nice room with a comfortable bed, a fridge, and a/c and a great location (cross the street and down a driveway and you are at a great beach and about a 7-10 minute walk to the main beach and restaurants). Did not notice any noise and was a very comfortable stay. The free coffee, water, and soda in the lobby was a nice touch. Front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Recommend this hotel in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at out Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.

Summary Heading: Wonderful location and great, cozy hotel
Summary: We were pleased to have found this gem.  It was a perfect location and parking was on-site. Courtyard located pool with secure access to each room.  Morning coffee and beverages were a treat. The staff was very friendly and helpful and were very accommodating to our last minute request for a room and a fair rate.  It was a perfect spot for families or couples.  Only downside is that the restaurant was under renovation.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, On behalf of Holiday Inn, wanted to thank you  for choosing our hotel for your celebrations. I hope that we managed to make your day extraordinary and special.  Once again, we would like to thank you for booking a room at our hotel. We assure you that you will enjoy your stay on your next visit.  Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: If you are staying at Laguna Beach this hotel is a great location to have close access to restaurants, grocery store, beaches and stores.  Main beach is a nice walk past many great stores.  This is a clean, quiet place to stay.  Staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, On behalf of the Holiday Inn , we would like to personally thank you for choosing to stay with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we truly look forward to your next visit.  We realize your time is valuable and appreciate your input and feedback so we can continue to provide service that not only meets, but exceeds our guests' expectations. Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn. We appreciate your valuable comments and look forward to serving you again soon. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Perfect location for walking to area shops, restaurants and beach. The pool and landscaping were serine.  Rooms were comfortable, nice and clean.  Perfect for business or pleasure. Wonderful service and hospitality, ask for Joseph!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.   Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a couple nights and we just checked out today. We were sad to leave since our stay here was going so well. The hotel was beautiful. Complimentary refreshments and great amenities. The staff were so friendly. Josh or Joseph I think that was his name was kind enough to give good places to eat and visit. Very professional. Staff was very friendly. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing from our loyal guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.  Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and I hope to see you back soon.  Kind Regards,  Management

Summary Heading: Wildly overpriced for pretty poor accomodation
Summary: Low grade US motel.  Windows didn't open so you had to leave the door open to get rid of the "welcome to this establishment" smell in the room.  Restaurant was shut.  The only good things are the location and that we only had an overnight stop here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let me know of your experience during your stay at our hotel. We appreciate hearing from our guest, as your comments and your feedback are important for us to continue to improve our accommodations.  I am very sorry to hear that your stay was not 100 percent satisfactory. We do our absolute best to have each guest have a great experience and I am sorry that we fell short of that.  I do hope that you can give us a second chance for a better experience at our hotel.

Summary Heading: A Slice of Romantic Heaven On Earth
Summary: Stayed here for one night on a mini-vacation drive down the coast between Santa Monica and San Diego. In grace and gratitude, We were upgraded to a lovely, immaculately clean romantic Suite with a sitting room complete with a fireplace, King Size Bed in the bedroom and an oversized Jacuzzi Tub in the bathroom. At the recommendation of the front desk clerk, we dined at GG's Bistro, an Italian, Turkish, Mediterranean romantic restaurant with indoor/outdoor dining, beautiful decor and savory delights for the palate. We requested and were granted late check-out, and my friend went across the street to Ralph's Grocery and picked up champagne, strawberries and chocolate for a nice morning bubble bath in the Jacuzzi bathtub and then a swim in the hotel pool. The attendant was just
Manager Response: Dancinkwm, We are elated to hear that your romantic getaway was all that it could be and more! We are so happy when our guest are happy and able to relax and enjoy the oasis we have here! Thank you again for your wonderful review and we are looking forward to your next vacation with us here at Holiday Inn Laguna Beach! :)

Summary: Had the chance to stay at this property in January and had a great time.   Staff was very friendly and helpful with eating recommendations. The room was comfortable, spacious with lots of extras!  Even had a Keurig Coffee maker with K-cups. Fridge and microwave in room. Large TV. Separate vanity from shower/toilet area, so two can get ready at once.  The grounds are well manicured with a lot of seating area.  It was raining the day I was there so was not able to take advantage of that.  On site parking for a fee but well worth it, due to limited parking in Laguna.  Great location, easy to walk to the beach or downtown area for shopping. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: JSandeen, We are so elated that you had a chance to enjoy your stay here with us in spite of the broken faucet in Southern California! :) It is always a pleasure to hear when our guests were able to relax and enjoy our little oasis! We certainly appreciate your feedback and look forward your next stay with your friends!

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel complete with lush California vegetation and a courtyard pool. It can be a money saver as it is on the east side of Pacific Coast Highway and it no longer has the outstanding Italian restaurant. It fact it has no restaurant at all.
Manager Response: Hello Karen,  First off let us make mention that we greatly appreciate your business with us here at Holiday Inn! We love that you appreciate the beautiful and unique characteristics of our little oasis! I just wanted to let you know we still have our Mare Italian Restaurant here. We are just undergoing some wonderful changes and updates. Thank you so much sharing! We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Laguna beach is nice and this hotel is in a pretty good spot. It's a little walk up from the main centre and there is plenty of patking around the back. It is a little tired but it's clean and if you get it for a good price then you should be happy. The pool is clean and there is a small supermarket across the road.
Manager Response: Hello, We are so happy that you had the chance to relax and enjoy our little oasis! This property is very unique in that way and we are working really hard to make sure each guest feels special. However, we are always improving to make each moment is better here for our guest. That is why we appreciate your feedback and we are certainly looking forward to your next stay! Thank You!

Summary: Great stay for two nights.  Room was immaculately clean!  Staff was very efficient and friendly.  Walked 1 block to the beach to watch the sunsets.  Easy walk to art galleries, shops, and restaurants.  What a great location!  A good "value" for a reasonable cost.  The additional parking fee, though, seemed a bit steep, but it saved the hassle of street parking.
Manager Response: Hello There!, We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us! We are always happy to hear that guest are excited about out little oasis! We thank you for your feedback and look forward to have you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We just left a Holiday Inn in Solvang, and since I'm an IHG member, I thought we'd stay at the HI in Laguna.  It is a good location, and they have a great parking lot that's easy to navigate.  The front desk staff was friendly.  I asked if a quiet room in the back was possible, and little did I know that meant this dark room in the corner of the building.  Bathroom was bigger than the last HI we were at, but no bathroom fan, just a vent.  Again, the vanity is outside but doesn't offer enough privacy since there's a large mirror that angles toward the room.    Nice desk and chair, but the old school AC/heater unit is right next to it.  Good size tv, small fridge, no microwave.  The coffee maker came in handy.  No complimentary breakfast, but there's a Ralphs across the street to
Manager Response: Hello, We really appreciate your feedback! We do understand that some of the details of your accommodations were not as expected, however we value each and every guest's response as we are always looking for ways to improve your stay and make each moment memorable while you stay with us! Although we are not sure what the future holds, we do hope to see you again in the future and that the next time would be an even better stay! Thank you again for your feedback!

Summary: We had such an amazing stay. It's conveniently located near downtown area of Laguna Beach. Our room was clean. The hotel itself was really beautiful. Check in was easy and simple. Although I think the young woman and bald headed gentleman seemed more interested in talking to each other. Restaurant was closed :( Overall out stay was great! We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know of your experience during your stay at our Hotel. We appreciate hearing your feedback and is important for us to continue to improve our accommodations and guest customer service. Again, thank you for choosing us ,we will see you very soon.  Sincerely, Management

Summary: Prices were extremely high for a mediocre  room. Restaurant only open in evening. Had to go across the street for a nice breakfast. Was not impressed. Was supposed to be on each according to advertisement but was not. But it was convienent as shuttle stop was close by
Manager Response: Hi Ellen, We do apologize that your stay was less than perfect! Please allow us the chance to redeem the experience of this stay by re-visiting us in the near future! Although our prices are competitive to the area and the market, we do pride ourselves on making each and every guest feel special.

Summary Heading: Perfect Alternative to Ocean-side Hotels in Laguna Beach
Summary: We chose Holiday Inn Laguna Beach mainly because it is just down the street from the seaside condo our friends were renting.  At a quarter of the price you would have to pay to be on the beach, Holiday Inn is a great choice.  It is convenient to everything Laguna Beach has to offer, and the Ralph's supermarket just across a quiet side street from the hotel is a real bonus.  We were upgraded to a suite on the second floor at the back of the hotel.  It was spacious and private, and even had a fireplace.  The ambiance is "classic Laguna Beach" with a beautiful interior courtyard and rooms with french doors overlooking it.  The rooom decor is somewhat dated, and the furniture is looking its age, but everything was clean and well-stocked.  If you have mobility issues, the stairs may
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We would like to thank you for taking the time to compliment the staff and the hotel.  Your feedback and comments are important to us, letting us know where we can improve or appreciate a job well done. We are very grateful to hear your stay was a memorable stay and enjoyable. Again, thank you for your kind comments and we are looking forward seeing you in the future.  Have a great day!  Sincerely,   Management

Summary: The room is outdated, it was fine for one night but i wouldn't want to stay longer than that. They had complimentary beverages (coffee, soda, water, lemonade) and popcorn. The staff was very nice, but this is really a motel!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We regret to hear that your stay with us was less than perfect, but it is your feedback and comments that help to make us better.  Our staff strives to make all of our guest‚Äôs experience a positive and memorable while staying with us. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: IT was our first visit in September 2016 and we were very impressed
Summary: My wife myself and two other family adults spent a week at this hotel after a week in New York and stayed there only due to a hotel a few doors away letting us down badly after double booking us.   They managed to get us in at the last minute and saved our holiday from becoming a disaster! But....it was also a superb hotel not only in a great location (Laguna Beach is a great classy up market resort) but had great staff particularly at duty reception where they were extremely helpful and courteous at all times. Rooms were very good in a really nice enclosed courtyard setting with a nice swimming pool in the middle. You even got as much Coffee, Tea, Bottled Water and Coke, even Popcorn ALL FREE from the reception area day or night, this saved us a fortune over the week. The free
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a compliment about your stay with us.  We are pleased to hear you‚Äôve enjoyed your visit and we are delighted to hear you will be returning. We hope to see you soon. Kind Regards, Holiday Inn Staff /Management

Summary Heading: We felt like visiting royalty here!
Summary: Beautiful tropical pool area with warm water. Perfection. Gorgeous suites, oversized bathroom and plenty of toiletries, beautiful windows and views, incredible desk clerk/manager, popcorn and free coke in the lobby. LOVED THIS PLACE!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to compliment the staff and the hotel.  Your feedback and comments are important to us, letting us know where we can improve or appreciate a job well done.  We hope to see you on  your next visit to Laguna Beach Ca.   Kind Regards,  Holiday Inn Management

Summary: Really I can't think of one negative thing to say - the hotel is in a perfect location (right across the street from the beach and a Ralph's grocery store is next door.   The staff was so, so, so nice and pleasant in every interaction. VERY gracious and service-oriented.   The lobby area with free Coke, Diet Coke, bottled water, fresh ice, lemonade and popcorn was amazing! What an incredible touch that really made the stay feel extra nice and luxurious. The kids were so stoked, and I loved being able to grab a Diet Coke and cup of ice for the pool.   The pool area is charmingly situated in the center surrounded by beautiful bougainvillea and wrought iron balconies - it looked like you'd been transported to Spain or New Orleans. Nice comfy padded beach chairs, towels, and
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind comments on our performance of our staff and taking the time to write a lovely pleasant stay you experienced by staying  at our property. We hope to see you and your family very soon.   Kind Regards,  Management

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights. The facility is older but has had some renovation.  My sister fell in love with the shower..It was floor to ceiling tile with a built in seat.  She even took pictures to show to a contractor to have put in her house. Yes we have vacation photos of  a bathroom! There seem to be at least a few steps at each entrance.  I don't know how a handicapped person could get in or out of here.  We were on the main lobby level which is also on the parking lot level.Second floor. Two steps down from the lot .  I had heavy luggage so I notice things like that..   The pool was down stairs and was really nice, small but pretty with a gazebo lit with tiny lights at night and a fire pit.  The restaurant was closed on our first night since it is only open on weekends right
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is a pleasure having you stay with us and we appreciate your feedback, we keep our property in a charming traditional way. I am glad to hear that your family and yourselves enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you very soon.  Kind Regards, Management

Summary: Corner of Main Street in the Laguna Beach area. Cross the street and you have direct access to a nice beach area. Located near shops and restaurants and has a supermarket right across the street. Rooms are spacious, clean and quiet. We got a room in front of the pool area and it was a nice view from our window. The lobby area is a little dated but the great rate and location makes it a great choice for couples or families.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding our exceptional property. We appreciate you for choosing to stay with us and we will see you very soon.  Sincerely, Management

Summary: We spent 2 nights here and would happily return if we are going back to Laguna again. It has a gOod location close to the beach and many restaurants, nice and flexible staff - extended our check-out time without any problem. The hotel also has a courtyard pool that is convenient at hot days.
Manager Response: Hi Kjell. Thanks so much for your kind review.  We are so glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us and that our staff was able to accommodate that extended check out so you could enjoy Laguna Beach a bit longer.  We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Are we the only honest reviews?MILDEW SMELL
Summary: Last minute we decided to stop and stay in Laguna Beach.   We have been many times, but this time had an issue finding a hotel.  I went on to Trip Advisor and Hotels Tonight and it seemed that the Holiday Inn would be a good choice, though a bit expensive at $300+ for the night.   When we signed-in the rooms weren‚Äôt ready and we would be back later that evening once the room was cleaned.  When we returned we could not believe that the door would not open fully as the bed hit the door.   Even worse the smell of mildew reeked!   This was not a roadside hotel, but one in the middle of one of the most beautiful and exclusive cities in the USA!   They gave us keys to another room, but it also had the same issue.  While this hotel has renovated furniture, they have failed to deal with
Manager Response: Dear ASchwartz6. I am so sorry to hear about your experience at our property.  What you encountered definitely does not meet our standards and we will make sure to have our maintenance staff check on this immediately.  Again, I want to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused during your trip.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel on several occasions and we are never disappointed. All the rooms face the pool which is a lovely aspect. The rooms are clean and comfortable, the staff are courteous and helpful - we really couldn't find fault with anything and we wouldn't hesitate in returning. The very slight downside was the on site restaurant (which we'd used in the past and found to be very good), was only open on Friday and Saturday evenings. However there are plenty of other amenities so it wasn't a problem.
Manager Response: Dear Susan. Thank you so much for your kind review.  We truly appreciate your repeat visits and are so happy to hear that our staff are doing such a fine job.  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Great staff from front desk to cleaning and service staff. Relaxing. Great location .loved having the ability to do laundry . Clean rooms with the common areas extremely well maintained. Beautiful common pool area. I would stay here again. Business and family travel
Manager Response: Dear Leannpriddy1. Thank you for your review.  We appreciate all the feedback we receive from our guests.  I'm happy to hear that you had a relaxing stay and that our staff made such a great impression.  We definitely look forward to having you and your family stay with us again!

Summary: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach with my son Daniel and my daughter Emily and absolutely loved it!! Sabiha was so friendly and helpful and gave us so much information about restaurants and places to visit and for this reason, I would not hesitate in returning to your hotel. Thank you Sabiha!! The pool was a great place to relax and unwind and the rooms were comfortable and clean. Emily and Daniel also loved the popcorn and drinks available as and when they felt like a refreshment and snack...nice touch!! Thank you to all staff for making our last few days in LA unforgettable. Lee üòä
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We want to thank you for your lovely feedback we take pride in what we do and our exceptional customer service is always first. We are looking forward in having you stay with us in the near future.  Sincerely,  Management

Summary: We stayed here a few times.  It's not new but it's clean and comfortable.  Centrally located.  Beach access directly across the street.  Walk to restaurants and shopping. Coffee, tea and water located in the lobby all day.  Prices are reasonable compared to other's in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Linda. Thank you for the kind review.  I'm happy to hear that you had a nice, comfortable stay with us.  Also, thank you for your continued visits.  We really appreciate your feedback and looking forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: In Sept when on vacation and travelling from San Diego to LA, we made an unscheduled stop here for 1 night. What a tranquil place and quaint hotel we randomly chose! The room itself was suitably equipped and cosy. Furthermore the view onto the pool which was lit up at dusk, and the ironwork surrounding both the apartments and pool area, was charming. The hotel is also in a great location..has friendly and helpful staff..and is across the road from the beach. I would definitely recommend this hotel. Paul & Carmel from Ireland
Manager Response: Dear Paul and Carmen, Thank you so much for such a kind review. I am so happy to hear that you had a lovely spontaneous stay with us.  We definitely have a prime location, making it easy for our guests to get out and see the best that Laguna Beach has to offer.  We do hope you'll keep us mind the next time you visit our coast!

Summary: Our family of four spent a couple of nights at this hotel after staying at many others down California's Route 1. This was the best by far. Nice room, air con, nice pool lit for evening use (until 9pm), complementary refreshments and helpful staff. Short stroll from the beach and shops. Would defiantly stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to compliment the staff and the hotel.  Your feedback and comments are important to us, letting us know where we can improve or appreciate a job well done.  Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with and we hope to see you soon.  Kind Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a beach vacation
Summary: Located on the Pacific Coast Highway hugging the ocean, this clean property could  not be better located. Friendly staff and surprisingly quiet. I found it being located next to a full service Albertson's supermarket to make the location greater. If you are looking for a Four Seasons experience, go somewhere else. But if you want a fun and easy hotel in the middle of everything, stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We would like to thank you for taking the time to compliment the staff and the hotel.  Your feedback and comments are important to us, letting us know where we can improve or appreciate a job well done. Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with and we hope to see you soon.  Kind Regards,  Hotel Management

Summary: My 2 teens, wife and I visited Laguna Beach for the first time in June so we didn't know what to expect.  Long story short is I'm glad we picked the Holiday Inn!  It's close to everything you would want.  Although it's not on the beach it's only a block away!
Manager Response: Dear BriHols,         I am happy to hear that you and your family had a great stay at our hotel this Summer. I agree we may not be on the beach but we are close to everything in the area. I appreciate your compliments on our wonderful staff and our property. Thank you and we hope to have you all stay again soon. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Saved our trip! Great hotel and location!
Summary: Great location. Across the street from Cloe Street Beach. Nice hotel, clean and comfy. The staff has been AMAZING. We arrived late last night and after a reservation mishap on our part, we found that we did not have a reservation. Fortunately they had one room left. Sabiha at the front desk was so kind and helpful and took great care of us weary travelers (me and my 9 year old daughter.) thanks again Sabiha! The salt water pool was really nice especially after being at the beach all day. We will stay here again and again.   Now off in search of tacos!
Manager Response: Dear darrinofearth,         I am happy that we were able to accommodate you during this mishap in your trip. It's good knowing that you had a great time while at our property. We will be sure to let Sabiha know what a great job she has done. We hope you return for another great stay.Thank you for your feedback. Enjoy the tacos and we hope you have a great day.

Summary: Difficult to find great hotels in center of Laguna Beach. I very carefully had read the many negative reviews of most of the local "motel", as these are definitely not " hotels". It has been ages since I stayed in a motel with window A/C, noisy A/C, small rooms, etc.. But I am not complaining, as long as you know what you are getting. I am moving the next day to a super luxury hotel in expensive downtown LA, and this motel is more expensive. So now on to the positives: super friendly reception, free beverages in reception area, $15/day self park, two blocks from the center of Laguna Beach; across the street from the beach, right across the street from a Ralph's;etc. All positives. Small but nice pool. Very nice ( but, as told by locals, erratic) restaurant on premises- I did not
Manager Response: Dear Andre,          Thank you for your feedback on your stay with us. I appreciate you taking the time to let us know all aspects of your stay and that overall you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you come back to stay with us in the near future. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: We went and stayed at the Wynn in Vegas and then we decided to drive to San Diego but ended up staying at the Holiday Inn. Very impressed and the rooms were updated, the swimming pool and the Gazebo were amazing. Great service and in beatable pricing. We all loved it
Manager Response: Dear Rami,         Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback on your stay with us. Lucky for us you made a stop in Laguna and had a great time and enjoyed our hotel. We hope you come back again for another great stay should you find yourself in town again. I hope you enjoy your day and that we see you all again soon.

Summary Heading: Great value and charm - would come back
Summary: Really difficult to find affordable accommodation in the summer in Laguna beach but this is a gem. I would describe it somewhere between hotel and motel but everything worked well. Friendly staff and free water & popcorn, lemonade and coffee was a nice touch. Fantastic location too
Manager Response: Hello Gekko888,        I want to thank you for your high score on your recent stay with us. It feels great to know that you had a great time and enjoyed your accommodations at our hotel. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future. Thank you again and have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: The best hotel of our trip up the coast from SD to Ventura
Summary: From the moment we were greeted in the peaceful lobby to the moment we reluctantly packed our bags to go home, this hotel was a lovely place to stay and relax.  The lobby has fresh popcorn all day as well as nicely flavored water, sodas and coffee. The rooms are all arranged around a lovely pool area with beautifully tended flowers and live greenery.  We could not be happier.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,         My staff is very happy to hear that they played a part in making your stay with us so good that it was hard to leave. I'm delighted to hear that you enjoyed our property and our complimentary refreshments in our lobby.  We hope you come back for another great stay should you ever find yourself in Laguna. I hope you have a wonderful day and enjoy the rest of this hot Summer.

Summary: we stayed 7 days and had an absolutely fantastic time.the grounds were excellent and accommodations  superior.the staff was the most special thing about our stay.they were helpful,kind ,very knowledgeable about the area and all our needs.i would especially like to thank,Patty,Monika and Karen for all their help,concern and hard work on my families behalf,i would recommend this property to anyone who wants to stay in laguna beach or the surrounding areas.
Manager Response: Dear Hunter,       Thank you for your feedback! I am delighted to hear that you had a great time and that our staff made it extra special. It makes our staff happy to know that you and your family had a great time and would recommend our hotel to others. We hope you come back again for another amazing stay. In the meantime I hope you and your family enjoy the rest of your Summer.

Summary Heading: Perfect get a way and worth it!!!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Laguna Beach Holiday Inn so much. We come back every year because the property in just a fun place. The people who work there are so friendly and helpful. In the past few years Karen, Dylan, Sabiha, & Monica have been regulars at the front desk. They have always done such a great job and always make our stay more pleasant. I love the IHG brand, but this property is a well-kept secret for those who have never stayed. I‚Äôve never met the GM Nooshin, but one thing I do know is he hires well and has that place looking sharp. We will continue to come here for the beauty and for the AMAZING customer service that feels more like coming to see family. Being right across the street from Laguna Beach doesn‚Äôt hurt either. Getting ready to book here again and
Manager Response: Dear Ryan M,         Thank you so much for your great feedback on your recent experience with us at our hotel. It is great to know that our staff has been amazing in providing you with great service during your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit with us next year and appreciate your business. I hope you have a great day and enjoy the rest of your Summer.

Summary: Definitely one of the best holiday inns I've come across. Feels like your in a Spanish Villa- not too many rooms and a decent pool situated in the patio. Service is ok. Rooms are clean and staff was generally friendly. Great location walking distance to the beach, bars and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Toni B,        Thank you for taking the time to provide us with some feedback on your recent stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and our great location. We hope you come back for another stay. Thank you again and I hope you have a great day.

Summary: Very nice staff, go above and beyond. Rooms are very clean, very quaint. Across the street from a grocery store which is very helpful. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Complimentary drinks in the lobby, parking lot convenient.
Manager Response: Good morning ckmoffett,          Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your stay went. It's great to hear that our staff went above and beyond to help you during your stay with us and that you enjoyed our hotel and location. We do  hope that you come back for another great stay.

Summary: We were 3 60+ ladies. Reservations since April with rolleraway bed for 3rd person. Actually gave us mattress on the floor instead of rollaway bed. Had the nerve to say it was not guarenteed. Carpet is visibly dirty and they expect us to sleep on matress on the floor. They were kind enough to give us sheets and waived the extra charge. We had confirmed our reservations just 2 hours prior and they failed to tell us the bed was not available. If they had we would never have come for these conditions. Really surprised the health authorities will allow this!
Manager Response: Dear larskee,  Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay. It is regrettable the level of customer service and sofa bed you received fell below your expectations. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you had and would like to address this with you further. I have sent you a private message to obtain more information about your stay. I look forward to hearing from you and being of further assistance.  Sincerely,  Zelyn N Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Spent one night with my son as a side trip to our San Diego lacrosse tournament travel.  Did not realize it was a motel when booked. Nice.,but not special.  Rooms are small and could use a little TLC.    I put this as a nice and convenient 3.5 hotel. Staff was extremely nice.
Manager Response: Dear Curt A.,         Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at our hotel. I'm glad that you had a great experience with our staff and overall enjoyed your stay. Have a great day.

Summary: I was here on Saturday night.  The hotel shuttle van was on time for pickup and check in was quick and easy.   The front desk staff...nice.  The room was nice, beds comfortable, and the a/c worked great!  Close to the airport and the baseball stadium. I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Sharon,        Thank you for your feedback on your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you had a great stay and that our hotel location worked out perfectly for you. We look forward to having you stay at our hotel again in the near future. In the meantime enjoy the rest of your Summer.

Summary Heading: Great employees but rooms not comfy
Summary: Employees were all fantastic.  Parking good.  Location OK to downtown area but Very busy street with heavy fast traffic.   Beach accessed from across street is NOT where your family will want to hang out, it is narrow and sand not great. There are much better beaches in driving distance so the location isn't much benefit.  (Crescent Bay in LB or better Salt Creek Beach in Dana Point is excellent).  Pool area is nice but small.   Rooms are a big part of the low rating, first floor very dungeon-like feeling (humid and dark). Wouldn't stay here again for the price.
Manager Response: Dear MNtripper1972,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are pleased to know that you found our staff to be fantastic and our parking to be good. However, we would like to apologize for not living up to your expectations regarding our rooms and pool. We also regret the issues you had with our location. Reviews like yours are very valuable as they enable us to target areas we need to improve on. Rest assured your feedback will be forwarded to the appropriate departments for evaluation.  We value you as our guest and hope to accommodate you again for a chance to provide you with a much better experience.  Sincerely,  Joel A Case Manager IHGService

Summary Heading: Ok hotel close to the beach in a nice area
Summary: It is a standard hotel, perhaps a little to high price for the standard. No breakfast at all, which is standard for all hotels in Sweden. However we had a pretty large refrigerator where you can store your breakfast, especially with Ralph food store just across the street. As we were 2 adults and 2 children's there were not really any possibilities to unpack out baggage.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Anders,      Thank you for staying with us during your family trip. I'm glad you enjoyed the beautiful town of Laguna and had a great time by the beach. We appreciate your feedback and hope you have a great day.

Summary: We stay here for three nights. We showed up at 11 am and requested an early check in. Went to lunch walked the beach and about 2 hrs later we were relaxing in our room. The room was very nice. The location of the hotel is awesome. We ended up extending our stay for 2 more nights. Patty at the front desk was great. She took amazing care of us, was always friendly, and very efficient at her job. The only down side was the lack of vending machines, but they did offer free Coke and Diet Coke for free in the lobby. I am just not to fond of having to stroll through at 2 am in my pjs. All and all, wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ashlee,       Hope you are doing great and feel refreshed after your stay with us here in Laguna. I am proud that my staff went above and beyond and took good care of you during your trip. We hope that you come back again to stay with us soon. Thank you for your wonderful feedback and I hope you have a great day.

Summary: This hotel is not the greatest but any deficiencies are more than compensated by the friendly helpful staff and great position. The pool area is better than the pictures on the website show and whilst the rooms are a bit small and dark, they have everything you could wish for except a safe! However reception have a safe deposit and don't mind how often you use it. Wifi is excellent throughout the hotel and free. We stayed for just over a week whilst visiting family in Orange County and would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony,         I'm delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time at our hotel. I appreciate your recommendation of our hotel and hope that you will come back for more stays during family visits. Thank you for your feedback and I hope you enjoy your Summer. I hope you have a great day.

Summary: We were absolutely delighted with his hotel. It has a motel style layout but it feels more like a little oasis. The pool area is lovely with beautiful flowers and is so pretty in both the day and night. The staff are all very welcoming and the reception area is lovely with a roaring fire. The complimentary water, tea, coffee, soft drinks and popcorn are quite unique in California and a great little extra. The hotel is in a great location just across the street to the stunning beach and close to lovely restaurants and bars and Ralph's supermarket if you need to stock up on provisions. I would highly recommend this hotel and would definitely return. The only one downside was the air conditioning unit in the room was quite old fashioned and very noisy.
Manager Response: Dear Jane F,         It's great hearing that you had a great time while staying at our hotel. I agree the pool area is such a great place to relax and catch some sun and then head into town for some great food. One of my favorite things about Laguna is you can't go wrong with any of the restaurants. My staff and I look forward to having you as our guest again. Thank you for your feedback and enjoy your Summer.

Summary Heading: Quaint little hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: Great location - easy beach access, walk 5-10min and you are surrounded by shops (including a supermarket) and some of the best restaurants in the area. Quaint little beach hotel with good size rooms, comfortable beds and friendly service. Most (if not all) rooms open to the swimming pool and lush greenery.  AC was a bit noisy and I never got the TV to work. Wifi was good.
Manager Response: Dear k_in_NL,       Great food, beach and shopping. Sounds like a great way to relax and enjoy some time of relaxation.
