I'm happy to hear that you had a great time at our hotel and enjoyed the little town of Laguna. We hope you visit us again for more beach fun. Thank you for your feedback and I hope you have a great day.

Summary: Hotel was nice and staff were really nice, including the security guard monitoring the hotels parking lot. Room was small but pretty clean. Bed was comfortable. Location was the ultimate, grocery store, restaurants, beach, shopping and night life just a few steps away from the hotel. A gentleman ( from Texas) working at the hotels front desk recommended a restaurant-The Cliff, that was absolutely fantastic. Food was delicious, band playing was great and the view was so picture perfect. Watched the sun go down and enjoyed a wonderful dinner.    The reason I didn't rate the hotel five stars is because their was a little mold in the bathroom wall.  The popcorn, coffe and water by the front desk werent kept up and refilled for guests. The room rate was a bit high but I think it is
Manager Response: Dear Towana K,      Thank you very much for your valuable feedback. We appreciate hearing that you had a great time during your stay with us and that you had a comfortable stay. I agree the Cliff is great and since we are close to all the restaurants and shopping you have ease of access to try everything in town. I apologize about any inconveniences you may have experienced but hope that on your next visit it will be better than the last. Thank you again and I hope you have a great day.

Summary: Close to everything(Beach access, Downtown, Bars, and Great food around every corner) Very cozy, clean & inviting ! Great entry way ! Patty was great!!!!!!!!!! Very in formative Patient &  Helpful during our stay . Can't wait to come back .
Manager Response: Dear Ardonie,        Thank you very much for staying with us. We love to hear that you had a great time during your stay and that our staff was able to provide you with excellent service. We look forward to having you come back and stay with us for another great stay. In the meantime have a great day.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 10 nights and we're very pleased.  We found the hotel a good price compared to others in the area.  Location is good however we had a car so travelling around was not a problem. Located right by a grocery store which we found useful and a close walk to the beach and local shops  restaurants and galleries. The rooms were a little on the small side but clean and comfortable.  Bed was comfortable and bathroom clean and tidy.  Large TV with lots of channels and a decent size fridge.  Our room overlooked the pool area which  is pretty and quaint,  clean and tidy with free to use towels available.  The staff were friendly and approachable and happy to give advice on dining etc.  Would recommend to anyone staying in the area.
Manager Response: Hi Amy,        Thank you so much for your great feedback. My staff and I are happy to hear that you had a great stay at our hotel and enjoyed the town. I also appreciate the recommendation and hope that you will stay with us again in the near future. Thank you again and I hope you have a great weekend.

Summary Heading: Charming little place in a beautiful location
Summary: Lovely place, well maintained and a nice pool, plenty of parking. No breakfast but so many restaurants and cafes nearby to choose from. Across the road from the beach and about 10 minutes walk to the Laguna beach board walk. Would definitely recommend for a short stay. My only complaint would be the rooms are a little small.
Manager Response: Thank you Steve G for scoring us 5 stars. We are excited to hear that we are doing great and that you enjoyed your time while staying at our hotel. We appreciate your recommendation and hope that you will return as well. Have a great day Steve.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for two nights in preparation for our wedding day, so we booked a suite to ensure we had plenty of room. The room was a very cozy and spacious, it had a small fireplace in the living room area and the bath room was very large even containing a small hot tub.  All the rooms surrounded a very nice pool and gazebo area with lots of shade to sunbathe or just enjoy a few laps in the pool.  Getting in an out of the parking lot to your room was very easy also because there is an entry gate at every level of the inn, which made it easy to load and unload your car.  The staff was very courteous and got us everything we needed, even when our photographers asked for things that were out of the ordinary like opening a door that was bolted shut in our suite. We
Manager Response: Dear kchen83,        First and foremost congratulations on your big day. My staff and I are delighted to hear that we had a small part in making your wedding day as smooth as possible and that you and your husband had a great time during your stay at our hotel. Best wishes from us hear at Holiday Inn. Thank you and have a great Summer.

Summary: Working in Irvine for 6 days, staying in Laguna allowed me to escape the corporate environment and relax. Friendly staff and a nice pool aided in this. Rooms are comfortable without being deluxe. The restaurant is only open at weekends so that's not overly convenient.  But I enjoyed my stay and will return in May.
Manager Response: Dear Mike D,        I am happy to hear that we were able to help you relax after a long days work. I'm glad the rooms were comfortable and that you were able to soak up sun while lounging by our pool. We look forward to having you stay with us again in May. Thank you for your feedback and hope you have a great week.

Summary: Enjoyed two nights here. Very nice front staff great location across from the beach. Got upgraded to s suite. Fabulous room. Holiday Inn gets a bad rap as a budget place but this venue is a definite cut above the rest. And the staff could compete with the Ritz. First class all the way. Frankly the only hint of "Holiday Inn-ness" were the plastic cups in the room. Perhaps they should spring for glass. But truly that was minor. Great overall experience.
Manager Response: Hi Cynthia,        Thank you very much for the great compliments. It feels great to hear that our staff was exceptional and was able to make your stay excellent. I'm also glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and amenities. We look forward to your next stay with us for another great experience. Thank you again for the wonderful compliments I hope you have a great day.

Summary: Spent 5 nights at the HI Laguna Beach  We had a bit of an issue at check in. I did not get a room upgrade which disappointed me as an ambassador. They said that all suites were occupied for the next two days which could be understood in a hotel this small.  The first room we were checked into had an awful smell of vomit. Complaining to the front desk quickly resolved this as we were moved to another room that was fine.  Rooms are smallish and look dated. The wallpaper needs to be changed and the room given an update.  Everything else was amazing during our stay. The staff were very helpful and imparted a personal touch to the service. The complimentary snack bar in the lobby was a very nice touch. The building has a lovely boutique feel and the area around the pool is so pretty.
Manager Response: Dear Maher A,      Thank you for the compliments in regards to our property and our staff, we appreciate it. I am happy to hear that you overall had a great stay with us and enjoyed your time in Laguna. I hope you stay with us again in the near future for more beach fun. Have a great day.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived at the hotel it's small which is great and very pretty with lots of character!! everything you need on hand even complimentary drinks in the reception area. Rooms are nice and bathroom is lovely too we loved it here and you get free wifi, although parking is expensive @$15 per day which was the only downfall!! üôÅ
Manager Response: Dear F1087GXnicolas,         I am happy to hear that you were pleasantly surprised by our unique hotel. I agree it does have a lot of character and that I feel brings out its Laguna Beach charm. We hope you stay with us again soon. Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your stay. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: I was so impressed with how wonderful Dylan treated us I felt the need to give him a 5 star review.  I travel often and rarely have I been treated with such genuine kindness. This hotel is very lucky to have him! Thx! Great Italian restaurant downstairs as well! Yummy food and great service there as well!
Manager Response: Dear DanvilleShelli,        We love to hear that our staff has made a great impression on our guests. Dylan is a great asset to our team and I will definitely let him know of your kind feedback and to keep up the great work. I am very happy to hear that you had a great time at our hotel and we hope to have you stay with us again in the near future. Have a wonderful day and thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: If I could give this hotel 6 stars, I would.  Location, clean, amenities and staff, all superb!
Summary: This hotel is pretty much perfect, especially the for great price.  1. The staff was amazing.  The front desk folks are so friendly that it feels like they know you before you even say hi. 2. The location is incredible.  It is right in the heart of Laguna Beach and all the main attractions are a 5-10 minute walk from here.  The beach is also one (1) block away.  Unless you need to get out of town, don't bother renting a car when you stay here, you can walk.  3. There is no included breakfast, but who cares, across the street is the Orange Inn, where you should be eating breakfast anyways. 4. The hotel is a neat courtyard design with a beautiful pool and seating area. 5. The lobby has unlimited water, soda, coffee, tea and popcorn. 6. The shower had wonderful water pressure. 7.
Manager Response: Dear psudino,         That is quite the compliment. Thank you very much for your positive feedback on your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear that you had an excellent stay and enjoyed every moment of your trip and by the sound of it we will be having you as our guest again soon. My staff and I look forward to being of services and making your next trip around even better. Thank you again and I hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: This is a great hotel, you forget your in a Holiday inn
Summary: I stay at Holiday Inn's a lot in fact I'm a platinum elite member.... at least I'm elite somewhere lol. My company always stays here in Laguna Beach too when we do west coast meetings, as they all live in Florida.  This is a great hotel, you forget your in a Holiday inn. it has a New Orleans theme around the rooms and the pool. They also have 4 suites with Jacuzzi tubs and fireplaces too. Its close to the beach just a walk across PCH and you are there. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel itself has a lively and warm homey vibe to it, The restaurant is a hit or miss weather its open or not. but there is a lot to choose from right up the street.  This hotel is our favorite place to stay for getaways in the OC too.  The rooms are well kept and nice and we've
Manager Response: Dear Jim,       Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us at our hotel. It is always a pleasure to hear what a great experience our guests have had and that our staff was helpful. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. I hope you get to enjoy spring break. Until next time, have a great day.

Summary Heading: Great little boutique hotel near everything
Summary: I don't stay hat Holiday Inn properties very often, but I decided to stay in Laguna Beach at the spur of the moment and found this little gem.  I only stayed there one night but it was very pleasant.  It is a courtyard designed hotel with a nice pool in the middle of the hotel.  The staff was great and the rooms were clean, quiet, and safe.  I recommend this hotel if you want to be close to everything at Laguna Beach (except the noise).
Manager Response: Dear David,        I am happy to hear that you took a chance with our hotel and enjoyed your time here.  I appreciate the recommendation and hope that you will also be back for more beach fun. Thank you for staying with us and I hope you enjoy the rest of your day.

Summary: Was in Ca for business but stayed one night here in Laguna Beach. Reasonable price to stay right across the street from the ocean. This is more like a "boutique" hotel than what you would normally expect a "Holiday Inn" hotel to look like. It's small and quaint. The center atrium has a pool, a gazebo and lots of pretty flowers. The rooms are on the smaller side but very clean and the furniture is newer. The staff was extremely helpful and pleasant. The lobby has fresh coffee, water, soda, lemonade and popcorn available 24/7.  The location can't be beat. Your across the street from the ocean and there are lots of restaurants within walking distance.  Will definitely stay again next opportunity I get to spend some time in beautiful Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Michele C,        Thank you for staying with us on your business trip. It's great to hear that you had a great time and that you enjoyed our decor. We hope that you continue to stay with us for any visit in the near future. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Good location but rooms need upgrading
Summary: I stayed two nights there at the end of my holidays in California. The rooms are on the small side and are quite dated. The insulation is poor and the bathroom very basic.  I did not eat there so cannot comment on the food. The hotel courtyard is very pretty with exotic plants around the pool and the building has character which is the main attraction of this hotel in my opinion.  The staff were friendly and helpful. We had to pay an extra $15 a day to park our car in the hotel car park which seemed you unreasonable.  The location is very good as walking distance to the town centre and the beach. I am not sure I would go back there though.
Manager Response: Dear Christel88_13,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel. Our goal is to deliver exceptional service and superior accommodation to all of our guests and we appreciate your business with us. It is nice to know that the courtyard of the property is well to your liking and regarded our friendly and helpful staff. However, it is regrettable if you found the rooms and amenities dated. Your feedback is of great importance to us and allows us to monitor and improve the quality of our amenities and facilities we offer. Rest assured this matter will be forwarded to the hotel management for evaluation and will be a tool for an upgrade.  Once again, thank you for your review and we hope that you would consider staying with us again in order to show our improvements.  Sincerely,  Grace P. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: I've stayed here twice. Nice rooms, quaint hotel, pool in the centre courtyard, great Italian restaurant attached. It's a small little hotel, slightly dated but very nice and also clean. Staff are great. 5 minute walk to the beach, park, shops and restaurants. Big parking lot attached. The hotel just doesn't have a view of the water or beach etc.
Manager Response: Dear Mitch L,         I am happy to hear that you enjoy your stay with us at our hotel. We appreciate your continued loyalty and look forward to many more stays to come. Thank you and have a great day.

Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay in Laguna Beach.  The prices are reasonable.  It has a lovely ambiance with flowers and greenery all around.  The rooms are small, but very clean with comfortable beds and updated bathrooms.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  There is free water, sodas and popcorn in the lobby, and convenient parking.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Msenergy,          Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your recent stay with us was. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed our courtyard and all the wonderful trees and flowers. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed the snacks we have in the lobby for you. We look forward to your next stay with us. Have a great day.

Summary: I had noticed this hotel in the past and decided to try it as the location is ideally situated in Laguna Beach. We were warmly welcomed by the manager Karen who made us feel at home and offered many suggestions for dining. The room was small but clean despite the hotel being a little "dated". It had a nice pool in the center courtyard and small touches like pop, coffee and popcorn are available 24/7. There is a fantastic restaurant across the street for breakfast and lots of other restaurant choices within walking distance.Beach access is also directly adjacent to the hotel. Overall a good valued hotel in a great location.
Manager Response: Dear NewmarketWally,       I appreciate you taking the time to write us a review on your recent stay with us. I am happy that you decided to stop by and take a chance on us and find that you were pleasantly surprised. Karen is a great employee and it's great to hear that you were happy with her service. We look forward to your next visit when you are in town. Thank you for your feedback and hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Convenient to main street, Coast Highway, and a short walk to access the beach.  Nice pool in central courtyard and convenient parking with a fee.  Staff are pleasant and helpful.  Great spot for breakfast across the road.
Manager Response: Dear Edmonton,        Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that the location and our hotel was to your liking. We hope that you can stay with us again the next time you are in town. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Our go to hotel when visiting Laguna
Summary: We love the Laguna Beach Holiday Inn!  This is our go to place whenever we visit Laguna.  It's clean, the rooms are nice, king size beds are very comfortable, the salt water pool is great, but one of the best things about this place is the the wonderful staff.    Monica at the front desk is the BEST!  She is so friendly and helpful, always greeted us with a smile and didn't mind taking time out of her busy schedule to chat with us.  Thanks for another wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne,          Thank you for taking the time to give us a little feedback on your recent stay with us. I'm happy to hear that we are your go to hotel when in town and that you find our hotel comfortable. My staff and I love our regulars. Monica is a great worker and I appreciate your compliments. We look forward to the next time you are in town. Until then have a great day.

Summary Heading: Three day visit to Laguna beach
Summary: Lovely hotel and staff are very helpful. Ran into a check in problem, Sabina the manager rectifed my problem with prompt attention. Hotel is very clean pool area is also very nice. I looked at other hotels compared prices this one came up on top. You will enjoy your stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Irishdance3,            I am happy to hear that my front desk staff was able to take good care of you during your check in. We like to make it as easy as possible during your travels. We hope you return to our hotel for more stays. Thank you for your feedback and I hope you have a great day.

Summary: The hotel and the surroundings are great. The hotel has a friendly atmosphere and helpful staff.  It¬¥s located near the lovely beach, there are some great restaurant nearby and not far away from the mountain there you can take a lovely morning walk. The rooms at the hotel are comfortable, clean and have a good standard. The cleaning is excellent. I really recommended this hotel for others visitors in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Pia,        I am happy to hear that you had a great time at our hotel and had a chance to try the local cuisine. Laguna is such a beautiful little town to take a walk and enjoy the sights. It is great to hear that you would recommend us to future guests and I look forward to having you stay at our hotel as well. Thank you for your feedback and I hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay at close to the beach.
Summary: I like the hotel because they have clean and nice rooms, it situated close to the beach, food shop and main street restaurants.  The area around the hotels pool is nice and a welcoming place to to gather friends and family at.
Manager Response: Dear Karin,         Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. It is great to hear that you had a great time at our hotel and enjoyed our location. I look forward to having you stay again at our hotel for more great memories. I hope you have a great day.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel for more than a week more or less every year since 2001. It's a nice and charming hotel with perfect location, great atmosphere and a wonderful staff. I can really recommend it. Bj√∂rn S
Manager Response: Hi Bjorn,           As always my staff and I love having you and your colleagues stay with us. It is always a pleasure and refreshing to see familiar faces. I thank you for choosing to stay with us all these years. My team and I look forward to seeing you all again next year. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: A very nice, warm and welcoming athmosphere. The staff was very helpful. The standard of the room was excellent. The cleaning was very good. I can gladly recommend this lovely hotel! I hope to come back sometime.
Manager Response: Dear Jenny,          Thank you very much for your feedback on your recent stay. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to having you as our guest again next year. Hope you have a great day.

Summary: I¬¥ve stayed at this hotel for the last 15 years - 10 days per stay. Always with a larger group and we love its atmosphere, location and building. You can gather as a group by the pool and enjoy. You live close in a "rectangle" and everyboday is in.
Manager Response: Dear Jimmy,         As always it is our greatest pleasure to have you and your team stay at our hotel. Every year we look forward to catching up and seeing how you are all doing. I appreciate your wonderful feedback and look forward to having you all next year. Thank you very much and have a wonderful day.

Summary: Perfect location. Staff was wonderful. Popcorn in lobby was delicious. Only reason I held back 5th star was the blower in the HVAC unit in the room was too loud. I am in the biz so it drove me nuts. They should put some ductless mini splits in these rooms. They would pay for themselves in 18 months on energy savings. Don't like paying for parking either but still a good deal compaired to neigboring places.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald R,            I want to thank you for your much appreciated feedback as it helps us improve. It is great that you stayed with us during your business trip and overall enjoyed your stay. Our staff will be happy to hear that they did a great job and that you enjoyed our amenities in the lobby. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Location and service you can't beat!
Summary: This hotel is our favorite place to stay for getaways in south OC. The location is great and right next to beach with easy access to everywhere. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel itself has a lively and warm vibe, specially the central courtyard is a unique feature not found in many places. The rooms are well kept and nice and we've never had any issues staying here.  I highly recommend Holiday Inn Laguna Beach and am sure you will enjoy your stay here as much as we've always done!
Manager Response: Dear Mazyar,        Thank you very much for your wonderful review on your recent stay with us at our hotel here in Laguna Beach. It feels great to read reviews such as yours and knowing that we are doing a great job. We recently updated our room furniture and it is exciting that you noticed the upgrade. I also appreciate the recommendation to potential guests. We look forward to having you stay at our hotel again and hope that you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Excellent location. Parked our car on arrival and walked to all of our destinations in Laguna.  Great restaurants and galleries close by.  Quiet room with nice pool and attentive staff.  Have stayed there two years in a row and were not disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Chuck,            It is good to hear that you enjoyed your time at our hotel during your trip. It is rewarding to know that you continue to stay with us while in town. The restaurants in the area are amazing as well as all the talented artists and art galleries. We are delighted that you enjoy our hotel and look forward to having you as our guests next year. Thank you for your feedback and hope you have a wonderful evening.

Summary: This property is another one that we use every summer for our family vacation.  The overall expereince has been great every time.  We like the friendly staff, location and proximity to beach, resturants and most of all the service which is provided as a part of our stay.  Rooms are clean and comfortable and the property is very well maintained and updated.  Going back again next year!
Manager Response: Dear David T,           Your feedback was very rewarding to read. It feels good to know that you and your family vacation with us every year. From the beach across the street to the nearby restaurants, I agree that our location is great. Thank you for your feedback and the wonderful compliments. Our friendly staff will always be here to welcome you back on your next trip. Hope you have a great weekend.

Summary: I like that the hotel is laid out like a courtyard with the pool in the middle, that made it feel a little more private. There is lots of wrought iron & hanging flowers that reminded me of New Orleans a little bit.  I had a little bit of trouble finding the front desk to check in because the parking is in the rear and you have to walk up the street to the corner, then walk up stairs to the lobby. Our room was nice & looked like it had been updated recently. The room was very clean, quiet, the bed was comfortable & the bathroom area very spacious. The TV was really big & there was a good size fridge inside the TV hutch. The TV remote didn't work & the cable remote wasn't programmed for the TV so I went up to the front desk & they put new batteries in it plus gave me an extra
Manager Response: Dear Leslie G,         I am very happy to read that you noticed our room upgrades. We are all very excited about the updates and its exciting when our guests notice. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful decor around the property. We often hear that our property has a New Orleans vibe which is wonderful since I hear that it is a beautiful city. I look forward to having you stay with us again and I hope that it will be easier to navigate through our hotel down to our lobby. Thank you again Leslie for your feedback and hope to see you back again soon. Have a great weekend.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel in the heart of Laguna Beach
Summary: My family adored this three story hotel. It is one of the most unique hotels we have stayed in. The hotel has a courtyard inside of the hotel featuring a pool for all ages, a beautiful white gazebo perfect for a wedding or reading a book since it is lit up with tiny white lights at night and surrounded by  beautiful plants and flowers in the day. Our hotel room was right across from the gate entering into the courtyard so we had a beautiful view of the courtyard. We enjoyed a lovely walk from our hotel to the tide pools of Laguna Beach. On our way back from the tide pools and playing at the beach we visited the many art galleries in Laguna Beach. Mind you my children are 7 and 11 and they loved them all! We are what Californians would call a "redneck" family yet they made us
Manager Response: Dear RPittman,          I want to thank you for your wonderful review on your recent stay at our hotel. My staff and I do pride ourselves on keeping our property as up with the times as possible while preserving her beautiful age. It brings a smile to our faces when we read rewarding reviews such as these. We look forward to having you and your family stay again. Until then, have a wonderful weekend.

Summary: Nice hotel.  Great location.  Walking distance to everything. Clean rooms with comfortable beds and nice bedding.  Great shower but the water pressure could have been better.    Beautiful courtyard and pool area.  Nice lobby.  Free popcorn, soda, coffee and bottled water in the lobby were a nice touch.  Hotel staff was very friendly.  Prices were high for what it was but it was summer in Laguna.   Ralph‚Äôs is located across the street for anything else you need.  The on-site restaurant, Mare Culinary Lounge, is a great find.  We went to the chef‚Äôs other restaurant called Alessa not knowing that Mare Culinary Lounge was the same chef and pretty much the same menu.  If you are staying at the hotel be sure to give it a try.
Manager Response: Dear Christyreznor02,           Where did Summer go? Feels like it went by really quick but I am happy you were able to enjoy a couple of days with us. I appreciate your compliments on our comfy beds and complimentary refreshments in our lobby. We hope you come back again for another enjoyable stay. Thank you for your feedback and hope you enjoy the rest of your day.

Summary: This was our third year spending our hard earned iHG reward points on holiday at this hotel and we still feel the same about it. The hotel has much more character than the usual Holiday Inn and the restful, beautiful planting surrounding the pool (which is a perfectly reasonable size for a cool dip on a hot day) really makes it. As before, the rooms were comfortable with great beds and the free coffee and snacks in the reception area are really useful when dealing with emails early in the morning to catch UK business hours.  As before, the service was impeccable. I would once again thoroughly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jon_mort,         It is great to be able to see some familiar faces every year. I am happy to know that you still are pleased with our hotel over the years. As always we appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your next visit. Thank you for your feedback and we'll see you soon.

Summary: After 2 long intercontinental flights, delay at rent a car at LAX my family and I (5) arrived at hotel at 11.30PM, to be told by reception garanteed reservation (with cc) had not been held due problem with that credit card. Basically cannot help you was their reply, internet was not available in hotel at the time, help to find hotel at midnight to accomodate my family was not given.  I had to use my overseas mobile (at high rate) to call myself to reservations and was able, after 38min to get 2 rooms 122 miles away (INDIO) from Laguna Beach (due Saturday night, hotels very full booked up to LAX).  Next day we used most of the day to fight the traffice bach to the coast, gave up after 3 hours, continued to next destination and gave up our first day of family holiday, whilst
Manager Response: Dear Chris3436,         I am sorry to hear that you encountered a problem trying to stay with us during your vacation.  As per guaranteed policy for all hotels, a valid credit card number is needed on the day of arrival, otherwise, we will not be able to hold the room. Considering, for that weekend as you mentioned everywhere was sold out within a 100 miles with high demand on rooms and it will be  a loss of revenue if we hold the reservation without a guarantee for payment. As a courtesy we did try to authorize your card since noon and even called the credit card company for further assistance but unfortunately they declined to further assist us. I do hope that you can  please give us another chance on your next vacation because our number 1  rating is our customer service and we would be happy to have you stay as our guests. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

Summary: My boyfriend and I were planning on staying in Laguna for only one night but decided to stay another night and were forced to find another hotel. We came across the Holiday Inn and decided to stay here because of the price (compared to nearby hotels this is definitely on the more reasonably priced side). We were not expecting much but the room was actually very nice and had modern touches which worked well for the two of us! The location is just pristine as well; literally a block and a few steps down to the beach, minutes away from restaurants, and is across the street from a grocery store. I would recommend this hotel because of the affordable price and the location to nearby eateries and sceneries.
Manager Response: Dear Kristina,         I'm happy to hear that we were able to accommodate you both and have a nice cozy room for you to stay. I appreciate you recommending our hotel not only for the price but for a good stay. We hope you come back again to enjoy a couple more days of relaxation. Thank you and have a great day.

Summary: This is by far the best holiday inn that I have ever stayed in.When you walk in they have free popcorn,lemonade,coke and more.The front desk staff was very helpful and fast.The rooms were the most updated and clean rooms I have ever seen at the holiday inn.The walk to the beach is a few minutes and the grocery store which is great if you want to have a picnic.
Manager Response: Hello AM2255,           Thank you for the amazing compliments on our staff and our hotel. I appreciate your feedback on your recent stay and were happy to hear that overall everything was great. I hope that means that you will be back again for another stay soon. We did recently update our rooms and are excited about the new look. The grocery store across the street is great and very convenient for picnic snacks. The next visit will be even more amazing. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Family oriented, large rooms, good location
Summary: The hotel courtyard has a nice tropical look about it.  The beach is very close, downtown is close enough to walk at 1/2 mile, and is also accessible by trolley.  There is a grocery store right across the street and a fridge in the room.  There were a few rooms in the hotel that were directly under the walkway for rooms on the 3rd floor and unfortunately I was in one of them.  For the first 20 minutes of our stay there were kids running and pounding above our room but after I complained the manager went up to speak with the culprits' father right away who denied it, but things quieted down considerably after that and we had a nice stay.  So I would say the room you're given here could have an impact on your experience but I appreciate the professionalism of the staff in
Manager Response: Dear Natsmavenus,         I hope you are nice and relaxed after enjoying a couple of days at the beach and our hotel. I couldn't agree more that our location is great. We have a grocery store across the street for easy pickings on food, and the beach just across the street. I do apologize about the noise but good thing we were able to get that under control. We do hope that you come and stay with us again in the near future. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Great except for noisy air conditioning t
Summary: Almost everything is terrific about this hotel, except for the in-window air conditioning. It was noisy and both of us had a bad night of sleep. To be fair we wanted to get on the road around 5 am so we might have been hyper sensitive.  Other then that we really enjoyed this hotel and recommend it. We were pleasantly greeted by a super friendly front desk lady at 11am in the morning. She had no room available and let us check into it, which was very much appreciated! It allowed us to park our car and get our luggage out of the hot car. It's a 3 story hotel which is built around a pool and common area. The only downside was no elevator so luggage had to be manhandled between our ground floor room and the parking lot. They had complimentary beverages in the lobby, which also was
Manager Response: Dear Guest,         Thank you for taking the time to provide us a review and for appreciating the complimentary guest appreciation refreshments that we offer in the lobby. I do apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced and that you didn't get a good nights rest. I will have our head maintenance look at the a/c units to ensure that everything is running smoothly. But all in all it feels good to hear that you enjoyed the rest of the hotel and your time with us. I hope that you can give us a second chance and come back for a better nights rest. I hope you have a wonderful day and enjoy the rest of your Summer.

Summary Heading: A great family place to stay
Summary: I have absolutely no complaints about this hotel. The rooms were comfortable with a refrigerator and coffee service. The pool area and grounds are pretty with many flowers. The hotel staff is friendly and helpful. Right across the street is Ralph's grocery store so if you need anything it is very convenient. The shuttle is on the same block so getting to the main beach is not a problem. Parking for your car is $15 a day.
Manager Response: Hello Rosemommy1955,          Thank you for taking the time to write us a review.  I appreciate the positive feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel. Everything is conveniently located and we love Ralph's too. The  trolley is awesome. It gives me time to enjoy the view of our artsy town. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon. Enjoy the rest of you Summer.

Summary: Went with two girlfriends for a two day vacation because we wanted to see Pageant of the Masters which was magnificent.  The room was very clean but small.  Area was well kept.  Staff was very helpful and pleasant.  Great pool area for the kids.  Very conveniently located to take trolleys, walk to the beach and shopping.  A nice little unexpected amenity was the bottled water, popcorn, and coffee in the lobby.  For the price, you can't beat it.  Thanks for a fun trip.
Manager Response: Hello Rhonda,             Thank you for sharing some feedback on your recent stay with us. It's good knowing that you and your friends had a great time at the Pageant. I keep hearing great things about this years show. I'm happy to hear that you had a chance to enjoy our pool and the rest of our property.We look forward to your next visit when your in town. Enjoy the rest of your Summer!

Summary: We loved our overnight here!  The staff was very friendly and helpful and the flowers and plants make this property look amazing,  We had a short delay at checkin, but the kids enjoyed the free fresh popcorn in the lobby while we waited.  This is an older property but has been well maintained and kept nice.  My son didn't want to leave.  This was our tired time here and we plan to return next year.
Manager Response: Hello Lfpdad,          Thank you for your continued loyalty. We appreciate the fact that you keep coming back and have had a great experience on each of your stays. My staff and I appreciate the compliments on our property. We do our best to keep it looking beautiful and welcoming. The popcorn in the lobby is very tempting and satisfying for a quick snack and all the kids love it. I look forward to your next visit in the near future and best wishes to you and your family. See you next Summer!

Summary: Very friendly, helpful and efficient front desk service with complimentary water, coffee and sodas. The pool area is well vegetated and has a European charm, unexpected in a Holiday Inn. Great location with very easy access to the beach and town. Room was comfortable but the only negative was an odor in the lower level bedroom (maybe from a pet) otherwise the rating would be even higher.
Manager Response: Dear skibeach19,            Thank you for your wonderful compliments. I know my staff will appreciate your acknowledgment of their efforts in making your stay better. The European charm of the hotel does whisk you away at times. Sometimes I forget I am still in Laguna. We hope you come back again for a return visit in the near future. With the heat that we have been having a dip in the beach never sounded better. In the meantime I hope you enjoy the rest of your Summer.

Summary Heading: Great spot close to the beach
Summary: I really enjoyed our stay at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach. We went for one night as a mini-vacay, and it definitely met, and in some ways exceeded our expectations. I particularly liked the tropical vibe in the courtyard where the pool is, as well as the location a very short block and beautiful steep staircase to the beach, while also being right in the center of town. I also appreciate the attention to comfortable beds and pillows at the Holiday Inn. Although I would have loved a view of the ocean, and considered paying $200 more for one of the hotels just across the street with ocean views, the lure of a good night's sleep was too much.   Seemed very family friendly, if you're into that, as there was a steady stream of about 2-3 kids in the pool at any given moment having a
Manager Response: Dear Nadiabear,            I completely agree with you about the beds and am glad to hear that you enjoyed a good nights sleep during your stay with us. It is nice to hear that you both were able to relax and enjoy our garden and pool area during your mini getaway. The tropical vibe does help get into the relaxation mode and from what it sounds like you were able to do just that. Thank you for taking your time to give us some feedback, we appreciate it. My staff and I look forward to your return visit and hope it's not too long before your back and relaxing pool side on your next mini vacation. Enjoy the rest of your Summer.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay. Thank you Monica and Patty :)
Summary: We loved our stay at Holiday Inn. The girls at the front desk were precious. Thank you Monica and Patty :) They took good care of us and were happy to do so. We love Laguna Beach. We needed two rooms to house our family and loved every minute of our stay. The grounds are beautiful, parking was a cinch, and the rooms are clean and roomy enough. The free water, soda and popcorn was a plus. It is located right in the middle of all the action so either way you go there is something to enjoy and a 5 minute walk to main beach and downtown. Loved our stay. Thank you again!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Bridget,            Thank you so much for your wonderful compliments. It was our pleasure to assist you and your family. I am thrilled to hear that you all had a great stay and we hope that you will be back again so we can hear more of your wonderful adventures. I hope you all are doing great and enjoy the rest of your Summer, take care.

Summary: Ok.  This hotel was recommended to me by a friend who had stayed here a couple times.  She gave it rave reviews.  Well I have never been to Laguna Beach and would love to return but I doubt I will be staying here again.  First off, on the website it states that "Kids Eat Free".  It also states that they serve breakfast, lunch and dinner.  Neither is true.  My friend had told me prior to me booking that this is all true.  Upon arrival we discovered that there is no breakfast or lunch served there.  There also was a big sign in the front of the restaurant that stated "Breakfast is served".  I couldn't believe it.  We picked this hotel for one of the main reasons for the kids eating free. Anyway, we spoke with the front desk and a manager came to us and credited my account for $25
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Please accept our apology again since our restaurant is in the process of refreshing their look and needed to be closed during the morning time and this information is posted on our website but I will double check it again. As you've mentioned, we did credit your stay appropriately for the number of kids you had and more for the breakfast time and I did check and saw your restaurant bill was credited also for dinner time but if you don't see this credit, please let us know and we will take care of it right away. We are also glad that you decided to join the IHG reward program because it has a lot of benefit and one of them is a late check out if available. Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and hope to see you soon.

Summary: The hotel looks even better than on the pictures provided. The architectural style and the lush gardens inside make you feel like you're at a Mexican hacienda, not in a Holiday Inn.  From the outset, staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel offers soft-drinks in cans, other refreshments, coffee and popcorn all for free to grab in the lobby, I loved that.  The location is great, about 2 minutes walk from the next beach, about 10 minutes to Laguna Beach's main beach. Basically all good restaurants and bars are within a 10 minute radius as well.   If you prefer to stay at the hotel and not go on the beach, the hotel offers a well sized pool. It probably could get crowded, but it never got crowded during my stay. Towels and sunbeds are provided, and the pool is quite deep,
Manager Response: Dear ElToroN3gro,           Thank you so much for your wonderful review and scoring us 5 stars. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities that our hotel had to offer. From the location to our staff and everything in between we are happy to know that we were able to help make your stay more enjoyable. We look forward to your next stay with us and hope you have a wonderful weekend.

Summary Heading: Cute as it looked in pictures, and super-short walk to the beach.
Summary: It was super easy to find, although hard to pull into short term spot to get inside for check in.  Parking lot seemed safe as did hotel.  The courtyard style was nice.  The location this hotel to be at the intersection where there is also Ralphs grocery and the coffee shop is PERFECT.  It was such an easy walk to other establishments as well as the beach that I 100% recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Laguna Beach.  The complementary bottles of water, cokes and popcorn were a nice treat, too. The ladies behind the desk were very nice too, and helpful in recommending some spots to visit when I asked.  They didn't seem rushed or hurried and seem to enjoy the area themselves.
Manager Response: Dear Julie B.,          Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. I have to admit we do love Laguna, especially on those hot summer days, the beach breeze is refreshing and welcomed. I appreciate your kind comments in regards to our property. My staff and I do our best to keep the grounds well kept for our guests so you can relax by our garden or just to soak up some sun by the pool. I'm happy to know that you also enjoyed our amenities and location. My staff and I love to help our guests and its great to know that you felt comfortable and welcomed to ask us any questions. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Good hotel within easy walking distance of Downtown
Summary: Very easy to find as it's on the PCH and it's only a 10-15min walk into the centre of town.  Room was comfortable and ample for our needs, a good size fridge in the room for beers etc.   As with many hotels in the US there is no in-room safety deposit box but reception do have one where you can leave valuables.  Complimentary tea/coffee/soft drinks and popcorn are also available in the reception area.  The reception staff gave us a good old Californian welcome and were very friendly.  We have friends who live nearby so we hooked up with them for drinks and food. I would recommend Lumberyard for dinner, very good value and selection of appetizers and mains - I had the Alaskan Salmon with a honey glaze and it was delicious. There were four of us and the total bill came to $200
Manager Response: Dear AngloLargs,          Sounds to me like you had a wonderful trip. It is good to hear that you enjoyed yourself at our hotel and our complimentary amenities. Our location is one of the our prized features since it is walking distance to the downtown area, across the street from the beach, and within 10 minute proximity to all  the local shops and restaurants in Laguna. We look forward to your next trip and hope you stay with us again. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Well worth a visit. A great location & you are guaranteed a warm Welcome. Easy walking distance to beach & restaurants. Plenty of parking. Breakfast served just over the road - simply awesome.  I'd visit again. Hot coffee served complimentary - from 5am :-)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive feedback on your recent experience at our hotel. Our staff prides itself in making sure our guests have a great time and feel welcomed. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary refreshments in the lobby and the ease of access to all of Laguna from our location.  We look forward to your next visit and have a wonderful day.

Summary: i recently decided to stay the night at this hotel with my husband for our anniversary and this was a great experience. The staff was fantastic and went above and beyond to help us with our wishes. The rooms were very clean and nice. I would definitely recommend this hotel !!! it has a great location and very romantic and cozy
Manager Response: Dear Behnaz M,          Thank you for choosing our hotel to celebrate your anniversary. Congratulations by the way. Thank you for complimenting our staff and their service, they really do do their best to make all of our guests feel comfortable during their stay at our hotel.I'm happy to hear that you found our rooms to be nice, clean and cozy and that you both had a great time. We look forward to your next visit and thank you for the feedback. Have a great day.

Summary: My wife and I were staying in San Diego and decided to visit a friend in Laguna over memorial weekend. We were lucky to find a room here and enjoyed our one night stay. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The staff was friendly and the parking was convenient. I would revisit this place.
Manager Response: Dear Cooter070767,           Spur of the moment adventures often lead to some of the best times. It's good to hear you and your husband had a great time visiting some friends. I'm happy to know that you enjoyed our hotel and that you may return for another stay. Keep us in mind if you find yourself on another spur of the moment trip to Laguna. Have a great day and thank you for taking the time to write us a review.

Summary: We stay annually at the location. You cannot beat the value, the location and the very nice staff. They offer free soft drinks and water as well as fresh popcorn. One major suggestion, do not stay in any second floor room under the suites on the 3rd floor. We heard clumping elephant like foot steps all night. Sounded kind of like people jumping off a chair or bed. So stick with the second floor rooms with nothing above you and you will be very happy with your stay. The beach is right across the street too.
Manager Response: Dear Shawn M,            Thank you for being a loyal guest of ours over the years and for taking the time to provide us with some feedback. I'm happy to hear that you have a great time during your stays at our hotel. I appreciate all of your feedback because we like to use it to improve for even better and memorable experiences. I would like to apologize for the noise complaint and hope that on your next visit it will be even better than the last. We look forward to your next stay and hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Then stay here. Our room just felt moist. Even with a/c on the room had that mildewy moldy smell. Asked for a new room and it was the same exact thing.  Had a hard time trying to sleep because of the underlying smell but there was nothing that could have been done. They trick you in lobby with that white tea room spray. But not the rooms. Great location but bad rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Hessam V,          Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear that our hotel did not meet your expectations and for the inconvenience it may have caused but it is good to know that our staff did try to help. I want you to rest assured that your concerns have been noted and thank you for taking the time to bring it to our attention. We hope you can give us a second chance for a better experience should you find yourself in Laguna. Have a great day.

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to many of the shops, galleries and of course the beach. We got a good deal on Expedia but heard the prices go up to 300$ and more in high season. Ouch!   The staff is friendly and they offer newspaper, coffee, tea, waters and soda for free. Rooms are clean but a bit dated and are very average. We had two double beds and we felt very crowded in the room. Rooms are dark too as not a lot of sunlight comes through. Furniture old and big for the room, though they were in process of exchanging furniture. There is a decent size fridge in the room which I usually appreciate but in this instance would have preferred the room.   It appears they updated bath and we enjoyed large shower with decent water pressure.   If you can get a decent price and
Manager Response: Dear NikShim,           Thank you for writing us a review on your recent stay with us, we appreciate your feedback. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself during your stay and took advantage of our location. It really does give you ease of access to the town of Laguna Beach and the ocean, which is just across the street. The complimentary refreshments is our treat as a thank you to you for staying with us. I am sorry to hear that our rooms did not meet your expectations but as you know we are in the process of updating our rooms for a fresher look. We hope that you stay with us again for a second chance at a better impression. Thank you again, and I hope you have a great day.

Summary: This is a great Spanish colonial style hotel. It has a vibe of having been around for decades, yet has been tastefully updated.  We had room 27 right outside the pool (great pool btw).  There is a grocery store right next door, and the secluded beach access just across the street.  Front desk staff were awesome. Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Bernie G,           Thank you very much for your wonderful compliments. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed yourself during your stay with us and that we were able to provide you with excellent customer service. The pool is great and I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed it too. The surrounding garden does give a peaceful atmosphere when relaxing. We look forward to your next visit for another great beach trip.

Summary Heading: A comfortable hotel for a beach vacation
Summary: We try to stay here when we visit the community of Laguna Beach.  Our adult children and our small grandsons have also been very pleased with this choice.  Very clean, charming and accommodating. Walk across the street to the ocean and many choices for eating. Nearby parks and shopping too.
Manager Response: Dear caroleann73112,           Thank you for your review on your recent stay at our Holiday Inn in Laguna. We appreciate you coming to stay with us every chance that you get when you are in town. It's great to hear that you and your family like returning to our hotel for some great family time. The parks that are close by are beautiful to take a walk and take in the scenery. We look forward to your next stay with us and hope you have a great day.

Summary: The staff is great and excellently accommodating.  The hotel has a great vibe and we love to find nostalgic yet cool locations all over the world.  We have added this to our list of cool secret hotels.   The pool was amazing and the other guests also agreed to how this is an excellent hide-a-way. Only 2 blocks to the beach which is not covered with tourists and easy walking distance to great view restaurants and to downtown.  I needed an extended checkout at 2 pm due to not being able to make it back on time due to an extended meeting and they graciously said yes. We will stay here anytime we come to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Brent G,            Thank you for your encouraging feedback. We like to give our guests the best service we can and create a cozy home environment. I'm glad that you got to take in the sights and see both south and north Laguna. The pool is always a great way to wind down and soak up some vitamin D. The garden and the gazebo really help get a cool relaxing feeling. We look forward to your next stay with us and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Once again Laguna Beach Holiday Inn has proved themselves as a very worthy Innkeeper.  Families are here to have a fun time while a suave couple looking for a good time can also stay comfortably.    Location is a primer.  Across the street towards the front  is full beach access. Cross the street to the side a complete super market.  Purchase whatever it is you may need to purchase.  Make a left turn go to the area Laguna less people will see.  Local surf shops with some of the best dining  Laguna has to offer.   Make a right turn and a short walk to Laguna downtown.  The hotel offers comfortable, clean rooms with all you would expect from a hotel room.    For the demanding kids and providing adults having to go along there is a nice size pool never out of reach of your child.
Manager Response: Dear Charles J,            Thank you for your feedback. I'm happy to hear that you had a great time again while staying at our hotel. Our locations is great since it makes it easy to maneuver to any direction you'd like in town. I agree heading south on PCH from our hotel you do get less traffic but it is nice when you want to get away from the crowds. Downtown is nice to explore and sight see and is only a couple blocks away. The weather is only getting better coming into summer so we hope we see you again soon. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: The Good The Bad and The Ugly
Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for over 20 years when in Laguna Beach, not much has changed over that time apart from a fence being erected around the pool, probably a legal requirement. It is an older style property on two floors with suites at one end on a third floor. Most of the rooms face a central courtyard with a lovely pool and garden area. (beware pool is 8ft deep at one end). The property is located on the Pacific Coast Highway (very busy but traffic can't be heard in the rooms) just across the street from steps leading down to a beautiful beach. The property is well maintained, the domestic staff seem to work 24/7. Most of the rooms are okay but there are some very bad rooms that are to be avoided: rooms 19 23 60 & 64 are in dark corridors near clanking gates. Room
Manager Response: Dear Jherek,         Thank you for your detailed review on your stays with us over the past 20 years and for being a valued IHG rewards member. We appreciate your continued loyalty, which helps me think that we must be doing something right. I do apologize for the shortcoming of our hotel that you have experienced in the past but hope during future stays we can progressively amend some negative views you had mentioned. Our boutique hotel is smaller compared to other hotels but we our best to care for and maintain it for our guests. We are also undergoing some room updates for a fresher look, which we hope you enjoy during your next stay with us. Thank you again for all your feedback and for taking the time out of your day to let us know how we are doing. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Enjoyed 3 nights in room 12, ground floor by the pool.  It is an older property, but our room was clean, quiet and comfortable.  The property is on busy PCH 1, which made it very convenient to the beach and many surrounding businesses, yet, with the rooms facing the courtyard, I did not hear traffic noise at all.  Only a block from the beach and across the street from a great breakfast restaurant with home-made goodies.  Room included a small fridge.  Free coffee, soft drinks and popcorn in the lobby area.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Parking is extra, but in such a crowded area is convenient, since you will be walking to shops and restaurants.  We had 4 in a two bed room, so it was cozy, but we didn't spend any time there except to sleep. Also conveniently across the street from
Manager Response: Dear Jan M,             Thank you for your great feedback on your recent stay with us. We appreciate to know how you enjoyed your stay with us, and I am happy to know that you and your family enjoyed yourselves out here in Laguna Beach. Our rooms are nice and cozy and do wrap around our beautiful courtyard. The grocery store, which we use very frequently, is a big life saver when you want to grab a snack or some sandwiches for the beach. We look forward to your next stay with us and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Good location but the room would make a good laundry.
Summary: I stayed here with my wife for two nights in March.   Our room on the ground floor had a view of a wall and smelled like the swimming pool plant room.   The chlorine was almost overpowering.   This was mentioned at the front desk and apparently there were no other rooms available.   The carpet in the room was dirty and discoloured my wife's socks. By the room would have made a great laundry room.  The front desk staff were very polite and the location was great but the whole place was tired and kind of 20th century old.  I have stayed at numerous Holiday Inns around the world and this was the worst ever.   Sorry for being blunt but this is how I saw it.
Manager Response: Dear Neil J,         We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel. Your satisfaction is important to us and we try hard to make sure that all of our guests have a rewarding experience while visiting our hotel. Please accept our sincere apology for the shortcomings you experienced and hope that you can give us a second chance should you be in Laguna for another trip. Thank you again for sharing your thoughts and comments with us to better improve our service. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Nice place for a reasonable price!
Summary: I was looking for a nice place that took dogs. This hotel was very pet friendly. The outdoor pool area was lovely. The location was great - walking distance to the main dining and shopping areas. The price was also reasonable. Parking can be tricky. The parking lot it pretty tight and there seemed to be only just enough spaces. A word of Warning to anyone who is allergic to mold: the bathrooms had fans, but they were not working. I asked around and everyone I talked to had non-working fans in their bathrooms. I could see mold in the corners and along the ceiling. Plus, the wifi was So slow. But overall, considering the price, this was a lovely hotel. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear  CamReviewer123,            Thank you very much for your feedback on your recent stay. Your satisfaction is important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. I am sorry to hear of some hiccups during your stay but happy to know that you enjoyed your overall experience. I am happy to know that you will be coming back for future stays for more rewarding experiences. Thank you again and have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Great staff, location and nice setting
Summary: Hotel staff were great.  The location is walking distance to the heart of laguna beach shopping and beaches.  Not a luxury hotel, but the rooms were spacious and great  Very nice setting and decor.  Kicked back and made to feel at home.   Center atrium layout has a pool.  Staff goes above and beyond and provides a very welcoming setting.  Soda, water and popcorn available at all times.  Bar/restaurant on site.  We really liked the location.  Ample parking in back of hotel.  Again, waking distance to some very good restaurants, beach and the walkway that runs along the coastline.  Would definitely stay here again when in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear dbboa,        Thank you for your great feedback and letting us know that we are doing great. We are within walking distance of everything in Laguna so I'm happy to hear that you were able to get some sight seeing in during your stay. We do like to keep a homey feel for our guests during their stay. We look forward to the next time that you come back and stay with us for another great beach vacation. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: I went there for a weekend with my friends and we were all very happy about staying there. The rooms was very nice kept and was so beautiful. Just looking at the hotel as a beautiful sight and it has an amazing relaxing atmosphere. I felt welcome and happy being there. Service was good. They were very helpful when I went and asked for things, directions etc. The location of the hotel is also very favorable. It is in walking distance to the beach - which by the way was so amazing. By night when we went for dinner, we walked to all the restaurants. So what I am saying is, book your next stay in Laguna Beach at Holiday Inn.
Manager Response: Dear Annie Stine B,           Things are looking as beautiful as ever here in Laguna beach. We hope that you can come back and enjoy this wonderful weather we are having. Thank you for all the lovely compliments on our hotel and yes the restaurants in this area are amazing. A very nice treat for your taste buds. We look forward to your next stay with us, but until then I hope you continue to have a wonderful day.

Summary: Very attractive, looking down into a pool from two sides along with the abundance of flowering vines and bushes. A block from the beach. Large Italian resturant below at end of pool.  Onsite parking, a strong plus for a site in a busy beach town such as beautiful Laguna Beach, California. We have stayed at this location once a year for the past 20 some years.
Manager Response: Dear Hoyt2015,             Thank you very much for your kind review and for your continued loyalty. We are happy to know that you enjoy our beautiful courtyard and garden during your visits. My staff and I look forward to your next stay with us at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: I stayed at Holiday Inn, Laguna Beach for the first time a few weeks ago. The hotel was beautifully decorated and right next to the beach. The staff was helpful and the room was clean and in great shape. In general, all my expectations got fully fulfilled and I have no bad comments at all!
Manager Response: Dear Mette T,           Thank you for choosing to spend your vacation at Holiday Inn Laguna Beach. We are very grateful for your review of your experience and appreciate your commendations of our staff. We hope to welcome you back as our guests again soon and look forward to another memorable stay. Have a Great day.

Summary Heading: This is not your ordinary Holiday Inn
Summary: My sister & I live in different states and met in Laguna Beach to celebrate our birthdays. Our stay at this hotel was a delightful surprise.  It is so unique one would never guess they were in a Holiday Inn if the signage didn't say you are. It is beautifully landscaped, clean, the room was very well thought out, every staff member was friendly and attentive to any request. And the price can't be beat. The location is very near the beach & other attractions in Laguna.There is an excellent restaurant downstairs.
Manager Response: Dear Colorado Traveler,           Thank you for writing us a review, we appreciate your feedback. Our boutique hotel is one of a kind and catches a lot of our guests by surprise. I think that is great that you and your sister came to Laguna to celebrate your birthdays together. We do our absolute best to accommodate our guests and make every trip a special one. I hope you both enjoyed yourselves and that you can visit us again soon. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Second time is not a charm
Summary: So I have reviewed this hotel before. Once a great place to stay while in Laguna Beach now too be blunt is kinda a dive. They stepped the front desk service up to a ten , Monica is very pleasant. They always had very awakard parking but it never was a big deal to me. Parking has now gone up to $15 a day with a security guard posted as you pull in. It is Valentines Day, had a great day with my family and arrive back to the hotel to be unpleasantly greeted by a guard who definitely was not feeling the love today. He was a black man, no name tag and when I ask him his name he told me " mind my business". This happened after he called me a word i can not write in this review, in front of my child. I could go on with the whole name calling but i think you catch my drift. So I waddled
Manager Response: Dear Jelicaginelle,         I want to thank you for being a loyal guest and for choosing our hotel for your accommodations during your trip. I'm happy to hear that you did enjoy your stay with us and had a wonderful time with your family on Valentines day. I would like to extend my sincere apologies for your bad experience upon returning to the hotel. We have never had an issue with our security before but please know that we do not tolerate such behavior at our hotel. We hope that you can give us another chance for a better experience. I hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Can't beat the price, and popcorn too!
Summary: You can't beat the price and location to downtown Laguna Beach. I chose Holiday Inn for the price. I wasn't going to have time to use amenities, it was literally just for a shower and sleep. I found it on Travelocity. Turns out I got a better price at the Hotel. So a refund is coming for the difference from Travelocity.   Upon check in I was shown to a "help yourself" area in the lobby that included complimentary waters, coffee, tea, and hot popcorn! Needless to say I got some popcorn for my late night snack.  I was delightfully surprised, even though I didn't get to use it, a very nicely landscaped area around a center court swimming pool.   There is also a restaurant open for breakfast and dinner. We had breakfast there and it was lovely.
Manager Response: Dear SBproPhotog,         I'm happy to hear of your wonderful experience at our hotel during your stay. The popcorn and refreshments in our lobby is our way of saying thank you for choosing our hotel to stay during your travels.  I do admit that the popcorn is always nice for a late night snack for me as well. I hope that you do get to visit us again so you can soak up some sun and lounge around our pool and enjoy our lush garden. Thank you for your review and have a wonderful day.

Summary: A good place to stay, with a beautiful courtyard, and only 1 block from the beach.  Close to restaurants, too. Right across the street is a Ralph's if you need snacks, beverages or drugstore items. Our favorite places to eat were Orange Inn for breakfast (across the street), and Nick's (a couple of blocks down the street). We had extremely prompt service when we requested an item, and the staff was very helpful and friendly. A negative was that the air conditioner was pretty loud.  Also, the hotel could use some ashtrays outside on each level as I noticed that some people put out their cigarettes in the plants or on the ground. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Oregonians,           It's great to hear that you enjoyed your time during your stay with us. I'm happy to know that you were able to see our beautiful town and explore all the neat places that are a must see. The views are amazing. Our easy access to the beach and downtown area is always a big plus since it makes everything accessible. Thank you for bringing to our attention of the cigarette butts. Our property is non smoking and we do have designated areas with ashtrays at each point for easy disposal. I will be sure to keep a closer eye on our planters in the future. We hope that you do come back and stay with us again, and hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: dont stay here if you like a quiet room before 11pm
Summary: What this hotel was thinking when they built rooms around a loud restaurant patio is beyond me.  They definitely didn't care about anyone returning.  11 pm and people still yelling and screaming.  Even with a.c. cranked couldn't drown out the noise.
Manager Response: Dear mcintirept,           Thank you very much for providing us with a review on your recent stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try to ensure that all of our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. I hope that you can accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with the restaurant noise. I will notify their management so we can move forward together for a better experience. I hope that you can come back and give us a second chance for a more pleasant experience. Thank you for your feedback and I hope you have a good day.

Summary Heading: Quaint inn, ideal location, tiny, old rooms
Summary: Whether you like this depends on what you're looking for. We found it to be an adorable place with an interior courtyard right out of Europe. You'd never know it was a Holiday Inn.  It seems to run like a private inn, with outstanding personalized service. Many guests there were clearly regulars who love it there. It felt like a home away from home.  For many people, that is worth paying for. However, the tradeoff is tiny, old rooms...very much like a 50's or 60's motel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,        Thank you very much for taking the time to give us a wonderful review. It makes us happy to hear that you felt at home during your stay. We do our absolute best to help our new guests and repeat guest feel at ease and relax. I am happy to mention that we have been in the process of updating the rooms so hopefully next time you stay with us it will be a nice surprise to see the fresh new look. So you'll have to come back to see us in the near future and enjoy another relaxing trip. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Love this quaint and charming hotel in the heart of beautiful Laguna Beach!  We stay here about 5 times a year and always have a wonderful stay.  Great location, courteous staff and  loads of amenities.....would not stay anywhere else in Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          We are happy to hear that you have a great time at our hotel during your many visits to Laguna. Thank you for your continued loyalty and kind words. It is very important for my staff and I to play a big part in our guests satisfaction and offer a memorable experience. We are also in the process of updating our rooms so next time you come back we will have a fresh new look. We look forward to your next visit. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: The hotel lobby is fairly nice, as are the wrought iron walkways....reminded us of New Orleans. The charm stops there! We reserved a king room for 3 nights and were given a room with 2 double beds. The room was so small that it was nearly impossible to enter the room without hitting the bed. We immediately went back to the front desk and were told they had no king rooms available and they would move us into a king the next day. The next day we got everything ready to move and went down to the lobby to notify them that we were going to breakfast, and our bags were ready to move to our "reserved" king room. They informed us that the king room now would not be available until the next day! In fact, they were pleased to inform us that for the mistake they would be putting us in
Manager Response: Dear Guest,        Thank you for your review we appreciate your time and feedback. Your satisfaction is important to us and we try hard to make sure that you have a memorable experience at our hotel. Please accept our sincere apology in regards to your reservation and I'm sorry that our rooms did not meet your expectations. But  we are in the process of updating the rooms and will have a fresh new look. We hope that you can give us a second chance and stay with us again in the future and have a better experience with us. Have a great day.

Summary: My daughter's wedding party and relatives stayed here during her wedding weekend in October.  We were quoted a group price.  When people started making reservations, they did not get the discount.  After 2 more conversations with management, we were again promised a discounted group price.  When the guests checked out, they ended up paying the higher price even though we had a contract for the discounted group price.  Again, I spoke with Karen, the manager and she said that she would adjust the price for certain guests.  She never did.  This back and forth conversation went on for 3 months to no avail.  Tired and not happy.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel. Your satisfaction is important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. During the weekend of your stay a contract was signed at an agreed rate for the group, which we can not discount any further due to the signed agreement. Upon checking in all guest signed the negotiated rate as per the contract.  I do apologize for the confusion but I can assure you that you have not been charged more than what the contract was agreed upon. We thank you for your business and please keep us in mind for any future reservation needs.

Summary: We decided to make plans to stay near the beach after a concert in Anaheim. Laguna was a short drive and we love the area from previous visits. I was there on business and I wanted the wife to be in a safe area to shop, eat and enjoy the beach. When we arrived we met an amazing gal at the front desk who was very friendly and welcoming. She informed us that we were being upgraded to a suite!!! I'm a priority member and the place was a bit empty...so twas an easy call for them I guess. The suite was amazing! Large living room, with a fireplace, huge bedroom and an amazing bathroom. We loved the courtyard with a swimming pool and wrought iron fences all around. Reminded us of New Orleans. Staff was friendly, service was great, parking was a breeze. Again, it's the first week of
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           It sounds like you had an amazing trip. A concert and a beach getaway sounds like a pleasant mini vacation. We love to take care of all of our guests and I'm happy to hear that we were able to make your stay special with an upgrade for being a loyal member. I'm also happy to hear that you and your wife felt safe during your stay and enjoyed the lush garden and scenery in our hotel. We thank for your feedback and your recommendation and look forward to your next stay with us. Happy Holiday's.

Summary: The staff are superb, the room clean, parking ideal,  pool area pleasant, and the location is within easy walking distance of downtown or the beach.  However, the bathroom exhaust  fan runs continuously during the day and cannot be shut off in the room because, as explained to me by the staff, this is an old property and all the fans are  centrally controlled.
