Also, whereas all the Holiday Inn Expresses I've stayed at offer free breakfasts, this Holiday Inn offers only popcorn, which my wife found to be overly salty, and coffee.  Moreover, unlike another reviewer who was  given free parking, I paid $15.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,        Thank you very much for providing us with feedback on your recent stay. It's good to hear that you enjoyed our location and the hotel. With the lush garden by the pool it makes it pleasant to relax and lounge while enjoying a nice drink. Our staff is happy to hear that your stay and experience was a good one, but I am sorry to hear that the fans caused a disturbance during your stay. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and have taken note. We appreciate any and all feedback so that we can improve for a better tomorrow. We do hope that you can come back and stay with us again. Happy holidays.

Summary: I stayed in the Laguna Beach a few days since i had to work in Irvine. Laguna Beach has a beautiful beach and suitable for people who like places where there is not much going on in the evenings.   I consider the Holiday Inn in Laguna Beach one of the nicest hotel of the Holiday Inn hotel  chain where i have been. It is more a boutique type hotel in a kind of a historic resort with a beautiful patio and comfortable rooms. There are also free non alcoholic drinks and pop corn all the day available.   I have never eaten in the restaurant since i was aiming more for the vegan restaurants of Laguna Beach, but the restaurant also looked quite pleasant. The staff are very friendly and helpful.   The only things i missed was a fitness room with weights. There were only a treadmill and
Manager Response: Dear Guest,            Thank you for the wonderful comments you mentioned of our hotel in your feedback. The patio is very nice to lounge out in and enjoy the view of the garden. This hotel has been around for many years and we do our best to keep it looking warm and inviting for our guests. I do apologize for the extra early wake-up call but overall I am just happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope that you can stay with us again in the near future. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Just completed a three night getaway the wife in southern California. Stayed at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach. We have been to Laguna many times and know the area and several of the hotels quite well.  Overall this is a good hotel with a great location in Laguna.   Location The hotel is centrally located with easy access to beach, restaurants and shopping.   The hotel is across the street from a Ralphs grocery store and the Orange Inn diner, highly recommended for breakfast or lunch!.  Rooms Good, clean rooms, as you would expect from Holiday Inn.  They are a little dated but the staff keeps them clean and fresh. Large flat panel TV. Large showers.   All rooms face a central courtyard with pool and beautiful landscaping.  No balconies.    Note, there is limited seating by the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          Thank you for the wonderful feedback on our hotel. The location is always a great advantage since it is so close to everything in town. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the charm that our hotel has to offer and found our rooms to be comfortable and well kept. We do do our absolute best to make our rooms and our hotel feel like a home away from home. We look forward to the next time you stay with us, and hope that you have a wonderful day.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights last week for my 50th birthday.  When you first arrive you will notice the lobby is very nice and well stocked with free water, soda, coffee and popcorn. When we checked in my husband mentioned we were there because of my 50th birthday and all the woman said was ‚Äúnice‚Äù. One month earlier we stayed at the Catamaran Hotel in San Diego for my husbands 50th birthday and we got upgraded to a suite with a view of the bay/ocean and free chips, salsa and beers delivered to our room with a personalized birthday card. Here, not even a happy birthday.    The room was clean, spacious and nicely decorated. It had a big TV with cable and a fridge. My problem with this hotel is it‚Äôs really more like a motel with exterior hallways. Like a motel the door and only window
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           We value your feedback and it is greatly appreciated. Please accept our sincere apology for the shortcomings you experienced and we regret the room you received did not live up to your expectations. We would also like to wish you a happy birthday and are sorry if we did not do so upon check-in. We are happy to hear that you were still able to enjoy it your birthday weekend.  As our guest we rely on you to let us know how we are doing and how we can better meet your needs. Please be assured that your feedback will be taken into consideration in our efforts to continually monitor and improve the quality and services we offer. We hope that you can give us a second chance and stay with us in the near future for a better experience. Thank you for your time, and may you have  a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Great location, but rooms in need of tlc
Summary: The location of this hotel is what made us book it, that & lack of other mid priced hotels being available.  The location is spot on! The rooms are mediocre & in need of refurbishment/ maintenance. First room offered was ground floor which is difficult with luggage as carpark is at different level  & faced the on site  restaurant bar which was not part of the hotel & they had a wedding reception- you can see where we are going with this -  we were given an alternative room on 1st floor by the entrance to the car park & litter bin- the room was cramp & door hit the desk- pretty run down- could hear heavy footsteps all night- we were moved to an alternative room on 1st floor for the remaining couple of nights- better but pretty basic. Swimming pool was nice. In short it's location
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Thank you for your feedback. Our location is great as it is close to the downtown area and you have ease of access to virtually everything in town. I'm sorry to hear that we were not able to meet your standards as we strive to exceed your expectations on a daily basis. I hope that you can give us another chance and stay with us again for a better experience. Thank you again for taking the time to write us a review and have a wonderful day.

Summary: This is a great hotel. It doesn't look much from the street, but inside there is a beautiful courtyard and pool. There is also a superb restaurant attached. It is close to the beach, shops and restaurants. There is a Ralphs supermarket next door. We were given free parking and breakfast. There are also complimentary drinks in the lobby...water, Pepsi and coffee. The staff are excellent too.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Thank you for your much appreciated feedback. I'm happy to hear that you had an excellent experience during your stay with us. Our staff go to great lengths to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. The supermarket across the street is very convenient and a nice stop for some sandwiches to take down to the beach which is just across the street. We hope that you will continue to come back for future stays and look forward to it when the time comes. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: As the culmination of our 3 week whirlwind tour of the USA from Australia, we decided on this hotel after prioritising the Holiday Inn portfolio. We decided on Laguna Beach as were to meet some relations that we had not seen for many yaears and to meet some of the extended family. We were warmly greeted by the Desk Staff, and offfered our room quite quickly. The room was warm and cosy. We did have some trouble switching on the TV, but once I informed the desk a staff member came to assist. Replaced a remote and reset the controls. This was exemplary. Again it seems to be within ALL OF the Holiday Inn Group - CUSTOMER SERVICE, CUSTOMER SERVICE!! Although the hotel did not have its own restaurant there was downstairs a restaurant, but the fare was not what we were looking for, but
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          I hope that you enjoyed yourself on your 3 week vacation and tour of the states but especially your stay with us at our hotel. I'm glad that our staff was able to help you with any requests during your stay. The beach is just across the street and downtown is only a 5 minute walk away for your adventuring needs. We hope that you will again pin us on your next visit into town. Thank you for your suggestions and feedback as we are always open to how we can make your next stay even better. Have a great night.

Summary: The best part of this hotel is the location: across the street from the ocean and a few blocks from the city center. The rooms are clean and plenty of parking (which is very important in Laguna). Nice pool area.  No elevator so may be one story walk up or down.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review, we appreciate your feedback. Our hotel location is convenient and makes it easy to explore our town since you have an ease of access to everything. It's pretty great with the beach across the street and downtown just a 5 minute walk away.We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope that you will come back and stay with us again soon. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: What a place for a wedding...
Summary: Well Dannie, Cora and I took the weekend and went for our friends' wedding reception at this delightful hotel in downtown Leguna Beach. The first thing Cora and I did was hit the heated salt water pool. She didn't want to come out. The place looks old and quaint, but that is a carefully structured facade as the rooms were clean, modern and comfortable. There's a restaurant on the first floor and it was getting good traffic from both guests and walk-ins. We had breakfast there the next morning and it was very good. The beach is about a half block away across the street and there is a Ralph's next door. Lots of restaurants, art galleries, and other businesses...all within easy walking distance. Our friends had their wedding at a small park on a cliff overlooking the Pacific, about
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          A beach wedding is not only romantic, but a great way to celebrate a beautiful occasion. Best of wishes to your friends. I'm happy that you were able to stay close to your friends and have a great time to yourselves while in town too. This artsy town has a lot to offer and is delightful to the eyes. Now you can come back to this beautiful town and relive the great memories. I hope that you can continue to come back and stay with us again. Have a great day and hope to see you soon.

Summary: We only stayed 2 nights, but wished we could've stayed forever. Hotel was lovely and employees were friendly. Rooms were clean and bright. Would definitely stay again when in Laguna beech. Was right in the center of town.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,        Vacations are never long enough, especially when you are having a great time. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your time while staying at our hotel and had a chance to get an eye full of our artsy town. Thank you for your review, we highly appreciate your feedback, have a great day.

Summary: Excellent location - though not on the beach, you cross the street and have access from the step staircase at Cleo St, then can walk all the way uninterrupted on sand to Laguna's main beach. Also right across the street is the excellent Orange Inn, superb for coffee, breakfast, takeaway lunches to the beach. Hotel staff is exceedingly professional and friendly. Room is clean, with nice showers with a seat. Bed, pillows & linens are excellent. Air conditioner unit is noisy. I had a room on the floor above the pool, #72, and it was a good location, because that level walks right into the lobby and also right out to the parking lot without having to do any stairs, and you look down on the pretty setting of the pool. There are beach towels at poolside you can take to the beach, but
Manager Response: Dear Guest,        Thank you for taking the time to write us a review and for complimenting our hotel. We do keep this little gem of ours clean and beautiful for our guests. The location is convenient and gives you an ease of access to all the need to go places in town. I hope that you enjoyed yourself in our artsy town and left with wonderful memories. On behalf of my staff and I we hope you have a great day and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel was clean and well maintained with good landscaping and pool. Good value for money and within walking distance of beach, restaurants etc. Only criticism was room 64 had little natural light and air con unit was noisy. Otherwise a good hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we appreciate you taking the time out of your day to have written this review. We're sorry to hear about the air conditioning being noisy as well as there not being enough light entering the room. Thank you for notifying us about the incident. We appreciate the compliment towards our hotel, and we look forward to earning your business sometime in the near future on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, location fantastic, customer service-below average
Summary: The Holiday Inn at Laguna Beach is right in the center of town. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable. I love the courtyard, with the pool and flowers, its perfectly relaxing.  However, customer service was pretty rude when we had asked to switch rooms. You wouldn't expect this in Laguna, but there are plenty of other hotels where they go out of their way to make you feel at home, and this was not one of them. Otherwise, great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Thank you very much for providing us with a review. I am sorry to hear that your check-in experience was not up to the high standards that we value. Our guests satisfaction is always our number one priority and we like to have you feel like you are at home. We hope that you can come back and stay with us again for a much better experience. Have you have a great day and hope to see you soon.

Summary: The location is perfect. It is across he street from the beach access but be aware there are over 60 stairs down. The lush pool area is well maintained with large trees and plants. Every part of the hotel shows attention to detail with ferns on the balconies, awnings on the windows, beautiful iron work on gates. The floors are tiled in beautiful earth toned squares. Did not see any plain concrete floors anywhere. The pool facing balconies look like New Orleans. The dressing area is large with a long counter and big mirror.   The print out of our reservation made on line was wrong and the staff were very gracious about fixing it. As you can see, we were quite pleased with our stay at the hotel. We chose Holiday Inn because you usually know what you are getting with the name
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel, we appreciate your loyalty. Your comment on the gardens, stone tiles, and iron railing does give our hotel a very charming look and brings character to the hotel. Good thing we were able to help in fixing your reservation so you could stay with us and enjoy a relaxing getaway. We always love to help our guests whenever we can. We hope that you can come back for another pleasant stay.

Summary: My coworker and I came to CA for business last week. It was a nice , quiet respite to "come home" to. The room was very clean, the staff always friendly, and the grounds are beautifully kept. I never write reviews but the staff was so helpful and attentive, I just knew I had to let others know. They also have an on site restaurant "Mare' " with terrific cuisine. The property was secured very well and my key cards lasted all week!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           It's always our pleasure to help you in any way that we can. We always try to make your stay as pleasant as possible. I hope you and your co-worker enjoyed your business trip and got a lot of work done while you were here and hopefully had a chance to enjoy the beach as well. We hope that you can stay with us again on your next trip in to town. Thank you for your feedback, I hope that you enjoy the rest of your day.

Summary: While on vacation from Ohio, my wife and I stayed at the Holiday inn at 696 S Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, California for two days. The facility was old, but very well maintained, and it was a short walk to the beach and many fine restaurants. We were lucky enough to be upgraded to a suite, which offered a large bath room with Jacuzzi tub, a huge bed room, and a separate living area with a gas-log fireplace. Our room overlooked the courtyard and swimming pool, and we even could see the ocean which was across the highway. This facility had a bar and restaurant,,, we did not dine in the restaurant, but bar was very nice and we had a few cocktailed there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          I'm happy to hear that you and your wife had a wonderful time while on vacation. Our hotel has been around many years but we do maintain it very well and it's good to hear that you agree. The beach is  very beautiful and I hope that you were able to take a dip in the ocean to cool off from this heat. Please keep us in mind the next time you are in town. Thank you very much for your feedback and I hope you enjoy the rest of your day.

Summary: We were very happy with the location of the hotel, the rooms were clean but lacked a bit of light as they are all facing into the terrace area.  The pool was small but enough if you just wanted to have a quick dip to cool down.  Staff were pleasant and helpful and they also have discount cards for some restaurants and salons.  All in all ok.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          Thank you for providing us with a review your feedback is important to us. My staff and I are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time here during your visit. The location is great and with the hot weather we have been having a dip in the pool is refreshing. We are currently going to be updating the rooms so please do come back and visit us to see our new fresh look. We hope to see you again soon. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Great location and lovely lush garden interior
Summary: This was our second visit and we were not disappointed. The location just cannot be beaten.One minute from the beach and a 5 minute stroll to downtown Laguna. The high spot is the garden and pool area with lovely trees and loungers.The staff were very friendly and helpful and we would not hesitate to come back here again.Love it. The only small downside was the bright lights inside the quad which were not really needed all night.At $15 a day for parking, this was good value.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          I am happy to hear that you love the property and continue to come back to stay with us. I agree with you the location is great and easily accessible to everything in town. I want to thank you for your continued loyalty and look forward to the next time that you will be visiting us again. I hope you have a great day, take care.

Summary: What a great value in the heart of Laguna Beach. We initially weren't too pleased with having to stay at a Holiday Inn, however, this is definitely the cutest Holiday Inn I've ever seen. The rooms are pretty spacious, clean, and there is a pool in the center of the hotel which was a nice resource to have. (Especially with a 4 month old) The staff was welcoming and there are waters, soda, and coffee available during the day for your enjoyment. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,         I'm happy to hear that our hotel surprised you and won you over with its charm. The pool is a nice place to relax and take a refreshing dip. The location is great and I'm glad that it made your trip a lot easier to get around. Congratulations on the new addition to your family and we hope that you can come back and make more memories. Thank you for taking the time to write us a review, have a great day.

Summary: Think of this hotel as a quiet retreat along side the bustling downtown of Laguna Beach.  Location is excellent a corner site and comfortable walk for all Laguna offers. Service is very good, Staff is attentive. Pool & rooms kept clean.  Access the beach across the street experience the Orange Inn a Laguna landmark famous for its smoothies and a lot more.  Add to that a grocery store also across the street.  You'll enjoy it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          I am happy to hear that you thought of your stay as a special retreat. Relaxation can be hard to come by and I am glad that you found that here. The location is great and just a 5 min walk from downtown. The Orange Inn is a great place to grab some lunch and the smoothies are just delicious. Thank you for taking the time to write us a review and we hope that we will see you again soon. Take care.

Summary: Coming back to Laguna for an overnight stay, I was worried that the Holiday Inn would be too noisy - right on the corner of PCH, opposite Ralph's supermarket, a terrace restaurant right in the middle of the small hotel courtyard - it wasn't. Everything was just fine. Extremely helpful staff, who carried my luggage from the car park in the back right to the room, helped me print off my boarding passes, lent me cutlery to eat the breakfast I brought in from Zinc. I didn't use the pool, but it looks lovely - the place is a real haven right in the middle of all the beach town bustle. Have been to the restaurant when I used to live in Laguna - it is pretty good if you can't get a booking elsewhere - it is about as good as all the other places in town.  Thumbs up.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,         It is great to hear that you had a peaceful stay and that we met your expectations. Our staff is here to help and make your vacation as relaxing as possible. Even though we are right off of PCH our rooms do not get all the noise of the highway which is a big plus. We hope that you come back and  stay with us for another great stay, but until then I hope you have a great day and thank you for taking your time to provide us with a review.

Summary Heading: Holiday Inn to our rescue after the hotel we originally booked was not to our standards!!!  Awesome place.
Summary: The staff (Noemi Nasim) was so friendly & accommodating as we arrived late out of desperation when our room @ Hotel Casa Del Camino was not to our standards. The courtyard was really pretty & the italian restaurant was actually amazing!! We are planning to visit Laguna Beach again & will definitely stay at Holiday Inn. Thanks to the staff for making our stay absolutely perfect! üòÑ
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Good thing that you walked through our doors. Our staff is really great and I am happy to hear that the girls where able to assist you and make a rough transition into a smooth and easy process. We are looking forward to having you stay with us again, only this time when you come back you may see a few changes to our rooms and see a new fresh look. Thank you for taking  the time to write us a  wonderful review, and on behalf of the staff, we hope you have a wonderful night.

Summary: I had a wonderful experience at this hotel, it is small and quiet which is nice and just across the road from the beach. It is also in a brilliant location for restaurants and shops which are just down the road!  Staff on the front desk were really friendly and they let us check into our room 2 hours early. The free popcorn and drinks in the lobby are also a very nice touch!  Room was a little small for a family of 4 and the freezer didn't work but we didn't spend that much time in the room anyway. Pool is a nice size and sun loungers are very comfortable!! I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,            I am delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time during your stay and that the staff was courteous and helpful. The sun loungers are nice to lounge around especially with the beautiful weather that we are having.              We are currently in the process of updating the rooms for a fresher look so please do come back and stay with us. In the meantime, have a great day and thank you for the review.

Summary: Decent room close to the beach. You're paying for location! It's not your normal Holiday Inn as it is quaint- like Laguna itself. $15 for parking seems like a lot, but all parking here is expensive. Room was ready 1 hour before check-in and was maintained nicely. Comfy beds.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           Location is just one of the good things that our hotel has to offer and I am delighted that it was convenient during your stay with us. Early check-ins are always great and we try our best to accommodate our guests as best we can to ensure that you have a pleasant stay. We hope that you visit us some time in the upcoming year to see the updates that we will be giving our rooms. Thank you for your time and feedback, we hope to see you soon.

Summary: The hotel helped me get the same rate and room after a mix-up on the dates.  Much appreciated.  It is in a great location.  We could walk anywhere we wanted to go. The restaurant in the hotel was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,            We understand that mishaps happen all the time, but I am happy to hear that we were able to help you with your reservation. I am also glad to hear that you had a chance to explore the town since everything is within walking distance. There is a lot to see here in Laguna and the beaches are beautiful. We hope that you can stay with us again and see our new fresh look that we will be implementing in our rooms by the end of this year. Have a wonderful day and thank you for the review.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Location with a wonderful and friendly staff
Summary: Our family needed a temporary place to stay at the last minute, due to a home repair. Living in Laguna we had passed this hotel many times from the outside but had never actually been inside. I cannot say enough good things about this charming hotel. From the moment we entered the staff could not have been friendlier. My children were thrilled with the old fashioned popcorn machine set up in the lobby and lemonade and soft drinks were in abundant supply. This is definitely a hotel that goes the extra distance to please their guests. The inside grounds are beautiful and the gazebo and pool area resemble an intimate bed and breakfast. Every amenity is top notch, down to the lounge chairs surrounding the pool that rival any 5 star hotel we have ever stayed at (having a bad back
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           It was our pleasure having you and your family stay with us at our hotel. It is great to hear that you had an excellent experience and enjoyed all the amenities that we had to offer. We do try to have our guests feel welcomed and right at home and while your home was being repaired, it is nice knowing that you felt at ease. Next time you decide to stay with us you will be seeing a new look as we are updating our rooms for a fresher look that we hope you will enjoy. Thank you for your gracious feedback and may you have a wonderful day.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the Holiday Inn in Laguna. Really lovely, clean room and although we arrived at 11 am for a 3 pm check-in, we were able to get our room and then stay late the next day. That's pretty unusual. Lovely property. Rates lower than some of the pricy hotels in Laguna Beach. I'd definitely go back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          Vacationing can be fun and stressful at the same time. My staff and I do our absolute best to help you enjoy your stay. It is great to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that our staff was able to accommodate your needs. We look forward to your next stay with us. Have a wonderful night.

Summary: When an ocean-view room within our budget was not available at the dates we wanted to travel, we gave the Holiday Inn a try, based on its location a short walk to the Main Beach and downtown Laguna.  We were assigned a room on the lower floor at pool level; children were playing in the pool when we arrived and we thought the room might be in a noisy location, just steps from the pool.  However, the windows cannot be opened and the loud hum of the air conditioner took care of any outside noise.  We do prefer to have the option of fresh air but for two nights the room was fine.  There is no elevator but we were offered assistance with our luggage so that was not a problem.  The staff was always friendly and helpful.  A nice touch is complementary water, sodas, coffee and popcorn
Manager Response: Dear Guest,             I'm glad to hear that you found our location comfortable and convenient. Pageant of the Masters is a great experience and I hope that you enjoyed the show. The trolley is an excellent and fun way to get around town and just a few steps away from our hotel. It also gives our guests a chance to enjoy the scenery of our beautiful town. We hope that you can stay with us again. Have a wonderful night.

Summary: Just checking out of the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach.  Very friendly staff, cute hotel, awesome courtyard/pool.  Directly on PCH with a free shuttle stop outside and a Ralph's across the street.  Shops, restaurants and beaches are all within walking distance.  I would highly recommend and will be returning in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,         Thank you for complimenting our friendly staff and our hotel. We appreciate your feedback. It's good to hear that you had an enjoyable time during your stay and because we are just a few blocks away from the downtown area it is easier to see more of the town. Please visit us again. Have a great day.

Summary: I recently spend one night in Holiday Inn Laguna Beach with 5 of my "gal pals".  We attended the Pageant of Masters that evening.  The motel was fine. Had nice room amenities: iron, hair dryer, refrigerator. Room was ready when we arrived at noon.  Only complaint was 2 or the 3 rooms we had were the end room next to the parking lot.  We didn't have the nice pool view other rooms had and we could hear the slamming of the gate every time someone entered or left the premises.  But otherwise it was fine. Nice restaurant attached.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    I hope you had a wonderful time at the Pageant of the Masters. I am happy to hear that you and your friends had a good time during your stay. I do apologize about the inconvenience you experienced during your stay and bringing it to our attention. On your next visit we hope to make it as great as the first. Have a great day.

Summary: I stayed at the Holiday Inn in Laguna Beach over the July 4th weekend. My family stayed in two other rooms. The hotel is located on PCH, about 3 blocks from the main downtown area and across the street from the beach. The outside of the hotel looks inviting. The rooms are set inside a court yard area with the pool in the center which was easy to access. The setting kind of reminded me of the apartments on the TV series Melrose Place. I liked having the pool in the center - it was nice and convenient.   Most of the rooms are on the 2 floors, but there is a 3rd floor. There is not an elevator- at least I did not see one. The lobby is really located on the second floor, so to access the first floor, you have to either go through the restaurant that is attached, but not affiliated
Manager Response: Dear Guest,        Thank you for staying with us. It's good to hear that you had a wonderful time at our property. On a hot summer day it is very refreshing to take a dip in the pool and relax. Everything is very conveniently located, and I'm glad that it made your stay easier. Hope you visit us again soon on your next trip.

Summary: We just got back from Laguna where we spent 2 weeks at the Holiday Inn Express.  We stayed in a suite for the first week and then we moved to a King bed room for the second week.  The hotel itself is very well maintained with a very professional and well trained staff.  The restaurant on the first floor is Mare culinary lounge and it was actually one of the best places we found for consistent and excellent dining.  The location is excellent with a Ralph's Supernmarket right across the street and the hotel itself sits right on the PCH.  Great service, great prices, What's not to love??  We will certainly be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,               It is good to hear that our property came as wonderful surprise upon your stay with us during your vacation. Our location is convenient and close to everything so you can walk and see our beautiful town. We look forward to your next visit with us and I hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Was a really cute cozy hotel. Ambience during evening is adorable.  It has the feeling of a B and B more than an actual Holiday innPrice was right(during off season). Rooms were clean and updated. Staff was friendly. Convenient parking and location.right across from grocery store and the beach. A nice place if rooms are available. It is sold it most of the time so book ahead.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to give us a wonderful review. I am happy to hear that you had a home away from home experience during your stay with us and that you got to experience the charm of the town. If you are ever in town again we hope that you can stay with us again. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: A great hotel with Friendly Service!
Summary: This hotel has very friendly and helpful staff. It is a beautiful hotel with very comfortable beds located within walking distance to fantastic restaurants and scenic beaches. Why stay any where else? We love it here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,       I am happy to hear that you had a great relaxing time during your stay and enjoyed our comfortable  beds. Our location is ideal for access to everything and I am glad that it worked out to your advantage. We do hope that you continue to come back and visit us again for another memorable stay. Thank you and may you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Granted, we decided on the spur of the moment to head to Laguna Beach and stay the night.  All of our top choices were booked out and we found ourselves here.  I wish that we'd kept on driving!  If you only want location and you don't care about the hotel, then this is the place for you.  It is within walking distance from all the restaurants and stores and beach access is very close.  BUT the rooms!  Dark, dingy and not very clean.    There appeared to be snot on the shower curtain, the toilet had poo still in it and the curtains wouldn't close properly.  Now, if I had paid under $80 for this, I probably wouldn't be writing this; but the cost was over $250.  And that was with a military discount.  Definitely not worth the money.    Service is good, staff are friendly.  But I
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel. Please accept our sincere apology as we base our success on how are guests evaluate our service and our facility.  We have taken note of the points you have made and will be forwarded to the ownership of the hotel. We do hope that if you are ever in the area again, that you give us the chance to provide you a better accommodation. Thank you and may you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Had stayed here last year for 3 nights. nice location. very small rooms unlike any other holiday inn in the planet.they do have a pool. staff was extremely rude with attitude for some reason. had to wait 15 minutes and nobody showed up while checking in. no one to carry luggage. Wrote a complaint in the survey but nobody bothered to get back. This was despite the fact that i was a priority club gold member for years. This is unlike any intercont chain of hotels ( ich, hi, hie, cp.. )
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our hotel. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. Please accept our sincere apology for the shortcomings you experienced. We have taken note of the points you've raised in this review and shared them with our management team. Thank you for your time, and may you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel reflects the Laguna Beach experience
Summary: This hotel is in a great location and reflects the quaint and rustic charm that one expects in such a historic location. The brief walk to the beach and downtown takes you by a number of fine restaurants and boutiques.  The suites are very large with a great floorplan and spacious bathroom! They are situated at the upper end of the property, which allows for maximum privacy.  The hotel staff was incredibly friendly, courteous and professional in making sure our stay was thoroughly enjoyable. Most hotels respectfully treat you like a paying customer. This Holiday Inn treats you like you are their personal guest. We are already planning to stay here on our next visit to Laguna Beach in March 2015.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   It thrills my staff and I to hear that you had a great time during your stay. We always do our best to take care of our guests and help them feel right at home. Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing and we look forward to seeing you in March. May you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Great for "staycation" or vacation! Awesome customer service!
Summary: Such a cute hotel...perfect for our "staycation" at the beach! The staff couldn't be nicer and they provide great amenities like free bottled water, sodas, coffee and popcorn for the kids. Parking is a little pricey, but you could definitely move your car to free parking in the neighborhood because you can walk everywhere.The pool was a little cold and there isn't a jacuzzi, but you are shielded from the wind and there are nice lounge chairs, free WiFi and pool towels. Perfectly located to walk to shops, restaurants and tons of little beaches. We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Hope your day is going well. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your staycation with us at our hotel. I'd also like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with a wonderful review and letting us know how we are doing. The weather is getting nice and hot and it's perfect beach weather. We hope that you can visit us again soon. Have a great day.

Summary: While not fancy or high end, the Holiday Inn in Laguna Beach offers a killer location in a town that's great to just wander around.  Right off of PCH, you can walk out the front door to the beach, shopping, dinner, etc.  There's a small but very quiet pool we found great for just reading a book during the day.  Would recommend if don't need a lot of plush amenities (the rooms aren't huge) but a good location to take in everything Laguna and the surrounding areas have to offer.  Warning,  if you get there late at a night, we accidentally drove by it a couple times, was hard to spot.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review, we appreciate your feedback. I'm happy to hear that you had a wonderful time at our hotel and were able to enjoy a good book. It's a great way to relax and soak up some sun. We do hope you can visit us again and enjoy the wonderful weather we will be having this summer.

Summary Heading: Holiday Inn Laguna Beach, Quick Trip
Summary: The Holiday Inn at Laguna Beach has rooms facing an inner courtyard with a restaurant and a pool.  I booked for one night, as I was attending a wedding and had to leave early the next morning.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  My room wasn't quite ready for check in when I arrived, but they allowed me to park in the parking lot and do a walkabout of the main street. It's a block from the water, about three short blocks from the main beach, with shopping and restaurants along the way.   When I checked in, I was told I had been upgraded, at no charge, to a suite.  It was two large rooms (living room and bed room) and a large bathroom.  It had a large bed, king I think, and the bathroom was larger than some hotel rooms I've been.  The bathroom had a window looking down on the
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us during your trip to Laguna. I agree vacations are never long enough but we are happy to hear that although your stay was short you still had a great time. Hopefully on your next trip you can stay with us longer and enjoy our little town. Thank you for your review as it helps us see how we are doing. We hope that you can stay with us again soon and hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Loved the location. Central to everything in Laguna Beach. Service was outstanding. Staff made sure we were well taken care of. Room was clean amd nicely sized. Only thing to be aware of is 15 dollars a day for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, My staff and I are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to experience the charm of our little town. Thank you for your review and letting us know that our staff was able to meet your expectations and provide you with excellent service. We do hope that you can stay with us again soon. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: The service that we received at this hotel was excellent from first check in to final departure. The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. The maid was efficient and sorted our room early each morning whilst I walked on the beach. Everything is close at hand and it is easy to walk to restaurants , shops and the beach. I liked the fact that a variety of free hot and cold drinks were available throughout the day and early evening.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,               Thank you for choosing our hotel during your stay. We are happy to hear that you found our hotel accommodating to your needs. We strive to make our guests stay with us as comfortable as possible. We hope that you do visit us again soon. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Love laguna but this time our stay was ok
Summary: holiday inn is one of my favorites in laguna beach, California. I can not count how many times we have states at this location thru out the years. Of course Laguna was amazing!!!!! Never a dull moment and I just love all the activities, from shopping, great restaurants, great beaches, sunset bonfires, hiking ... I could go on and on. One down side was the service at this hotel. They were very stuffy this trip and not very forth coming. I've stayed at higher end hotels such as Surf & Sand and Montage but I like Holiday Inn because it's a cute boutique like hotel and usually the staff is amazing. Trying to get extra towels was a nightmare, staff while trying to do my check in after a 4 hour drive from Las Vegas was horrible and thru out are 7 day trip they seemed to be less
Manager Response: Dear Guest,            Thank you for writing us a review about your stay with us. We thank you for your feedback and would like to apologize for not meeting your standards. We are always looking on ways of improving and you are helping us do just that with your review. We do hope that you can stay with us again and have a better experience. Thank you, have a good day.

Summary Heading: Great hotel chain in a wonderful upscale beach community
Summary: Nice Holiday Inn In lovely Mediterranean style upscale artsy beach community of Laguna. Great staff and garden style rooms with lovely Bougainville flowers poolside. Restaurants and free parking on the premises. Convenient market across the street. Free public shuttle during summer months , although pedestrian friendly village area. Great art festivals - "Pageant of the Masters", plenty of ocean front view restaurants, galleries , boutique shopping,beautiful beaches , etc A vacationers upscale beach paradise!! ( seasonal fluctuation with prices during peak summer months))
Manager Response: Dear Guest,              Thank you for staying with us at our property and for writing us a review. We are happy to hear that you found our hotel charming and enjoyed your stay. We do hope that you can come back soon and stay with us again. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Continues to be Best Value in Laguna Beach
Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn this past weekend again and have to say that it is by far the best value in Laguna Beach. The location is incredible. You can walk to the beach right across the street from the hotel. The parking lot has wide parking spaces to make it easy to park, remove your bags and avoid getting your car banged by other cars. If you forget something, you can walk across the street to the Ralphs grocery store. For mornings the Orange Inn provides a nice place to get a Danish and coffee for your morning walk on the beach. The staff are very helpful and kind. We always enjoy the friendliness of the staff. The hotel offers free popcorn and soft drinks and water for the day. The pool is a very nice size with free towels. We just can't say enough about the place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I want to thank you for your wonderful review and for being a loyal guest. Our staff and I are delighted to hear that you continue to have a wonderful experience with each visit. Our staff and I do our very best to ensure that our guests feel right at home and have a wonderful time. Have a wonderful day and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stumbled across this hotel and were so glad we did. It was cute, clean and in a great location (right across the street from the beach and very close to great restaurants)! We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, My staff and I are delighted to hear that you had a great time during your stay with us. The location is convenient and we are happy to hear you got to experience the charm of our little town. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon, thank you.

Summary: We arrived at 9 pm, all the fairy lightings around the courtyard palm trees and iron railings plus the pool lights made the place seem almost like a dream castle wedding venue. Then the next day we woke up. This is a pretty motel, nothing to write home about for the price. Expensive parking, no complimentary breakfast, but thanks for the coffee and popcorn anyway. Noisy rooms and no privacy ( unless you keep your curtains closed ). Great heated pool and friendly staff, ok for a couple of days or a weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I would like to thank you for taking the time to write us a review, we appreciate your feedback. I am sorry to hear that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us as we always strive to help make the best experiences for our guests. While there is a parking charge we are proud to say that we offer the lowest price for our hotel guests in Laguna. I'm glad you enjoyed the scenery that the hotel has to offer as well as the complimentary refreshments in the lobby. We do hope that you can come back and give us a second chance to help make your next trip even better. Have a wonderful day. Thank you.

Summary: This is a charming property right on the main drag, a short walk to the beach and very conveniently located just a few blocks from the highway leading inland (CA 133, Laguna Canyon Road), connecting to the main north-south routes (CA 73 and I-5), and just a 30-minute drive to Orange County airport. We were looking for a place to accommodate guests for our son‚Äôs wedding that took place nearby. The Holiday Inn staff was unfailingly helpful. By booking for our group we received significantly discounted rates over Valentine‚Äôs Day weekend. We had family and friends staying anywhere from one to four nights, and over the weeks and days leading up to the event many changes occurred in people‚Äôs plans, but the hotel handled everything flawlessly. Everybody felt comfortable in the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are extremely delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time during your stay with us at our hotel. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review. We are glad that you got to experience Laguna and leave with treasured memories. We hope that you do come back and  visit us again soon. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay when visiting Laguna
Summary: We love that this Holiday Inn is so close to everything.  Cleo Street Beach is right across the street.  We'd have breakfast most mornings at the Orange Inn and then take our coffee to go and walk down the steps to the beach.  The hotel also has complimentary coffee, lemonade, bottled water, and sodas in the lobby area, which was also nice.  Easy walk to downtown, i.e., Main Beach, shops, restaurants, etc. and Ralph's grocery store is right across the street.  One evening we were quite tired and decided to eat at the restaurant located on the premises.  It's called "Mare" and it was actually pretty good.  Our room was nice and clean.  I did notice dust accumulating in the bathroom vent and dust on the toilet paper holder, but I'm a clean freak so I notice things like that.  The
Manager Response: Dear Guest,              I want to thank you for providing us with feedback. I do apologize for the unpleasant experience but I am very happy that you brought it to our attention so that we can continue to improve our services. We hope that in future you can come back and have a pleasant experience with us. We hope to see you again and have a wonderful day.

Summary: Nice location in Laguna, near beach and town. Staff was excellent: friendly and courteous.  The facilities were just fair for the price. By the way, the parking up back is a substantial extra charge. The parking was very tight. The room was on the small side. Wall paper was peeling on the corner adjacent to the bathroom. The carpet has certainly seen better days. The coffee machine was buried in a cubby hole under the TV, and difficult to access and see. Bed reading was hindered by lack of decent lighting.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review. I am happy to hear that our staff provided you with excellent service but I am sorry to hear that our facility didn't match up to your standards. We always want our guests to leave our hotel with a great experience and we are always looking on ways to improve and your feedback helps us do so. We are currently in the process of updating our rooms so I do hope that when you come back you will be just as excited as we are for our new look. May you have a wonderful day and thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: 4 stars if the beds were comfortable
Summary: I've seen this place many times when in Laguna Beach for the day.  The hotel looks so tropical and welcoming, I made a note to stay here sometime in the future.  I can see why the reviews are so good as there are many pros with this hotel, but I found the beds hard as a rock.  The mattress was a Serta Concierge Emerald.  I googled it and many results say it's plush, but there was nothing plush about the mattress and it had a basic mattress pad with no padding (no 2-3 inch foam insert, etc).  I'm perplexed by the reviews stating how comfortable the bed is.    PROS: Location - steps from the beach, on the strip close to all the shops, Ralphs next door, Taco Bell and a cafe right across the street, Mare restaurant at the location and the food is GOOD Price - very affordable
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay in town.  As you mentioned our mattresses do get a lot of good reviews which is why we are sorry to hear that you didn't find them comfortable. However, we understand everyone's preferences are different and we do appreciate your feedback. We hope that in the future you can give us a second chance and have a better nights rest. Thank you, may you have a wonderful day.

Summary: Came here for business, but brought my dad and my dog along. The room I got was kind of dark, with window facing half the central courtyard, and half the corridor leading to the back entrance. On the other side, was quiet, and my dog didn't get too riled up with outside noises. Location is convenient, and many good restaurants, the beach and stores at walking distance. It's fairly clean, but not spotless.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. I'm happy to hear that you had a good time during your stay with us. The restaurants in Laguna have so much to offer and yes they are conveniently located. We do hope that you can come back and stay with us again soon so you can further indulge in Laguna beaches treasures. May you have a wonderful day.

Summary: This hotel is in the heart of Laguna and though an older hotel as most are here it was spotless and well care for.  The furniture is classic and timeless.  I did hit the edge of the bed with the hotel door so it is not a room for more than 2 or 3 people. I think 4 would be too crowded.  No tub but I don't use tubs anyhow but may be an issue if you have children who need a bath.  Housekeeping was excellent!!!! I wish I would have left a tip for them as they can make a bed like no other!!!! The beds were very comfortable!!! I wish I would have remembered my bathing suit. The pool is inviting for sure and the lounge chairs have nice black cushions with yellow buttons and yellow lumbar pillows and each one had a nice beach towel furnished. Great touch. This would be a great place to
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are just delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience here at the hotel. Thank you, I do agree that our housekeeping staff is wonderful. Next time you are in town you have to visit the beach. I know the weather can be a little unpredictable but I do hope that you can visit us again sometime in the Summer when the sun is out everyday. Thank you for your feedback and may you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to everything in Laguna
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights in this Holiday Inn based purely on other Tripadvisor reviews since this was our first stay in Laguna.  Other reviews were spot on.  Walking distance from everything in Laguna beach.  Room was nice; two beds and a good shower.  They provided a metal crib for our young one too.  The pool is heated and goes to 8' at the deep end which is nice.  I wish they had a hot tub though.  The week we were there, the weather in Laguna was only in the low 60's so a nice dip in a hot tub would have been nice.  No continental breakfast available, but with all the little cafes and restaurants, it's not that big of a deal.    My only gripes about the hotel are that the air conditioner/heater was quite noisy.  We needed to have the heat on because of the colder weather.  When
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. I do apologize for the slight inconvenience you experienced, since it is of the utmost importance to us that you enjoy your stay. But thank you for letting us know we appreciate, your feedback. Next time you come for a visit I hope that your stay with us will be better than the last. Have a great day.

Summary: We were in Laguna Beach to attend a wedding at the Montage resort, but did not want to pay the prices to stay at the Montage itself.  Holiday Inn to the rescue!  This was measly 2 miles down the Pacific Coast Highway and offered an extremely comfortable bed, clean room, great location (walkable to the beach and all of the cute little shops in Laguna running along the PCH).  The parking area was small and filled up at times, but the staff was very helpful in offering alternatives or letting us park in the temporary spots at registration.    We would stay here again with no question!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are so happy to hear that you had a great time during your stay with us. Everything is close in distance so I hope you had enough time to indulge in the treasures Laguna has to offer. We do hope you can come stay with us soon. Thank you, may you have a wonderful day.

Summary: My wife and I were exploring the coast from San Diego to Huntington Beach and stopped in Laguna Beach.  I'd visited here over 30 years ago and was eager to see it again.  We found this hotel in the late afternoon and found the staff very helpful and welcoming.  The beach was easily accessible as were coffee shops and restaurants.  We highly recommend a visit Laguna Beach and to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I want to thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review. We are delighted to hear that even after 30 years Laguna still has its charm and that we could provide you with a pleasant stay. Hopefully you have future plans to visit us again soon. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: This is the 6 year in a row that i have stayed at this Holiday Inn, it is located in a great area easy access to the canyon and highway system, along with being just across from the ocean (great sun  rise and sunsets). Rooms are clean and quite quiet, the staff is very responsive to any and all needs. Located on the street level is a great restaurant which make life easy after a long day of work away from home. it is well worth the price. I will be back there again nest year!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for providing us with a wonderful review. We are happy to hear that you have had great experiences each year you have stayed with us. We appreciate your business and look forward to having you stay with us next year and any future visits. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: We flew in from Australia arriving at hotel ~9am.  We went straight to our room which had 2 double beds.  Although hotel is situated on cnr of Pacific Coast Hwy it was quiet enough in our room for each one of the family to sleep at different times of the day and weren't woken by any outside noise.  Most rooms open on to pool area.  We stayed for 3 nights, beds were amazingly comfortable.  Michael at reception was very helpful and guided to different parts of Laguna Beach.  Nice surprise to find a couple of pay washing machines & dryers for guest use.  Went to Orange Inn across road for breakfast - delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. I am delighted to hear that you had an excellent time during your stay with us. We look forward to your future visits  . Have a wonderful day.

Summary: I wanted to spend some time with my daughter over winter break and my husband found this adorable hotel. Yes it's a Holiday Inn, but it is NOT the hotel you remember as a child.  All the rooms look onto the pool that has beautiful plants and flowers all around.  The staff are very professional and accommendating.  I felt safe staying here with my daughter and we had so much fun eating, laying by the pool, walking to the beach, and of course shopping.  We were able to walk to everything! Also, we ate at the resturaunt in the hotel and it was fantastic!  I can't wait to go back!!! A little jewel in Laguna beach. :)
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the wonderful review. We are happy to hear that you and your daughter had a wonderful time at our hotel.  Your satisfaction is important to us and we strive for our guests to have a rewarding experience. We look forward to your future stay with us. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: I would come back again and again.
Summary: This Holiday Inn was perfect.   I walked to the beach,  shopped downtown and ate at the restaurant, Mare, which was excellent, at the hotel. The staff was fantastic and the room was clean and quiet. I will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. I am delighted to hear that you had an excellent time during your stay with us. We look forward to your future visits and hope that the next stay is better than the last. Have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Laguna Beach.
Summary: Laguna Beach Hotels are quite expensive and the more they cost the more they charge for extras. The Holiday Inn is much more reasonable and no charge for those extras. It is not right on the beach, it is across the street. You can walk to the beach in 2 minutes, cross the street, walk one short block, down the stairs and you're on the beach. They have parking, the rooms are clean, the beds very comfortable, the bathrooms nice and the water pressure good. You can walk to the main part of town in 8-10 minutes and if you walk the main drag there are attractions in both directions. The staff were superb, courteous and helpful. I would stay here again on travels to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that the little extras we had to offer made your stay with us more enjoyable. Please do come back and visit us again soon. Our doors are always open. May you have a wonderful day.

Summary: This was great value. The pool area was beautiful, all the rooms surround the pool so it is easily accessible and the first thing you see in the morning. The rooms were spacious and comfortable. The location of the hotel is just perfect, close to all the bars and restaurants and of course Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking your time to give us a review. We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We were confident that a little getaway and relaxation by the pool was needed after the holidays. We you can come back and visit us again soon. May you have a wonderful day.

Summary: My wife and I did our research on the area and selected this hotel for our four night stay in Laguna Beach.  Good: Staff were Very Friendly Located Across the Street from the Beach. Located close to main action and restaurants. Quiet. We were located away from the main entrance on the second floor so it was easy to get in and out. Get on the second floor so you don't have to shlep your luggage up and down. Free bottled water, coffee, Pepsi, popcorn (when popped) until 10 PM. Restaurant on 1st floor however we never used it. Heated swimming pool. Cute rooms overlooking the pool. Shower was renovated and very nice.  Needs Improvement: The little refrigerator in the room needs to be updated. At a minimum put a knob on them that tells you high, med & low. Need more outlets for
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the thoughtful review. We are delighted to hear that our staff took excellent care of you during your stay with us. We are happy that you were able to have a peaceful getaway at our property. We do hope that you will be joining us again soon. Thank you.

Summary Heading: this hotel is a must stay if you are in laguna beach ca
Summary: wow where can i start .i arrived in laguna beach on a day trip just to get away.i really didnt know where to stay for the night,someone from town suggested i try  the holiday inn.wow that was the best advice ever not only was it clean but the staff was excellent.my check in was fast ,the location was great and the pool was even better.my bed was firm and just the way i like it.all the staff took really excellent care of all my needs.if the lords will when i come back for another day trip ,i'm staying there.anyone who is thinking of visting laguna beach  ca,should consider staying at the holiday inn,its awesome.yours,truly D.R.W Room #27   .enjoy.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, My staff and I are happy to hear that you had a great time during your stay with us and were not disappointed. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve and strive to provide you with great service. We look forward to your next visit with us. May you have a wonderful day. Thank you

Summary: Amazingly, I have spent about 100 nights here over the past year out of choice, and I look forward to coming back in the new year already. It's perfectly positioned for a wide range of great restaurants in Laguna. Getting to Newport, Dana Point, Irvine and airports is really easy. Staff friendly, polite and reserved. The free coffee, coke, water and popcorn (!) is much appreciated. While there are no sea views, do not let this put you off. My 15 year old daughter more than enjoyed the palm trees over the swimming poll that the bast majority of rooms overlook.  Everything works - maybe the fridges in the rooms are noisy, but many are in the US.   I stay in a wide range of hotels at all price ranges, but this is the best balance between cost, comfort and position.Highly
Manager Response: Dear Guest,           It has always been a pleasure to have you stay with us in the past years for your room reservations.  We also appreciate your feedback and hope that we can continue to provide excellent service in the oncoming year. We look forward to your next visit. Happy holidays.

Summary: Great little hotel.  Very clean and close to everything in "downtown" Laguna.  I love staying here and do it whenever I can.  The employees are great.  The Little Italian place downstairs is excellent and the rooms are just the right size.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,          I would like to thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your business and are happy to know that you have continued to come back and visit us over the years. We look forward to your next visit. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Loved this Hotel! Don't let it's street corner location fool you it's beautiful inside. Polite staff very accommodating. The room was very nice , clean and comfortable. The courtyard was very tropical and quaint. Within walking distance to downtown. Just a stones throw from the beach. Grocery store across the street was convenient . The hotel was affordable and very nice for the price. Last but not least my favorite feature was free soft drinks and popcorn in the lobby üòäüòäüòä
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I would like to thank you for your feedback as it always helps us improve for the better. It makes our day better knowing that you where satisfied with your stay. We appreciate your business as a valued guest and hope that you can visit us agian soon. Thank you, may you have a wonderful day.

Summary Heading: Pool, parking, good staff, close to beach and Ralph store.
Summary: enjoy being in beach and relaxing in quite room in laguna beach, I enjoy every moment of my stay. They also have free popcorn , coffe, tea, soda and ... compare to those fancy hotels with so many hidden charges, this place is heaven.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,            Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. We appreciate all the feedback that our guests provide to us as we use that for ways of improving our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you had a great time and we hope that you come back and visit us again soon. May you have a wonderful day. Kind regards Management

Summary: Stayed here last year for a business trip and had been meaning to do a write on this property.  Excellent and very accommodating staff.  It was nice each day to walk out from the room and look over the pool area. Such a great view to start the day.  The next time I plan a vacation for the West Coast this will be one of the stayover locations.  Can't wait to visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,                 We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time during your visit. We appreciate all the feedback that we get from our guests. If you are ever in town again we do hope that you can stop by and stay with us again soon. Have a wonderful day, thank you.

Summary: I stayed here on a business trip with other co-workers but I am definitely planning on coming back for more fun! We were only there one night, but it was very comfortable. Rooms were clean and very cute. Best part - right across the street from the beach. Close to restaurants and shops. Staff was friendly. Wish I could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,                Thank you for your kind words. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful business trip and we do hope that you can come back next time for your next visit. May you have a wonderful day and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in mid-October and loved it. The rooms overlook the pool and everything is clean and neat. The staff are friendly and helpful. The location is perfect, the beach is over the road and there are lots of dining options. We loved the relaxed hacienda style of this Holiday Inn and can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,                   Thank you for taking your time to write us a review. I am  pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time during your stay. My staff and I strive to provide great customer service and are delighted to know that we are. Please do come back and visit us again soon. May you have a wonderful day.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here from Oct 19-26.  I had some classes to go to in Laguna Hills all week.  This place is one block off the beach but we didn't pay $400-$600 per night either.  Knowing what I know now, we would have stayed here anyway.  There is a Ralph's grocery store right across the street.  Restaurants within short walking distances.  The hotel surrounds the pool so if you want to get away from the crowd for awhile hang out by the pool.  No windows on the outside perimeter of the hotel rooms so we did not hear one bit of noise from the Pacific Coast Highway.  The service was excellent.  Anything we wanted, they were happy to help.  They have a parking lot behind the hotel.  Not the fanciest hotel in Laguna, but very clean, great location, and very good service.  Best
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us and providing us with positive feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience during your stay and visit to Laguna. We do hope that you come back soon and stay with us again soon . May you have a wonderful night. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: We have just returned from a trip staying in various resorts in California. We have always loved Laguna Beach but have always found the hotels to be very pricey so we were delighted, at the end of our trip to find this charming, reasonably priced hotel which is in a great location with just a short walk to the town and beach. The rooms are immaculately clean and cosy. The central courtyard is beautifully landscaped with a very pretty gazebo covered in bougainvillea and a small swimming pool which again is very clean and inviting. The supermarket (Ralph's) is just across the road and there is a small shop opposite on the PCH selling surfboards, swimwear etc who do a great deal on the hire of beach chairs, umbrellas etc. We didn't eat at the restaurant but it was busy most nights
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. My staff and I are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us at our property. We hope that you can visit us again soon on your next visit to Laguna beach. Have a wonderful day. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: We have stayed here for 37 years, love the location, setting, and accommodating staff. We like the coffee, lemonade, water, soda and popcorn the staff set out in the lobby for guests. It's a small, older hotel built around a pool with lush landscaping.  Ralph's is across the street.  It's 1/2 mile walk to Main Beach, which we do twice a day, enjoying stores and restaurants on the way. Air conditioners in rooms are somewhat noisy; parking is on 2nd floor level so we request room nearby to avoid stairs. Nonetheless we feel at home at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. We appreciate that you have stayed with us throughout the years and are happy to know that you are enjoying your stays with us. We hope you can come back for another year and we will look forward to seeing you. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: The architecture has a Spanish air to it, with bougainvilleas adorning the windows that overlook the street below.      The ocean is visible from there.  It is surrounded by tiny boutique shops showcasing the local art. There's a central courtyard that is in bloom with a gazebo.  Every step brings you to another breath-taking specimen of a plant.  Even the Taco Bell across the street is pretty.  This is Laguna Beach.     I cannot recreate the sensation of being in this picturesque town by the sea.  Just go.  Stay at the Holiday Inn Laguna Beach.  Even the street signs are works of art.  Every walk unveils another treasure within Laguna's maritime mist of wonder.       I will leave you with two quotes found on the fence overlooking the ocean in Brown's park, which you must
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I want to thank you for taking the time to give us a review. My staff and I appreciate all the wonderful feedback you have provided. We strive to give the best customer we possibly can and thanks to your review we feel good knowing that our guests are being take care of. We do hope that you can make it back to Laguna Beach and stay with us again.  May you have a wonderful day, thank you.

Summary: Great location across the street from the beach and a few blocks from the center.  Sure it can get better but with a decent off season rate and friendly staff it was a nice place to stay.  Thanks for the nice room upgrade.  Could not be better!  The restaurant downstairs is worth it alone with great pizza, salads, and more
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time at our property in Laguna Beach. We do hope that you can come visit us again soon if you are ever in town. Best of wishes from my staff and I. Thank you

Summary Heading: Great value for the money and location
Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Laguna while on a family vacation with my two boys.  While the rooms were fairly standard Holiday Inn room (nice, roomy but nothing special) the property itself was anything but.  This Holiday Inn is beautifully landscaped in a very southern California way with a wonderful courtyard pool surrounded by amazing variety of flowers and palm trees.  The landscaping is like nothing I have seen at a Holiday Inn before.  Location is another huge bonus as there is a beach entrance right across the street and the heart of Laguna is short 5 minute walk. There is also a wonderful breakfast place across the street and a full service grocery store next door.  Parking is available on site for a fee.  Loved the stay and look forward to returning for a longer visit!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review. My staff and I are happy to hear that we have met your expectations as we work hard to deliver great customer service. We do hope that you can come back and visit us again soon.  May you have a wonderful day.

Summary: We had booked a suite, nice sized bedroom with a large separate living room and huge marble bathroom.  Positives: Beautiful property. Relaxing atmosphere by the pool. Comfortable sundeck chairs and cushions. Nice touch with complimentary popcorn, lemonade and water bottles in the lobby. Fridge in the room. Lovely French doors in the living room and bedroom. Location is excellent. Many restaurants, shops and galleries within walking distance and only one block away from the complimentary open air shuttle bus. Negatives: No elevator. The pool area could use a good sweeping, and  new towels by the pool area, like the ones in the room. Sofabed was the worst yet, BUT, the staff did send up an extra mattress which made it comfortable. We paid for a suite for 2 weekend nights and used
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    I would like to thank you for taking a moment of your time to provide us with a review. I am happy to hear that you did enjoy your stay with us and enjoyed the hotel. I also appreciate feedback on ways of improving some minor details to our hotel. We are currently in the process of doing just that and we do hope that you can come back and visit us soon to see our fresh new look. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you soon. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Love this hotel a block from the beach! Beds are cozy, pool chairs are comfy. Clean room, with fridge and coffee. Yummy lemonade in the lobby. We grabbed a free bottle of water each time we passed through. Great location for walking to beach and restaurants. Ralph's grocery across the street.  When I asked the night manager for plastic spoons (for watermelon, ice cream) she actually went to Ralph's, bought some and brought them to my room.  You can't beat the sunsets on Laguna Beach! By the way, the Italian restaurant downstairs was terrific
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us during your visit in Laguna Beach. I am very happy to hear that my staff was able to provide great customer service to you. If you are ever in town we do hope that you can visit us again soon. May you have a wonderful night. Kind Regards, Management

Summary: We spent the last 4 nights of our road trip at this hotel.  It's boutique style with a cosy atmosphere.  Some reviews say the rooms are small but only compared to the general US standard. Compared to rooms in Europe, they are quite a good size.  There were 4 of us 2 adults and 2 children in a room with 2 beds. The rooms were clean and comfortable, a powerful shower and a good size flat screen TV.  Reception was helpful and they recognised Priority Club status.  There is free Pepsi, water, tea and coffee available 24-7, a nice touch.  The pool was inviting in a courtyard setting with plush sun beds, though a lack of towels at times.  A large fridge is provided in the rooms.  There is a grocers right next door (Ralph's) which was very handy as you could pop over and bring lunch
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking your time to give us your feedback. My staff and I appreciate any and all feedback we receive. We also are happy to hear that we provided you great service during your stay with us. We look forward to the next time you stay with us and hope you have an even better experience than the last. May you have a great day. Kind regards, Management

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at this hotel for a weekend getaway, we have used it before for due to its proximity to the center of Laguna Beach. This is an older property that has been revamped a few times over the years. All rooms face into a center courtyard that has a pool, no sauna. As far as I could see no room has any sort of ocean view, this hotel is on the inland side of the busy Pacific Coast Highway (PCH).  Although the ocean is on the other side of the buildings across PCH there is no beach access at this point. You have to walk into the town for that. This place has been filled with palms, hanging flowers,  and plants to perhaps hide the otherwise run of the mill layout. A big improvement is the restaurant which now actually caters for the people in the hotel, the
Manager Response: Dear Guest, My staff and I would like to thank you for staying at our hotel. We are always looking for ways on improving and value your feedback. We are currently in the process of updating the hotel and hope that by the time you come back everything will be completed. We hope you have a wonderful day and look forward to your next visit. Thank you

Summary: This is a perfect place to stay for a little getaway:) I was here on a girlfriends weekend and it was great!
